Crust Crusaders uses an auto-rotate feature that allows the player to enjoy the game by only using one touch!

name: Crush Crush
summary: Hey hot stuff! Are you looking for a fun and flirty game to kill some time and make you laugh out loud? Thatâ€™s a crazy coincidence, because itâ€™s been looking for you too! Welcome to Crush Crush â€“ the Idle Dating Sim! Begin your quest to win the hearts of your town's lovely ladies... after a few disastrous intros! Impress the girls by building your stats, unlocking jobs, and earning promotions. Woo them with romantic dates, thoughtful gifts, and a tickle fight or two! Work your way up from Frenemy to Lover, and unlock tons of amazing content along the way.

name: Crusader Kings III: Royal Edition
summary: The Royal edition of Crusader Kings III is the obvious choice for aspiring nobles looking to create a dynasty that lasts throughout the ages. It includes Crusader Kings III, an Expansion pass covering the first three upcoming expansions and the Expansion Pass bonus Fashion of the Abbasid Court.

name: Cryght
summary: A jump action game to find crystals.

name: Crewmember Pigeon and the Case of the Burgled Buttons
summary:
Year 3871 Aboard The Adamant Gambit.

You're good at solving mysteries, right?

name: Cradle of Souls
summary: After winning the war, Alastria is enjoying peace, but not the King. His wife is sick with a dangerous disease. In charge of finding an antidote is Orlando, the veteran Crusader, and Saigo, the Demon Hunter. What will happen as consequences of this mission and it's outcome will change everything...

name: Crazy Fatties
summary: Crazy Fatties is also crazy and cute Fat Brother designed the inspired game. It's a casual game of choice. Waiting for the levels of many games, the fat guys are happier to communicate together.

name: Crypto Tycoon
summary: Ever wanted to manage & build your own crypto empire? Trade crypto and invest into new properties to expand your business.

name: Crazy World
summary: Open-world life simulation RPG. Non-linear story, you decide who to join and who to fight. You can become anything you want to be, from a criminal to a businessman. Procedurally generated open World.

name: Crazy Truck
summary: Become the king of the road - a truck driver who delivers important cargo! Crazy Truck gives you a very realistic truck driving experience! Deliver heavy oil tanks and other cargo. Put your skills, stamina and speed to the test.

name: Crops and Conveyors
summary: Crops and Conveyors is a cozy game about building an automated farm. Enjoy the satisfying progression of starting from scratch, gathering resources, earning money and growing your farm.

name: Crow Story
summary: Jump, dive, and platform through this minimalistic indie 3D platformer about a little crow trying to save his friends.

name: Crystal Venture
summary: Crystal Venture is a voxel based adventure game with a focus on exploration and survival. The whole world around you is uniquely generated and fully editable. Build impressive castles, fight monsters, or go through quests, the game fits many gaming styles, is moddable and multiplayer.

name: Crystarise
summary: Explore a vast field, create your own sky island, the island gives the girl the power. An open world-action RPG that rises with a mysterious sky island.

name: Cryweard
summary: "Project Ergath" is a single-player action RPG developed by a student, with the focus on tense moments in battles and a feeling of accomplishment in a victory.Enjoy the tense, authentic combat and the sense of accomplishment amplified by the high difficulty level.

name: Crimson Waves on the Emerald Sea
summary: At the turn of the century, Victorian life carries on with one sharp difference from our world â€” vampires run amok and are a part of every day life. After having run away from home to search for his best friend, the young Cecil meets Nemo, a pickpocketing vagabond. The two set out together but in order to find what they're searching for, they must first unravel the truth behind a series of brutal vampire attacks from a decade prior.

name: Cruise Ship Handling
summary: Cruise ship handling, maneuvering and mooring simulator. Feel like the captain of a large cruise liners.

name: Crowd Sign: Emission
summary: Crowd Sign: Emission is a game where you paint a signs and watch the action unfold then later you can explore the world of the game in first person mode. Fantastic quest story with a branched out plot. The scenario is randomly generated each time, and the lore is created by the player himself.

name: Crown Delights Deli
summary: Crown Delights Deli is a visual novel with multiple dialect/language choices. As the cashier at a Brooklyn bodega, choose to talk in English, AAVE, or Spanish to a diverse cast of characters as you try to maintain a five-star rating for your boss.

name: Cryptonaut
summary: Cryptonaut: A retro-inspired crypto-themed first-person shoot 'em up! Blast and evade. Collect and score. The easiest way to make millions in crypto!

name: Crate Mates
summary: The pinnacle of warehouse worker simulators. Crate Mates is a block pushing puzzle game with a unique twist: Gravity.

name: Crazi Lift
summary: Crazi Lift is a simulator / arcade with a forklift. Manage your warehouse and earn up to get the MANAGER qualification !! But be careful ... Time goes by ... and the mouse explode !!

name: Cry Baby
summary: DxD is a zombie survival shooter that lets you experience the big fight against the undead. A variety of different environments are coming for you. Day or night. It's your choice.

name: Crystalreach Islands
summary: Crystalreach Islands is an open-world action RPG. Battle various enemies, gather gear, explore the world and fly the skies around the islands.

name: Crystal Story: Dawn of Dusk
summary: Crystal Story: Dawn of Dusk is an Action-RPG that blends charming retro-style graphics with fast-paced action, heavily inspired by 16-bit classics!

name: Crypto Miner Tycoon Simulator
summary: Build rigs to mine Bitcoin, Ethereum and other cryptocurrency. Trade on the market to grow wealth. Expand your business into new offices. Hire skilled employees and assign tasks. Use cash from your mega farms to research new technologies and reach the goal of each scenario.

name: Crush the Castle Legacy Collection
summary:
The hit Armor Games physics destruction game is back! "Crush the Castle Legacy Collection" lets you revisit the chaos and mayhem of the original series with upscaled graphics and new achievements. Load up your trebuchet with special projectiles to topple your foes and score big to carry yourself to victory.

This collection includes all levels from the original;
- Crush the Castle game
- Crush the Castle: Players Pack game
- Crush the Castle 2 game
- Crush the Castle 2: Players Pack game
- Crush the Castle: Adventures game

name: Creator's Asteroid
summary: A tile-based Metroidvania maker! Design and share your worlds with others, or download another player's world and experience their creation!

name: Cryptosnake
summary: Cryptosnake is an open-source decentralized play-to-earn game based on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) blockchain and at the same time, it is a decentralized autonomous organization created in 2021. Management rights are distributed among holders of SNK tokens. Holders manage the Cryptosnake game and SNK's financial risk, ensuring stability, transparency and efficiency. For this, the management system providing polls and administrative voting will be built in 2022. The number of votes is proportional to the number of SNK tokens that the participant sent to the address of the voting contract. In other words, the more SNK tokens a voting participant contributes, the more he influences the final decision.

name: Crabby Beach
summary: Crabby beach - Crab migration season is in full swing! You need to help the main character get to the water, bypassing dangerous obstacles and intrigues of poachers who want to shoot as many crabs as possible!

name: Crush the Castle 2
summary: Crush the Castle 2 was the sequel to one of the first catapult physics games available for web browsers. The first one was impressive. However the second iteration, included even more levels to keep you on the edge your seat while you destroy castles using various medieval catapults.

name: Creatures: Docking Station - Creatures 3
summary: Creatures 3 represents some of the most advanced artificial life available. The Norns, Grendels and Ettins behave as if they are really alive. Explore a vast living spaceship, discover incredible machines, and defend your Norns against vicious, hunting Grendels and some of nature's worst creations.

name: Cruise Ship Horse Racing
summary: Cruise Ship Horse Racing is a fun, exciting horse racing and wagering simulation game for players of all ages. Test your luck, watch the races, and win reward art in this engaging immersive tribute to the actual game played on passenger ocean liners for over a 100 years.

name: Crazy Athletics: Summer Sports and Games
summary: On your marks, get set, go!

name: Crumbling
summary: Who says youâ€™re too old to play with toys? Crumbling is a VR roguelike where you control your character with one hand, just like playing with an action figure! Battle against an onslaught of plastic monsters in thrilling hackâ€™nâ€™slash combat in a romping adventure thatâ€™ll take you right back to your childhood.

name: Crystal Goddess
summary: Azura, the guardian goddess of the Emerald Grove is having a bad day. Her magical crystals have been stolen by the forces of evil! Help Azura get the crystals back and defeat the demon hordes!

name: CrazyParty
summary: It is a game where you move in a wide map in all directions using 12 cards of your choice, and play against or cooperate with other players to play mini games.

name: Crown of Pain
summary: Crown of Pain is a match-3 RPG. Heroes venture to the castle to find the elusive crown of pain, an artifact which is said to take away all of their worries.

name: Crimson Dawn
summary: Crimson Dawn is a casual roguelike game about slaying hordes of monsters, upgrades and leveling different characters, weapons and spells. Recruit a mercenary, choose weapons and spells, slay thousands of monsters, return home with a reward, craft new weapons and spells. Repeat.

name: Crimson Tactics: The Rise of The White Banner
summary: Crimson Tactics: The Rise of The White Banner brings you an epic adventure in the form of a turn-based tactical RPG. Set in a medieval high fantasy world, witness a massive political disruption through the lives of different characters and fight for the fate of Wendalle.

name: Critter Crops
summary: Sylvie is a young witch, banished from home for her magic. A mysterious letter brings her to Mur Mur Town, an abandoned, spooky place where a bountiful life awaits her! Grow magical crops, unlock the mysteries of Mutter Island, and build a new home for an aspiring witch and her friends!

name: Crash Test Idiot
summary: You must destroy every car in the city.

name: Crystal Road: Vale of Memories
summary: Embark on a mystical adventure to solve the mystery of the Crystal Road. Guided by a strange voice, you find yourself in a world that has been ravaged by an all consuming fog. Romance will bloom as you establish the land and unravel the truth. Farm, fish and build your forever home in your new life!

name: Crystal Cave: Lost Treasures
summary:
Crystal Cave: Lost Treasures is a quest for long-lost treasures buried in pitch black caves, pyramids and temples of ancient civilizations. Huge gemstones were sheltered from the sunshine for eons of time waiting for explorers brave enough to unearth them. You - as an intrepid treasure hunter - will need all your ingenuity to pass the traps and dangers of the underground and collect the treasure in more than 100 levels.
Crystal Cave: Lost Treasures offers gameplay mixed of action and puzzle elements for players of all ages!

name: Crossroad Simulator
summary: Control the traffic light to regulate the flow of city traffic!

name: Cross Core
summary: In the game, you will be the protagonist of the story, leading the team members to explore the unknown galaxy as the "captain" of the galaxy exploration team. During the exploration, you will encounter many enemies, meet like-minded partners, and face difficult choices amid many hardships.

name: Craft Hero
summary: Gather resources by day, build and recruit by noon, defend your village by night! A new minimalism sandbox survival with countless new ideas, Craft Hero.

name: Crystal Anomaly
summary: You are a robot tasked with producing crystals. Organize a never ending supply of them and see how long you can last!

name: Crazy Golf
summary: Experience the world's wackiest miniature golf courses. Seven different courses with six different holes will put your skills to the test. Play alone or challenge your friends in multiplayer mode and show them who's the true champ.

name: Creepslore
summary: Enter a world filled with drunk monsters and their offbeat shenanigans: Birdman's arm got stolen as part of a performance art. Lettuce wants you to eat him. Doctor Scientist rents his body out to a Wound Parasite, and the Talking Lamp is... well, a talking lamp. Wait- What is going on here?

name: Crash Test Oliver
summary: Due to an unknown malfunction of his spaceship, Oliver crashes on a strange planet. While looking for a way back, he realizes that the path ahead is full of dangers. Can he overcome them or will he be trapped on this unknown world?

name: Crime Ð¡ity
summary: Love fun and endless fun? Do you like cool games with a beautiful world and beautiful graphics? Then Crime City is for you! Immerse yourself in the role of a city criminal who is hunted by absolutely the whole city. car and different weapons do not let yourself be offended !!!

name: Crazy Invader ShootEm Down
summary: Enjoy fast paced action in this retro inspired arcade ShootEm Up Style game

name: Crabmania
summary:
Crabby is a crab, much as his name might suggest, and after waking up hungry one day he decides he is in the mood for a good old-fashioned Reubens Sandwich. Unfortunately, his kitchen is bare...

Join Crabby on his quest to find the six secret ingredients he needs to make the perfect Reubens, all while getting to know the strange local sea life of the reef he calls home.

name: Crash Bandicoot Action Pack
summary: Crash Bandicoot Action Pack is a bundle containing Crash Nitro Kart, Crash Twinsanity, and Crash Tag Team Racing.

name: Crupt
summary: Slash through swarms of enemies, fight bosses, and talk to wacky characters as you struggle to restore everything one Wave at a time.

name: Cradlemoor
summary: Cradlemoor is an interactive mystery game, which casts you as the detective, inviting you to explore a labyrinth of documents, photos, videos and audio clips via a virtual desktop computer. In Cradlemoor, you are the detective.

name: Crabs: Chef's Story
summary: In this Multiplayer Party Brawler, play as one of 'Chef's' crabs! Launch crab ass with 'Crab-fu' and battle online in a number of crazy game modes designed to push your crabs abilities to the limit.

name: Critias Empire
summary: Turn-based strategy game with 4x elements. Build your empire while surviving frequent disasters rained down by the ancient Gods.

name: Crusader: Dungeon Series
summary: Crusader: Dungeon Series Dungeon of Dagginor is the first in the series and is a simple dungeon crawler.

name: Crawling Silence
summary: Uncover the mysteries of an old, long forgotten building with a dark past, or choose to try and escape the creatures lurking within it with friends! Crawling Silence features two main modes, a story mode and an online co-op mode.

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D. - Dark Horse
summary: Includes: Hero unlock (Eve Woods), the Urban Shadow outfit, Zombie Eliminator MP40 skin and 700 crowns.

name: Critical Slash
summary:
Explore a procedurally generated world with tons of enemies, treasure, and secrets!
Vast exploration, intense battles, and awesome gear and loot! Endless level progression system!

name: Crazy Machines 2
summary: Crazy Machines 2 for the DS is the sequel to the well-known puzzle and experiment solving game. The professor is back and leaves his lab to travel around the world this time, to build up new experiments to solve for the player. During his travels he reaches places like beautiful beaches, the Great Wall of China and the pyramids of Giza, to name a few.

name: Crash of the Titans
summary: The Nintendo DS version of Crash of the Titans is a platform game with beat 'em up elements, it differs from the console version in its plot and extensive use of the touchscreen and microphone.

name: Crash of the Titans
summary: The Game Boy Advance version of Crash of the Titans features linear 2D gameplay where the focus is to break crates while jacking Titans, it also has its own story merging the DS and console versions.

name: Crazy Pong
summary:
A simple game which provides a slight twist to the classic arcade game pong and provides a more family fun option to a previously boring game.
It shows the scores on each end of the screen and there's even an option to play multiplayer with a friend!
And the options to play against the computer with the easy, medium, hard, and impossible difficulties.

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D. - Glitch
summary: The Glitch Season brings a new Champion into the fray. It also introduces some really huge changes, including a new lobby where you can choose where youâ€™ll spawn, weapon skins, and a new leveling system.

name: Crazy Frog Collectables: Faces
summary:
Crazy Frog Collectables Faces is a cancelled Nintendo DS puzzle game developed by Cypron Studios starring Crazy Frog/The Annoying Thing, a CGI-animated character known for music videos featuring him from the mid-2000s.

The game was later reworked into the DSiWare game Crazy Cheebo: Puzzle Party.

name: Crazy Chicken Xtreme
summary: The craziest shooter classic in a new ingenious version! Moorhuhn / Crazy Chicken is one of the best-known and most successful game characters. Join the large Moorhuhn community now!

name: CrushBorgs
summary: "Run and Gun" oldschool single-player platformer with NES aesthetics, including an authentic 8-bit chiptune.

name: Creature Hunter
summary: Produce powerful spells with the loot you collect. Destroy creatures that get stronger at each level with collective or single spells. Defend yourself with defensive spells. Cross deadly parkour with the spells you've crafted.

name: Crafting Town
summary: Crafting Town Is : A Crafting game with Simulation&Building where you can Craft and Develop your Village, Source Management and Quests.

name: Crazy Estate
summary: Crazy Estate is a casual board game, based on real estate business in the real world, they use low-buy and high-sell to earn great amount of money. In this game, players also need to use this principle to make money. Play through many levels where every house will have their respective characteristics. In addition to different price, they also has other kinds such as fast-growing house, long-lasting house, and house with better price space. All this makes the game more random and challenging.

name: Crux: The Great Outdoors
summary: Climbing is about carefully planning your route and flawless execution. In Crux you move your hands or feet to a new hold - but each hold will only let you hang on for so long. Find the sequence of moves that get you to the top and execute them! And when you've reached all the tops - beat the highscores by finishing each climb in the fewest possible moves.

name: Crush the Jelly
summary: Touch two or more jelly to kill the block is very famous game on mobile. It is a very good kill time game. To make it more exciting, we redesign this game. And offer a "Battle" concept. Because of this game is Cross-platform. Anyone can use WiFi to battle with others. Battle need fair, all people within the battle are using same pattern, they need as fast as they can to get the highest mark. When anyone finish the game (no more can be pop) game will stop. The highest mark people will win the "Round".

name: Cream and Cheese in Sonic the Hedgehog
summary: A ROM hack that swaps Sonic for Cream and Cheese (from Sonic Advance). Cream can fly like Tails, spindash and use Cheese to attack enemies remotely.

name: Cropped
summary: Cropped is a first-person action horror adventure - Survive the night as the farm you've arrived at has taken a turn for the worse...

name: CrashTV
summary: Put your TV through a series of trail-and-error experiments in this puzzle platformer.

name: Crashocalypse
summary:
Crashocalypse is a video game made in RPG Maker 2000 that was released in May 12th, 2018 and was made by one person named "Default" Reese. The game was created as a fangame dedicated to the Let's Player, Mikennemonic and his community, featuring references and in-jokes dedicated to the community in a turn-based RPG format.

The game was released within the MikeNnemonic forums for download, free of charge.

name: Cryptr
summary: A singleplayer hack and slash dungeon crawler game with stat upgrades and numerous levels and enemies to defeat.

name: Cradle of Egypt / Cradle of Persia
Crash Forts
summary: Crash Forts is an addictive physics and destruction game. You have to destroy various structures with the help of tools.

name: Cradle of Egypt
summary: Explore the lands of the Pharaohs and the Cradle of Egypt! Enjoy the miraculous constructions in this awesome Match 3 game! Journey through five ancient epochs and build your own Egypt. Starting from a small village, develop your settlement into the most powerful civilization, the cradle of all civilizations! Collect resources, construct various buildings, and finish with the Pyramids of Giza, the Sphinx, and other magnificent temples!

name: Crave
summary: Ceaseless hunger draws you yet a bit closer to the gates of Foghorn. Devour men and beasts alike to acquire a wide array of combat abilities. Through shadows and mold, track down the paling memories of this bygone kingdom, all in a classic hand-drawn action platformer.

name: Crank-A-Sketch
summary: A drawing game for the Playdate modeled after the famous toy.

name: Crypto Unicorns
summary: A unicorn pet-collecting and farming game built on blockchain by Laguna Games.

name: Crazy Zoo
summary: "Crazy Zoo" is a small animal-themed match-3 game. The game is simple and easy to use, suitable for playing for a while in your spare time.

name: CrossOver: Roll For Initiative
summary: Defend your tabletop RPG paper character sheet from invading pixel enemies! Find matches in your tray of dice to power attacks to clear the evil from your shelf full of campaign books. Hardcore match-3 RPG puzzle meets action-strategy tower defence. Far from a casual game!

name: Crossy Creeper
summary: An endless runner where you play with characters from many popular franchises

name: CR Galaxy Angel
summary: CR Galaxy Angel is a pachinko simulation game for Playstation 2 with Galaxy Angel content, which lets you experience playing on taiyo electric pachiko machines.

name: Cricket Captain 2022
summary: Cricket management goes to another level as Cricket Captain 2022 puts you in control. A major re-design of the player aggression system provides greater realism, coaching options and analysis. Limited over matches have been remodelled to give greater balance and reduce collapses.

name: Crush Them!
summary: In the quiet and peaceful grassland, a group of uninvited guests suddenly came! They are ordered by Satan to raid the walls of God! You have been hired by the gods as a new warrior, sworn to live and die with the city wall! Now, follow the will of God and crush them with your fingers!

name: Crazy Shark
summary: You have to control a crazed shark that lives in the depths of the ocean. Declare war on all living things, but be careful, the military is hunting you! Eat vacationers, break yachts, wreck ships, destroying submarines and helicopters!

name: Crusader Kings III: Fate of Iberia
summary: The sun-kissed lands of Iberia await your glorious rule with Crusader Kings III: Fate of Iberia flavor pack. Deeply rich in history, culture and people, the peninsulaâ€™s medieval destiny is ready to be shaped by your majestic hand, be it clad in conciliatory velvet or as an iron fist.

name: Cryptorig
summary: CryptoRIG is a semi-idle server management game focussed on cryptocurrency mining and trading.

name: Crazyness: Weird Village
summary: First-person action game

name: Crunky
summary: An endless jumping game where you have to die to expand your Crunkipedia.

name: Crazy Shooters 2
summary: Crazy Shooters 2 is a cool game where you can have a lot of fun with your friends. Enter now and create a lobby as you like, or chose one which is created by someone else and fight in the craziest combat that exists.

name: Crazy Cook
summary: You have to peel, cut, shoot and smash crazy ingredients ! It is a very good exercice if you want to get fit. Crazy Cook is a fun and crazy cooking game for the whole family ! Your goal is to create great recipesâ€¦with a twist : the ingredients are a bit hostile !

name: Crunchy Numbers Math Arcade
summary: Crunchy Numbers Math Arcade is a fun, challenging, & educational math game. Use that amazing brain of yours to help Cruncher Bot eat the correct numbers. Cruncher Bot is always hungry for the right multiple, prime, factor, & roman numeral, but the Red Chompers are trying to stop him from feeding his mathematical appetite. Build up a combo by eating consecutive correct numbers to greatly increase your high score or just play casually for fun.

name: Crisis Core: Final Fantasy VII - Reunion
summary: Crisis Core: Final Fantasy VII - Reunion is an HD remaster of the smash hit prequel to Final Fantasy VII. In addition to all graphics being remastered in HD, fully voiced dialogue and new soundtrack arrangements make for a dynamic new retelling of a beloved classic.

name: Crash Forts 2
summary: Crash Forts 2 is a continuation of an exciting puzzle about physics and destruction.

name: Crooked Time
summary: A visual novel about a man searching for his missing love. The townsfolk say they saw him go down to the valley, they say time moves differently down there.

name: Crimson Standard
summary: Crimson Standard is a story-rich adventure RPG game, featuring turn-based combat and flexible character building. Follow the path of Wang Zi who accidentally traveled to an alternative China with magic, exploring the mysteries around the world, and eventually facing the hidden enemy of mankind!

name: Crazy Pancake
summary: Crazy Pancake is a dynamic car action game where you drive through a savannah filled with tigers that run around in all directions. Avoid the tigers and other dangers along the way to reach the goal.

name: Crazy Donuts
summary: Run action game in which you drive through a crazy town where pigs roam.

name: CrossfireX: Operation Catalyst
summary: Experience the first part of the CrossfireX single player campaign, developed in partnership with Remedy Entertainment. In Operation Catalyst, take control of a Global Risk Unit as they traverse through enemy territory in order to save their captured squad mate and uncover the dark secrets of the Black List Mercenary Group.

name: Crashword
summary:
Crashword is a co-operative party word game that's fun for all ages!

Each turn, one single player is the guesser trying to guess a secret word; everyone else is a clue-giver. Each clue-giver submits a one word clue, trying to help the guesser guess the secret word. All duplicate clues (crashes) are thrown out, and the guesser only sees the clues that were unique.

name: Crusader: No Remorse
summary:
As a Silencer, one of the elite enforcers of the World Economic Consortium, you're supposed to be incorruptible. But if the system you serve is utterly corrupt, where does that leave you? You go over to the Resistance, the same pack you used to hunt down. Now your former employers better watch their backs because you're
coming after them with all the firepower at your command.

No pity. No mercy. No Remorse

name: Cruise Ship Manager
summary: Manage your own Cruise Ship! Maintain your vessel and sell tickets to the wealthiest of passengers. Issue orders to your crew and keep their morale high. Choose the layout of your ship and the kind of amenities you want to offer. Keep the prices right, passengers satisfied, and your wallet full!

name: Cranky Bird
summary: A flappy adventure with a cranky bird for Playdate.

name: Cryptid Coffeehouse
summary: everyone's heard of mothmanâ€“ the moth creature that haunts the outskirts of point pleasant, west virginiaâ€“ but no one's heard of it like this! in some random idyllic midwestern town, you meet artemis (aka mothman) at your favorite coffee shop and begin an agonizingly slow burn romance with them.

name: Craggenrock
summary: Craggenrock is a crafting shop management game taking place on a remote island after a great disaster. You play as Arlo, a young crafter seeking a name of his own replacing his former crafting master in the mining town of Pareho.

name: Crossedland
summary: If you've always loved building villages, farming, and taking care of villagers but wished there was more action and exploration, Crossedland is the home for you!

name: Crate Knight
summary: Solve the puzzles by using the environment interactions as Lancelot in this puzzle platformer game. If you find more keys, you will be able to get closer to the more difficult puzzles

name: Crossfar
summary: Fight in massive, fast-paced PVP battles with hardcore team tactics in zero gravity! Choose from five drone classes upon respawns and put your spectacular pilot skills on display to defend your gate, destroy or sneak past the enemy defenses, cross the field and breach the enemy gate on the far side.

name: Craft the World: Episodes Edition
summary: Craft the World is a unique sandbox strategy game, the mix of Dungeon Keeper, Terraria and Dwarf Fortress. Explore a random generated world populated by dangerous creatures, build a dwarf fortress, gather resources, and craft all the items, weapons, and armor you need. Episodes Edition contains only first world, additional words are available through in app purchases.

name: Crossword Dungeon
summary:
Descend into the Crossword Dungeon, where every level is made up of a procedurally-generated crossword, and each letter guarded by a vile monster you must best!
Guess the correct letter to instantly dispatch the monster, or risk combat damage if incorrect.
Test your wits against crosswords of increasing complexity and monsters with deadly abilities with one of three classes with their own unique skills:
The Barbarian, a muscled berserker who lives for the thrill of battle and feeds his rage with the blood of his enemies.
The Ranger, a feared hunter who uses a deadly combination of marksmanship and tracking instincts.
And the Scoundrel, a ne'er-do-well who makes the best of limited resources and subverts enemies' defenses with stealth attacks.
...each in search of riches and glory beneath the Crossword Dungeon.

name: Crazy Otto
summary: Originally, Ms. Pac-Man started as an unauthorized hack of Pac-Man called Crazy Otto by General Computer Corporation, featuring a Pac-Man-like character with a blue eye and legs. To avoid another lawsuit with Atari (which they had previously received for creating "Super Missile Attack", a Missile Command hack), G.C.C. presented the game to Bally Midway for approval of release. Midway, impatient for Namco to release the then-upcoming Super Pac-Man, purchased Crazy Otto for their own release, transformed into Ms. Pac-Man.

name: Crown Wars: The Black Prince
summary: The War of Crowns rages on. Knights and brigands run rampant throughout the land, sowing destruction. From your castle base, rise to become the lord who leads the battle against the forces of evil in this turn-based tactics and strategy game.

name: Crypt of the Serpent King: Remastered - 4K Edition
Crazy Plane Landing
summary: Fly high and try to stick the landing. Will you survive or will you crash?

name: Crazy Traffic Racer
summary: Crazy Traffic Racer is a new endless arcade race with the ability to break, blow up and crash cars from traffic. Drive along a busy road, earn money, upgrade your car and buy new ones. Take a fresh look at endless racing!

name: Crystalize! 2: Quest for the Jewel Crown
Crystal Compulsion
summary: Crystal Compulsion is a fast, deep, and unique deckbuilding roguelike. Craft a killer deck by converting, devouring, or killing all that stand in your way. Find the synergies between the current 150+ cards, climb the 12 ascension levels, and battle the cute but deadly animal creatures.

name: Crash: Mind Over Mutant
summary: The Nintendo DS port of Crash: Mind Over Mutant.

name: Crash Twinsanity 3D
summary: Crash Twinsanity 3D, not to be confused with another mobile Crash game, Crash Twinsanity, features traditional Crash gameplay as players run through levels collecting Wumpa fruit, breaking crates and dodging bottomless pits in order to save the world from the Evil Twins. Levels can be played as standard or in time-trial mode, where they are timed and given a rank depending on how quickly they completed the level. Unlike the console game and previous mobile game, Crash does not team up with Cortex in this game.

name: Crash Twinsanity
summary: Crash Twinsanity is a mobile game based on the console game of the same name. The game shares the same story of the console version, with Crash and Dr Neo Cortex teaming up to save the world from the Evil Twins. The gameplay is centred around the sections of the original game where Crash has to protect Cortex from hazards by jumping on switches before Cortex collides with the hazard. The game includes 6 levels.

name: Crash of the Titans
summary: Crash of the Titans is a 2D side-scroller beat 'em up game released on October 2007 and developed by DeValley. It is one of the three portable versions of Crash of the Titans, along with the Nintendo DS and Game Boy Advance versions.

name: Crash & Spyro Superpack I Crash Bandicoot: The Huge Adventure / Spyro: Season of Ice
Crash Nitro Kart
summary: The GBA port of Crash Nitro Kart.

name: Crash Nitro Kart
summary: Crash Nitro Kart is a mobile phone game released on the 20th of September 2004. It was developed by IPlay.

name: Crash Bandicoot Party Games
summary: Crash Bandicoot Party Games is a mobile game that was released in January 2007, based on Crash Boom Bang!. It is made up of 12 mini-games.

name: Crash Bandicoot
summary: Crash Bandicoot is a licensed platform game developed and published by Tiger Electronics and published by Universal Interactive in North America, released on a handheld dedicated console in 1998. It is the third game released in the Crash Bandicoot series overall, the first to be released on a handheld console, and the first to feature a multiplayer option. Despite bearing the same name, the game is neither an adaptation nor port of the 1996 Crash Bandicoot game, featuring a distinct storyline and a set of levels of its own.

name: C.R.U.D.D.Y.
summary:
You are Max, a sentry aboard The Coriolis who has been stationed on the outskirts of Galaxy B16X. You review files every day cycle with the help of your Artificial Intelligence bot C.R.U.D.D.Y to ensure the colonization of planet PK-Centauri goes smoothly.

There shouldn't be anyone within range to contact you, or have a reason to contact you. But one day it happens anyway.

name: Crazy Frog Racer: Christmas Edition
summary: Crazy Frog Racer: Christmas Edition is a mobile installment in the Crazy Frog Racer series themed around Christmas

name: CRT7
summary: CRT7 is an experimental music-puzzle game. Place pentominoes, play music, generate power, repeat. The more you play, the more strange devices you unlock, allowing you to solve escape-room style puzzles to explore further. What secrets are hiding in the dark?

name: Creepy Tale 3: Ingrid Penance
summary: As punishment for her transgressions, Ingrid is sent to hell. As she struggles through the darkness that hungers to consume her heart, she makes her way toward redemption. Her fate is in your hands.

name: Crustacean Nations
summary: Crustacean Nations is a real-time strategy game about total crab warfare. Build a sprawling sand castle and amass huge armies to dominate the beach and become the one true crustacean nation!

name: Crete
summary: Fight against the Ancestors and other biopunk creatures. Use their DNA to build your procedural weapons, find a friend and combine your skills to be even more powerful. The further you go, the better rewards you will get for the next run. It is up to you to reveal what is up there in the north.

name: Crane Logistics Simulator
summary: Crane Logistics Simulator, Grow your logistics network!

name: Creative Console
summary: This is a game console that creates games. Players have the ability to change the rules and levels of the game. First person, third person, chest, football, deadly pendulum... This is a game where every player can create unique levels and gameplay.

name: Crow's Cry
summary: A puzzle horror game where you can grab ANY object to solve puzzles! Explore and find secrets to expose the truth. Hide from, run from, & outsmart monsters that stands in your way!

name: Cracking the Cryptic
summary: Curated Sudoku puzzles from YouTube's most popular Sudoku channel, Cracking the Cryptic!

name: Crystal Tales Tactics: Echoes of the Libertas War
summary: Inspired by Fire Emblem and Final Fantasy Tactics but with NO GENDER RELATIONSHIP RULES, Save the world from an evil emperor Using the power of six elements while Dating whoever you want.

name: Cruxade
summary: Inspired by Pen and Paper and Souls-Like combat. Cruxade is a anime-styled Fantasy Action Adventure Role-Playing Game, with the ability to choose between a solo or multiplayer experience.

name: Cranner

name: Crypt of the NecroDancer: Synchrony
summary: Crypt of the NecroDancer: Synchrony is a massive new content pack for Crypt of the NecroDancer! It adds online multiplayer (co-op and vs), three new characters, full mod support (and built-in mod portal), new items, enemies, traps, and more!

name: Crash & Bump
summary: Crash & Bump is an online multiplayer shooter... mixed with obstacle courses! Eliminate your opponents while dodging the obstacles and take advantage of the power-ups to get the victory.

name: Cronous Online
summary: Cronous Online is a game that grows by competing or collaborating with numerous users. Grow by supplying various items and record your history against the demons that threaten the Cronous continent.

name: Cryptmaster
summary: Say anything in this bizarre dungeon adventure where words control everything. Fill in the blanks with text or voice to uncover lost abilities, solve strange quests, and play unexpected mini-games. Use your words to conquer the crypt and unleash a whole new kind of "spell casting!"

name: Crabada
summary: Crabada is an idle game available on most native platforms. Earn in-game rewards in exciting, idle gameplay as you send your Crabada NFTs to Battle for riches and glory!

name: Crossroads of Life
summary: Crossroads of Life - a game in which you have to fight off waves of enemies while protecting your life.

name: Crazy Wheel Rider HD
summary: Go for a ride with Crazy Wheel Rider HD and be the fastest squirrel on earth.

name: Cross Logic
summary: Cross Logic is a fun and original logic puzzle game in which players will have to solve different riddles and, to do so, we will have to use our own logic and the game's mechanics, which has a series of elements in a list of cross options.

name: Criminal Expert
summary: As a police investigator, you take on the task of explaining this mysterious event. Who is this person and what was she doing there? Will the circumstances of this case be easy to explain or is there something deeper going on in the story?

name: Createscape Town Nyanzou & Kumakichi: Escape Game
summary: Nyanzou is always making a ruckus. But it looks like heâ€™s quietly drawing today for a change. Heâ€™s writing down all kinds of things heâ€™s always dreamed of like, â€œ3 Meals, Nap Time, Snacks Includedâ€ and â€œNo Homeworkâ€. What in the world is he up to?

name: CrashMetal: Drift Racing Car Driving Simulator
summary: Welcome to the definitive car racing experience in cyberpunk 2077 style or need for speed (nfs) like old times far from 2022 games. Drive sports car, join the top street racing camp!

name: Crocodingus in Cube Island
summary:
Crocodingus the crocodile is happily playing video games when he carelessly drops his drink onto his console's outlet. Unfortunately, the drink in the receptacle creates an electromagnetic distortion, and Crocodingus got snatched into the vortex and sent to the pixel world. In this game, you play as the crocodile called Crocodingus in a cubic environement and you must collect all the bananas from each levels in order to advance.

Crocodingus In Cube Island is a full 3D game that you can play on your Nintendo DS. You can move the crocodile with the stylus and strike monkeys with its tail!
You must help Crocodingus to finish the game.

name: Crisp's Charging Challenge
summary: Play as our hero, Crisp, and navigate the puzzles by using the elements of electricity, ice, and fire. Ascend the castle and complete the challenge! OR Kick back and enjoy some fishing, who knows what's in those waters! Go beyond the challenge, create your own, or try challenges from others!

name: Cross Summoner: R
summary: A mobile RPG.

name: Cross the Hell Master
summary: "Cross the Hell Master" is a 2D cartoon style platform jumping game.

name: Cracked
summary: Cracked is an unforgiving 2D platforming game, where players have to overcome increasingly difficult levels, in varying environments.

name: Crime O'Clock
summary: Crime O'Clock is an investigation and time exploration game with a deep storyline. Investigate cases through time and evolving maps by unveiling a multi-eras linked story. Will you be observant enough to solve the mysteries? Crime waits for no man!

name: CrazySonic
summary: CrazySonic is a joke hack of Sonic the Hedgehog by Ralakimus. This project was first released as a demo build in July of 2015 and was later released in October for SHC 2015. This hack is a mixture of CrazyBus' gameplay and music and Sonic 1's gameplay, plus other additions. It was designed to be as obnoxious as possible to evoke negative reactions from players. Despite this, it is generally considered to be amusing by players, especially first time players.

name: Crescent Bloom
summary: A story-rich 2D adventure game that follows Ignis's perilous journey as she looks for her missing brother. Cast powerful spells, solve tricky puzzles and work alongside the Constantin Empire to unravel the mystery behind the sudden attack of the lizard-plant invaders: the Trians.

name: Crossroad of Worlds: 100 Doors - Collector's Edition
summary: What lies behind closed doors? What secrets lurk inside the rooms? Find the answers to these questions and make your escape! Are you ready to take up the challenge?

name: Crescent Cauldron Cafe
summary: Crescent Cauldron CafÃ© is a casual co-op management game where you play as two sisters running their family's cafÃ©. Both sisters are witches of a different variety and use their abilities for different roles. Manage a storefront, fly on a broom to deliver orders!

name: Crash Override
summary: Power up your arsenal in this cyber roguelite action shooter. Race against time - surf the cybernet - stop the total infection of your mainframe by a malicious virus. Rezz, power up, collect your arsenal, battle hordes of glitches - become overpowered - stop the virus!

name: Crusader Kings III: Friends & Foes
summary: Beware, ruler - tread carefully with those you call friend or enemy; they are two sides of the same coin. Your relationships matter more than ever, and with Crusader Kings III: Friends & Foes, witness those closest to you come alive in the most intimate detail.

name: Cryaxion
summary:
The year is 2051. Multiple large corporations are engaged in mining operations in the Belt. The need for good pilots and new ships is high. Cryaxion Corporation develops experimental new ships designed for the Belt and train pilots for their ships. Having signed up for the pilot training program at Cryaxion, you are now stationed there until you reach the advanced pilot ranks. You are advised to achieve as well as you can; your future will depend on it.

You can optionally also use the Virtual Reality (VR) Mode to use the game with Google Cardboard or Google Daydream.

Engage in hours of sci-fi adventure experiences with 50 challenging missions, trading at space stations, running cargo and trekking the belt.

name: Craftbound
summary: Craftbound is an MMORPG idle/incremental game with a clean interface and charming pixel art. Featuring many skills, combined with a player based economy, and in-depth mechanics.

name: Crocodracula: The Beginning
summary: The first Taleframe game based on the 90s children's horror soap opera.

name: CrazyCaps
summary: Free ! Free ! Free ! UnLock All Difficulty And Puzzle Round!

name: Crafty Survivors
summary: All heroes got corrupted! Unlock a diverse cast of crafty professionals, use their unique skills, create your own builds and defend your home by eliminating hordes of monsters. Gather materials, rebuild your village and craft your way to the origin of this malignous curse!

name: Crimerunner
summary: From an errand boy to the big shot â€“ is this possible? Start as a teenage criminal doing menial tasks, skill up, earn respect and make connections. Prove your worth and climb to the topâ€¦ Parkour style!

name: Creatures of War
summary: Embark on a survival horror saga set in a treacherous world ruled by primal terrors. Scour for invaluable treasures, fortify your arsenal to combat evolving threats, and unravel the chilling mystery shrouding Delta squad's fate. Can you survive amidst the lurking jaws of the ancient predators?

name: Crocodile Transformator
summary: Crocodile Transformator is an action game where your mission is to defend your city by destroying the enemies.Now is your time to help civilization to live in peace.

name: Cryogenesis
summary: An exploration, mystery and science fiction game in which you must discover who you are and why you woke up in the future where the human race has apparently become extinct. Solve puzzles, use firearms and properly manage your inventory for your survival.

name: Crash Effects Inc.
summary: Crash Effects Inc. a pioneering vehicle research and development center needs your help! Take the seat of a crash test engineer & build your own vehicle creations. Stage accidents to push your design to its limits! Watch as the carnage unfolds in a realistic crash test simulation you control!

name: Cross the Ages: Trading Card Game
summary:
Cross the Ages: TCG is a fast competitive trading card NFT game where players compete in strategic duels to capture more space than their opponent on the game board.

The game is designed in a â€œblitzâ€ format. Each player only has five minutes to play their turns. Making Cross The Ages an addictive experience in which players have to both â€œPlay Fastâ€ and â€œPlay Smartâ€ in order to win.

Players collect cards from a collection of +350 characters through chest rewards, daily quests, special events like e-sports competitions. These cards can be upgraded and merged into more powerful versions: alternative and alternative combo cards.

In addition, players can reach for web3 features like the Immutable X marketplace to trade their assets freely: buy and sell cards or even borrow and lend them to other players. They can hold CTA tokens to access additional rewards. By completing the entire collection of CTA, they will also be able to bring their digital cards to physical, by turning their NFT into NFC: Nun-Fungible Cards.

name: Crow Quest
summary: Eat, swear & try to take over the neighbourhood.

name: Cr1me Fr0g
summary: The opposite of Frog Detective.

name: Crispy Cheese
summary: Take control of a slime and compete against your friends to see who will eat the last cheese! Catch the crispy cheese by attacking with your tongue.

name: Crunch Time!
summary: Crunch Time! is a fresh and innovative card game with a touch of humour, based on videogame development, in which you'll have to manage your own company, and complete the best and biggest projects before your opponent.

name: CryptoClickers
summary: CryptoClickers is a complex Incremental Game revolved around Cryptocurrencies that's full of unique game modes, upgrades, challenges, events, and a double layer prestige system!

name: Crowd Evolution!
summary: In Crowd Evolution, you can grow and evolve your crowd and beat the enemies!

name: Create
summary: Create is a Minecraft mod that offers a variety of tools and blocks for building, decoration, and aesthetic automation. The added elements of tech are designed to leave as many design choices to the player as possible.

name: Crazy Climber
summary: Is a port for Handheld LCD devices.

name: Crime Moto Racer
summary: Crime Moto Racer is a browser-based 3D motorcycle racing game developed by Berezka. You weave through heavy traffic at high speed, earn cash to unlock faster bikes, and push for high scores in endless runs with switchable camera views

name: Crypt
summary: This is not a video game. This is a psychological torture device. Do not attempt to play this game. You won't have an enjoyable experience. And that's intentional.

name: Crash + Spyro Triple Play Bundle
summary:
Get seven full games in one amazing package with the Crash + Spyro Triple Play Bundle.

Includes:

- Crash Bandicoot N. Sane Trilogy
- Spyro Reignited Trilogy
- Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled*

name: Cryohazard
summary: Inspired by classic point and click games, Choose Your Own Adventure books, and B-grade horror films, Cryohazard is a short story of waking from cryogenic sleep in a dilapidated research facility full of mystery, mayhem, and monstrous mutants. Multiple endings and numerous gruesome deaths are abound in this game designed for the original Game Boy, compatible with emulators and real hardware.

name: Crazy Edition of Stunts
summary: Have you ever imagined what it's like to do all kinds of acrobatics with a car at heights like above the clouds?

name: Crimson Phoenix Rise
summary: The game is a story-driven 2D platformer, with some Metroidvania aspects, where the player determines the outcome of the game based upon their â€œMoralityâ€ score, which itself is based upon the player's decision to kill in the game.

name: Cruise Control Mode On!
summary: This is about adrenaline.

name: Crush Penguin
summary: Crush Penguin is a visual novel where you must romance one of four penguins, each with their own personalities and ambitions. To offer you a unique experience the entire game is hand drawn from scratch.

name: Crazy Click Thursday
summary: Crazy use your fingers to have all kinds of crazy interactions with beautiful girls~

name: CrimeStory: In the restaurant
summary: All the restaurants we go to. Quiet music, friendly atmosphere, delicious food. But the inner life of the restaurant is hidden from prying eyes. What's going on in the kitchen? Whether employees are satisfied with the chief? Robbed chief. Who is the culprit? Read it.

name: Crossy Animals Road

Tasty Candy that will leave you hungry for more and hours of fun!
How FAR can the deer go? Why did the DEER cross the road? Discover how many roads and logs can the deer, frog and more animal characters can cross!
Don't let the cars and trains hit you!

Become a doctor today! Diagnose and treat your patients injuries & ailments, no matter how crazy they are!
Each of your patients have specific injuries or illnesses. They need your help straightaway. Its up to you to locate any boo booâ€™s and help them get better. Use the stethoscope, syringe, x-ray machine and many other crazy medical tools to diagnose whats wrong with each silly character.
Once youâ€™ve treated all the different injuries for one patient, make sure you perform all the standard check-ups before moving on the your next patient!
What are you waiting for, start treating your disgruntled patients today!

name: Crisis Core: Final Fantasy VII: Reunion - Digital Deluxe Edition
summary: In addition to the game, you will also receive a mini soundtrack showcasing the gameâ€™s powerful music and an art book filled with gorgeous illustrations.

name: Cross the Log Bridge
summary: You control a character on a bicycle. and ride up, down, and jump through a three-dimensional course. and jump through three-dimensional courses. There are more than 30 different courses!

name: Crash Bandicoot N. Sane Trilogy: Bonus Edition
summary: A combined physical release of the N. Sane Trilogy alongside its two new DLC levels.

name: Crystal Defender
summary: This is Crystal Defender, there are dangers at every turn. You, as an engineer, need to fight off waves of opponents who want to destroy the world crystals that help you survive.

In Operation Spectre, join the Black List Mercenaries on a mission to infiltrate a moving cargo train and extract dangerous intel before it reaches the Global Risk base. New tools are now at your disposal including the legendary Spectre Suit, a tactical game-changer.

summary: Azura, the guardian goddess of the Emerald Grove is having a bad day. Her magical crystals have been stolen by the forces of evil! Help Azura get the crystals back and defeat the demon hordes! Crystal Goddess is an action adventure where you step into thâ€¦

name: Crypto Spells

name: Crescent Prism
summary: Crescent Prism is a story-driven RPG that follows the story of Lunita, a young girl from the bustling hamlet of Merryday Village.

name: Crack Life

name: Crimson Snow

In Crypto-Shots you can collect weapon parts, blend them into cool NFTs and use them to take down enemies across different planets. Or, if you like adrenaline, even challenge your friends in the arenas.

Cryogenics is a four-level PWAD for boom-compatible source ports designed by bemused and released in December, 2017. All four levels are designed around the slaughter map trope; extremely detailed geometry, massive architecture and high density of enemies are landmarks of the mapset. Cryogenics is designed for pistol start. It includes new textures and music.

Cryogenics was named as a runner-up during the Cacowards 2018.

name: Creepy Cooking and Dungeon Dinner Mysterious Labyrinth
Crash Bandicoot Psyched Out

This time the evil N.Trance has brainwashed the entire planet and brought his army of interdimensional aliens to wreak havoc across the globe. Only Crash and his nemesis Dr. Neo Cortex are spared from being N.Trance's slaves, and must once again team up to put an end to his twisted reign! Play as both characters as you travel the planet and quite literally pick the brains of your favorite characters from the crash-verse! Are you ready to get psyched?

Crash Bandicoot is back in a brand new fan game adventure! The evil Uka Uka and Neo Cortex have unleashed the powers of nature once again to wreak havoc on the planet. Crash must stop the evil duo at all costs before Uka Uka's plans of a new evil empire are realized.

Run, jump, spin, slide and slam your way through the colorful world of Crash, fight powerful bosses, find secret areas, discover treasure, and defeat the forces of evil!

name: Cranberry Dream

name: Crash Nitro Kart
summary: The N-Gage port of the titular home console game.

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D. - Dieselpunk

A new champion joins the game â€” the jack-of-all-trades Friedrich Diesel. His passion for engineering and everything connected with it has been fanatical since childhood, preferring machinery construction to communicating with people.

Diesel managed to learn the â€œWeird Scienceâ€ ability and can create different mechanisms: a buggy, a helicopter, a spy camera, a protective wall. No laws of physics, and certainly not morality, can stop the genius of engineering on his way to victory.

name: Crisis Brigade 2: Reloaded
summary:
The streets are being overrun...

You have been handpicked as one of the elite few to go on high-risk missions and save the city. You're authorized to take down the enemy at any means possible.

On your six! Take cover!

Crisis Brigade 2 reloaded is about covering, pointing and shooting, fast-paced pure action. Intense shootouts, powerful weapons, challenging levels, fierce enemies... Like the 90's classic arcade machines, but with the immersion that Virtual Reality is capable of.

Chapter 1 to 4 take place in the mall and the streets, our heroes need to save the hostages and defeat the robbers of the Y-Reagent.

name: CRAP

name: Crash Mole
summary: Crash Mole is a retro arcade game for Playdate!

name: Crordle
summary: A Wordle clone for Playdate

name: Cryptobots
summary:
Cryptobots was the first play to earn game of its type in 2017, and weâ€™ve been successfully operating it ever since. To create an even more engaging and deep gaming experience we are planning a major update to Cryptobots.
In Cryptobots you will be able to sign on and acquire rent bots without overcoming any significant financial barrier. Players can also join a built-in scholarship for free. On the other end, it increases the demand for NFTs in-game.

name: Creatures of the Deep

Disturbing news is coming from all over the world about mysterious monsters from the deep.
You need to reach out to the local people and investigate. You don't have much time!
Join Anglers across the globe and travel through the world's most exotic fishing locations, cast a fishing line and catch record fish, sea creatures, underwater treasures and even some monsters.

name: Crazy Frog's Dancing

name: Creepy Forest

name: Crane Game Simulator

On this fun and educational journey, your preschooler will complete a series of exciting mini-games, helping them learn about animal body parts and sounds while developing their observation skills.

name: Crypto Royale

No downloads. No signups. Get into a game in 30 seconds and win! The game is purposefully designed to be simple to play yet difficult to master. Every day 1000+ players congregate on the battlefield as they fight to see who can survive and claim the gameâ€™s HRC-20 token â€“ ROY.

name: Crossroads: Escaping the Dark - Collector's Edition

name: Crumb Circuit Simulator
summary: Powerful Realtime 3D Electronic Circuit Simulator

name: Crispy Puppy
summary: Crispy Puppy is a horror game about a very old creepypasta.

Pick your favorite hero, equip with weapons, magic potions, legendary items and explore the hidden secrets of the creepy dungeons. Battle with the infamous classic terror monsters: Dracula, Frankenstein, Werewolf, the Mummy, and the Fish man, kill hordes of Zombies and fight with the mighty elemental creatures of Fire, Water, Wind, & Earth. Collect tons of gold, gems, loot & and discover hidden rare items.

name: Cribbage Live
summary:
Play cribbage and chat online with real players - hundreds of players from all over the world at all hours!
High quality and easy-to-use cribbage board, cards and fast play.
Cribbage Live is a social gaming platform where cribbage players from all corners of the planet come together to play this popular board game.
Cribbage Live features one-on-one cribbage games, multiplayer cribbage tournaments and multiple game variations.
Cribbage Live supports tournaments from both GameColony.com and cribbage.org ACC (American Cribbage Congress)
If you had an internet disconnection, Cribbage Live will reconnect you. Cribbage Live will play fine with either WIFI or 3G connection.
Six Card Cribbage is a two-player game of skill that uses a standard 52 card pack. The goal is to be the first to score 121 points over several deals. Points are scored for card combinations that occur during the play or in a player's hand or in the crib -- the cards discarded before the play.
Five Card Cribbage variation is an older traditional version that is still popular in England. 5 card Cribbage differs from the more modern 6 card cribbage by the number of cards in hand (initially 5) and by the score to play - usually it is played to 61 points.
Paul Rice of Wells, ME who plays in US national cribbage tournaments says that in cribbage "75 percent or more" depends on the skill of the player. Per Paul Rice: "in cribbage, every card you play and every card your opponent plays, you're trying to throw a curve ball in there"... "you can be dealt a gosh-awful hand and if you play it right, you can advance up the board."
Cribbage Live uses a fast cribbage central server supporting different cribbage clients in addition to iOS-based cribbage client.

I will make it out of the office on time, I wont be late for my date, no matter what!
My plan is to ride on my office chair, so that i can slide through the office corridors at high speed. But who knows what my crazy boss will do to try and stop me? Luckily, some of my colleagues are on my side, they have placed some very useful gadgets on my escape path, and that's just gonna make my escape so much easier. The better upgrades of the gadgets will no doubt be at a higher prices. name: CrimeTrip

CrimeTrip is a true crime adventure game in augmented reality from Prologue XR studio.
The objective of the game is to solve unsolved cold cases by exploring and investigating the crime scenes in augmented reality. The game features 6 real-life crimes, all of which are based on clever and notorious cases from the 70s and 80s. Players will have to analyze evidence and clues to solve the crimes, and as they progress, the game becomes more immersive and surreal, with captivating content and an atmospheric police station.
Take on the role of a True Crime fan in charge of investigating 6 mind-blowing true crimes, from the heist of the century to TV bombs, mafia vendetta, drug smuggling, gangster assassination, and even a fake currency exchange office run by the feds.
Discover unresolved true-crime cold-case in crime scenes and a police station that only becomes more and more surreal as the story progresses.
Use an array of investigative tools to elaborate your theories on unresolved true-crime cold cases and share them with fellow crime crazies.
But beware of what you may find... Maybe this is not a game, but rather a gateway into a real-life rabbit hole.

name: Crusader Kings III: Tours and Tournaments
summary:
Life is a journey of chivalric adventure, so why donâ€™t you embrace yours, ruler? Create your very own epic story with the major expansion, Crusader Kings III: Tours & Tournaments. Be awed by the sights and events that await you, from bold, mock combat in the jousting area to adventuring perilous wilds with your royal entourage.

Let wanderlust overtake your rulerâ€™s desires during a monumental Tour, and seek out your subjects in a realm that can be both dangerous and richly entertaining. Prove yourself in one of the many forms of gallant Tournaments, either abroad or at home, or use the festivities to murder a quarrelsome rival. Be the host of new Grand Activities, be it grand weddings or stirring falconry hunts. But beware! Many celebrations are the perfect cover for the perfect scheme against foesâ€¦ or family.

Be the host of new Grand Activities, be it grand weddings or stirring falconry hunts. But beware! Many celebrations are the perfect cover for the perfect scheme against foesâ€¦ or family.

name: Crossy Traffic: Road Rider
summary: How far can you drive?

name: Cricket Cup
summary: The nostalgic cricket game that used to come pre-installed on Nokia legacy phones.

name: Crusader Kings III: Chapter I
summary:
Complete your Crusader Kings III grand strategy experience with Crusader Kings III: Chapter I, which includes the gameâ€™s first major expansion and two unique flavor packs.

Crusader Kings: Royal Court (expansion)
Crusader Kings: Fate of Iberia (pack)
Crusader Kings: Northern Lords (pack)

The Crusader Kings III: Expansion Pass also gifts the Fashion of the Abbasid Court cosmetic pack.

name: Crossly
summary: Challenge your friends in the fun strategic word game that combines classic crosswords with the spirit of friendly competition! In Crossly, two players race to fill the board, earning one point per letter and stealing points from their opponents along the way.

name: Cross Hermit: Welcome to the Farthest
Crazy Seahorses
summary:
Soak up the tropical atmosphere in Crazy Seahorses - addictive, action-packed fun in a living, breathing cartoon!
Featuring colourful, funny characters and some freaky fish, race to save the cute sea unicorn from the mischievous sea monkey pirates! Embark on a chaotic chase to catch the monkey pirate ship. Smash, crash and dash through coconut shacks and jump over obstacles as the seahorses open lucky treasure chests and gain super powers inflating them into bouncy balloons, and a jetpack to catch-up with those dastardly monkeys!

name: Creepy Nights at Freddy's
summary:
Hello? Ummm, you're a night guard at Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria? The animatronics can become unstable...
...but nevermind! Just stay away from them, okey? Bye.

name: Crop Rotation
summary: Crop Rotation is a farming-theme card drafting game. Cards are played automatically so you can focus on the deck building and building synergies.

name: Cross or Crash
summary:
A unique puzzle game never seen before!
Get the exact timing on the congested road so that characters do not crash with each other and fire!

name: Crazy Open Car
summary:
The Crazy Open Car store is here!
Ordinary cars? Luxury cars? Who cares, let's turn them into open cars!
Make the drivers happy with their new open cars!

name: Croquet Clash
summary: Play explosive real-time multiplayer croquet right from your phone!

name: Crazy Pizza Boy
summary:
Crazy Pizza Boy is a open world endless pizza delivery game , which uses spectacular graphics and amazing audio effects to give breath taking game play experience.
Crazy Pizza Boy is a fast paced action / racing game in which you will have to race against time to deliver pizzas, make your way through city traffic as your tires burn against the asphalt. The game also features mind blowing audio - visual effects that improve the game play beyond the ordinary. We don't believe in restricting you to limited environment , hence the city is open for you !! You can make your own path towards your goal. The game also features 3 different controllers , so play comfortably according to you ! There are 3 power ups available to help you in your mission to serve delicious pizzas to everyone.

name: Crashletics
summary: Unbuckle your seatbelt, smash through the window and compete in a series of track and field events using momentum and gravity to travel the furthest, highest and quickest. Upgrade your skills by your beating personal best and aim for the world record.

name: Cricket League
summary: Bat, bowl and field your way to the top of the league in this fast, fun, exciting and authentic real-time multiplayer Cricket game. Play quick two over matches against your friends or players around the world in just a few minutes! Ready..Set..Start your own Cricket saga now!

name: Crossroads: Escaping the Dark
summary: Can you guide a tormented gamer through a trio of terrifying challenges?

name: Criminals Within
summary: Embark on an epic journey through a medieval fantasy land inhabited by powerful, de-evolved dragons. Join forces with a friend in this asymmetric co-op multiplayer adventure. Engage in skill-based combat, take on epic boss battles, solve cooperative puzzles and enjoy lighthearted comedy.

name: Crime Busters: Strike Area
summary: A single-player top down game that fights against terrorists around the world! Do a battle and play with each other for up to maximum 2 people!

name: Crazy One
summary: Play with friends and share the fun with family. Challenge real players online or computer players in real time. Compete against top players worldwide. Chat with other players using emoji and send each other gifts.

name: Crazy Prisoner
summary: Crazy Prisoner - is a simple 2D horror game with elements of survival, in which you will play as an escaped prisoner named Joel.

name: Crosswalks
summary: Crosswalks in a visual novel that tells different stories when you switch among perspectives. In 2018, an explainable portal appeared under the city of Sanghville, linking two parallel universe together. On one side there are dozens of unsolvable crimes, while the other side was always peaceful...

name: Crystal Blast VR
summary: Crystal Blast is a single-player action-adventure game that offers a visually mysterious VR experience, created with Unreal Engine 5. Our goal is to survive in this mysterious cave and witness the remnants of past events while progressing towards the exit.

name: Crank! Push! Tilt!
summary: An arcade-style dexterity game for the Playdate

name: Cricket 24
summary: Cricket 24 is the culmination of a decade of Cricket video game development and includes teams from every corner of the globe.

name: Crusader Kings III: Legacy of Persia
summary: Legacy of Persia lets you relive the dramatic struggle for survival and empire in the lands between the Euphrates and the Indus. This Flavor Pack introduces new systems for Clan government rulers, and expands on the Islamic and Zoroastrian religions dominant in the region at the time.

name: Cropple
summary: Plant carrots, lettuce, eggplants, onions, and melons in this colorful puzzle game! Line up your crops in vertical or horizontal rows to clear them! When all of your crops are harvested and your weeds and gophers are gone, you've won!

name: Crisis Survivor
summary: Crisis Survivor is a First Person Shooter with roguelite mechanics, try to survive waves of enemies by improving your weapons and abilities.

name: Crashy Laps
summary:
Crashy Laps is an arcade racing game, with all the track visible on the screen, designed for playing in Single Player and Local Multiplayer modes. Based on classic games, there are isometric and top-down selectable camera views.

Crashy Laps is a game to enjoy driving and overtaking aggressively where collisions and foul play are common, with a maximum of 4 Players. 20 little and funny tracks are waiting for you. In Single Player mode, you can also compete to reach the Best Time in the Leaderboard of each track.

name: Cryptid Kitchen
summary: What is a good life? What makes life fulfilling? Meaningful? Explore these questions in a cozy first-person game on an island of mythical animals. Explore, collect ingredients and recipes, and help your friends with issues in their lives. Learn what researchers have discovered about flourishing.

name: Crescent Arcania
summary: Enter the world of Crescent Arcania, a story-driven RPG that evokes the golden era. Follow Reo Rivios, a Captain in the Guard as he exposes a conspiracy to revive an ancient evil. Traverse the enchanting world of Erazea, and lose yourself in the charming pixel graphics and mesmerizing soundtrack.

name: Crossing Borders
summary: Experience the emotional journey of Crossing Borders, a first person narrative-driven game that takes you on a perilous journey to cross a dangerous border. Immerse yourself in a world filled with stunning landscapes and discover the story of a young person's determination to cross the border.

name: Crux
summary: Crux is a fast-paced single-player arena shooter roguelike, where you face waves of enemies, unique bossfights and earn powerful magic abilities across 13 arenas. Master your fluid movement, trusty arsenal and the power of the blood gods to reach the top of the CRUX Champions Leaderboard!

name: Crisis Island
summary: Crisis Island is a fast paced, top down, pixel art, twin-stick shooter that takes inspiration from Time Crisis, Shock Troopers, and 80s action movies!

name: Crab God
summary: Crab God is an atmospheric underwater god game where you must restore the environment to sustain your children. Build beautiful coral reefs, grow your crabby religion, and explore a hostile yet beautiful ocean world. Can you protect your children and raise the next generation of ocean guardians?

name: Crabling
summary: Brutally hard rage-platformer about a young crab on its revenge trip to the moon. Master your Crabling Hook and swing from rock bottom to the places where no crab has ever been.

name: Critical Bypass
summary: Critical Bypass is the seventh game of NES version of Action 52.

name: Cry Baby
summary: A game featured in Action 52. Try to get cry baby back to his crib, but be careful to avoid open electric sockets, poisons, and fire in the stove. There are things to help along the way such as cookies, lollipops, candy bars and pacifiers. If the baby meets any bad guys trying to kidnap him, he squeezes the bottle and shoots them.

name: Crazy Shuffle
summary: A game featured in Action 52. Educational puzzle game. Picture matching with many levels games and options. Tests memory and concentration skills.

name: Crash Bandicoot
summary:
Crash Bandicoot is a licensed platform game developed and published by Tiger Electronics and published by Universal Interactive in North America, released on a handheld dedicated console in 1998. Is the cheap LCD version of Crash Bandicoot (99X).

According to George Fergan, one of the developers of Crash Bandicoot (LCD Tiger game) and Crash (99X), their small team was divided: some people wanted to make Mr. Crumb, while others wanted to make Mr. Crool. The solution came when the team decided to use both characters for two different versions of the game. Mr. Crumb would appear as the main villain in the most powerful version, Tiger 99x. While Mr. Crool would appear as the main villain in the cheap LCD version.

name: Crash Bandicoot: Back In Time
summary: A love letter to Crash Bandicoot in the form of a game that features 5 traditional levels, 5 flashback tape levels, time trials and the Crash Creator: an awesome level creator.

name: Cracks Where the Light Gets In
summary: A story-driven observational puzzler that requires logical deductions from limited perspectives. Peer through tiny gaps to glean clues about a family living in a one-room shack above an alpine valley. Can you piece together what led them there and shine a little hope on their fractured lives?

name: Crimson Moon
summary: When the mystery of the red moon is solved, the story takes off ...... A horror RPG in a strange school, where a high school boy tries to save his sister, but an unexpected truth confronts him...

name: Crying Pony
summary: Crying Pony is a 2D side-scrolling horror game where the protagonist, Michael, is hunted by the lurking evil in his nightmares. As the nightmare's corruption seeps into reality and even pulls Michael's daughter into its grasp, will he be able to lead them both to escape from the nightmare?

name: Crazy Road: Trouble Racer
summary:
Compete your ranking in real time through out the world!
Your car is broken. It moves/turns toward right direction unless you control.
Don't forget to repair your mini car! Collect repair tools before your car burned out!
Experience the sudden acceleration. :)

- 'Blocky' Hat

name: Crossbar Kevin
summary:
KevÂ­in is a young boy that enÂ­joys playÂ­ing footÂ­ball in the garden. He loves to score goals.
However, his fathÂ­er, Big Mick, feels that is not the best use of his time.
In orÂ­der to hone KevÂ­in's skills, dad only wants him to hit the cross bar. If you achieve this then he is happy. If you don't then he will be pour scorn on your soul!
Are you ready to imÂ­press dad?

name: Crash N Dash

And if regular monsters are too simple for your tastes, test your mettle against the epic bosses of the Underworld!

Will you be brave enough to saved your loved one, or will you be erased too?

name: Criminal Archives: Alphabetic Murders DLC
summary: Are the murders of three different people connected? Or are we dealing with three different incidents? Cunning and logic are your best weapons in solving this case!

Similar to previous racing games in the Crash Bandicoot series, players are able to choose from a variety of characters , ncluding both notable allies and enemies, along with several notable new characters. In addition, Crash Tag Team Racing introduces the ability to 'clash' with another racer, allowing the two to create a hybrid vehicle to cooperatively destroy their opponents.
'Clash' your car with an opponent's to make a super-car you both control!
Explore the world on foot, discovering new car upgrades and bonus tracks
Take on up to seven friends in Ad Hoc Mode

name: Crazy Bugs!
summary: You are in a maze in which you must get the eggs laid by the bugs, put them in a box, and exit the maze. Although you are faster than the bugs, they are intelligent and will trap you. The screens increase in difficulty. At the higher levels super bugs join the chase.

name: Crazy Basketball
summary: Crazy Basketball gives you a fun and different way to play basketball a using physics engine. Just fun and simple!

name: Crab Rhapsody: Vol.1
summary: Crabby will never cry, and Rock nâ€™ Roll will never die! Crab Rhapsody vol.1 is a musical action-roguelite with fast-paced combat and original soundtracks.

name: CraftCraft: Fantasy Merchant Simulator
summary: CraftCraft is an RPG merchant sim with actual. Crafting. Create a tiara for a mermaid princess or a sword made of dragon blood - you choose! Express your creativity in your very own cozy crafting studio and change the lives of quirky locals in the mysterious port town of Windspell.

name: Crux
summary: A puzzle game about rock climbing.

name: Crafty Lands
summary:
Create your own universe in blocks!
A game to explore different worlds and build anything you could ever imagine.

Along the way, you will meet characters, pets, construction tools, and you will even be able to fly between different scenarios!

name: Crawl On One
summary:
Put a block on the field. Match three blocks of the same color to remove.
Placed on the field the block. He move in directions until reaching an obstacle or a border. Match three or more block parts of the same color to remove them.

name: Cream Soda Club
summary: Cream Soda Club is a new word in the tycoon genre. Become a nightclub manager. Throw parties with Cream Soda. Decorate the dance floor, jazz up your club, unlock new tracks. Make yourself into the best event manager in the virtual world!

name: Crazy The Clown's Balloon Animal Massacre

name: Crazy Pingoin
summary: A Pengo clone.

name: Cross Impact

name: Crushing Depths
