name: Cryptis
summary:
Reawakened In Desolation...

Awaken amidst a desolate realm, your last memory being a life far removed from this nightmare. Embark on a journey of relentless violence, navigating through hordes of bloodthirsty undead. What sinister force has brought you to this place? Plunge into a tale shrouded in shadows and unveil the chilling truth.
Next-Gen Visuals Meet a Retro Aesthetic
Built in the mesmerizing Unreal Engine 5 and harnessing the cutting-edge capabilities of Nanite and Lumen, Cryptis immerses you in a haunting world where retro-inspired designs meet breathtakingly realistic lighting.
Dynamic and Diverse Gameplay
No two encounters are the same. Your journey will see you wielding an array of weapons, tools, and abilities that allow for varied approaches to confrontations, ensuring a fresh and thrilling experience with every battle.

Embrace the chaos, slaughter your bloodthirsty adversaries, and overcome the darkness. The very fabric of this realm quivers at your presence. Leave nothing left standing.

Welcome to Cryptis. Your nightmare has just begun...

name: Crossing Damaged Bridge

name: Crazy Rabbits

name: Crimen: Mercenary Tales
summary:
Raise yer glasses high, me hearties! Embark on a (bloody!) journey through eight swashbucklin' tales of grandeur, riches, and legendary feats!

Slash your way through eerie castles, ancient temples, forsaken shipwrecks, and other astonishing locations while wielding a variety of historically accurate weapons directly from the 17th-century.

Experience visually captivating comic book graphics, while being entertained by the mercenary humor of the tavernâ€™s patrons and their over-the-top achievements.

name: Crap Game Compilation 2
summary:
â€œCrappy games are better when they're all in one place.â€
A compilation of flash games by JonBro originally on Newgrounds

name: Croaked
summary: Help the undead frogs get to safety in this devastated world filled with treacherous lava pits and fire-breathing dragons.

name: Crash Cam
summary: Welcome to Hollywood! You're the hottest director in town!! So take your camera & your rockin' tag-along actor (Mr. A-List Anthony) through crazy film sets using simple 1 touch controls.

name: Crownless Abyss

name: Crackin' Smackin
summary: A chaotic stoneage arena brawler with destructible levels for up to 8 players. Customize your character and jump into action!

name: Creatures of Ravenwood
summary: Play as a hero fighting off enemies in the forest. Advance and learn new abilities to become stronger, but so will the enemies. Can you survive the mystical creatures of Ravenwood?

name: Crystal Tower Defense
summary: Stop an endless hoard of crystal-type enemies from reaching the portal to earth! You can build your own labyrinths, unlock new turrets, upgrade them, and also gather permanent bonuses.

name: Cricket Captain 2023
summary: Create your own cricket management legacy with Cricket Captain 2023. A new adaptive aggression system, designed for the modern game, puts you in control. Enhanced statistics include historical international player rankings (including all-rounders), real-world form data, and wicket keeper statistics.

name: Cruise Control
summary: Escape pursuing cops, helicopters, dinosaurs, giant eagles and vector polygons. With easy to pick up gameplay, three endless levels and rocking 80's inspired graphics and soundtrack! Grab powerups and coins to clear the road and unlock all the cars!

name: Crashlands 2

name: Cross Tails
summary: What will the tails witness after a crossing tale? A tactical RPG that portrays a fantasy story of a war between the canine and the feline tribes playable from both points of view.

name: Crash Team Rumble: Season 1
summary: Launch was the first season in Crash Team Rumble, it began on the 20th of June 2023 and ended on the 11th of September 2023.

name: Crazy Coin
summary: Ever thought about collecting money falling down the sky?! Drive yourself crazy as you are collecting gold coins and precious diamonds falling down the sky!

name: Crank Crawl
summary: Tactical dungeon puzzler

name: Crusader Kings II: Dynasty Starter Pack
summary: Newcomers to Crusader Kings II should not go to war empty handed. This starter pack gathers all the essential content players need in one handy bundle. With this pack, you will have access to every Christian, Pagan and Muslim realm in Europe and the Mediterranean, as well as a key role playing expansion that brings the intricacies of courtly drama alive on your screen.

name: Crusader Kings II: The Reaper's Due Content Pack
summary: The Crusader Kings II: The Reaper's Due Content Pack contains a Portrait Pack detailing the east African provinces and a Clothing Pack focusing on the late Byzantine Empire. In addition to these, there are fifteen new models for both Eastern and African councilors.

name: Crusader Kings II: Conclave Content Pack
summary:
The Conclave Content Pack pack includes:

- Corners of the Earth Building Pack: Pyramids of Giza, Petra, Hadrianâ€™s Wall, Charlemagneâ€™s Palace, Visby Ringmur, and the Agra Fort appear on the map
- Finno-Ugric Portrait Pack: New faces for this northern nation
- Indian Boats Unit Pack and Arabic Boats Unit Pack
- Mongol/Steppe Male and Female Councilor Model Pack and
- Western/Christian Female Councilor Model Pack
- New Event Pictures and one new loading screen: because we love our artists

name: Crusader Kings II: Europa Universalis IV Converter
Crusader Kings II: Ruler Designer
summary:
The Ruler Designer is a minor DLC for Crusader Kings II.

It allows the player to create a ruler with customized:
- coat of arms,
- dynasty name,
- attributes and traits
- marital status,
- appearance,
- religion
- culture

name: Crimsonland
summary: Top-down arena shooter video game with role-playing elements. It was developed by Finnish studio 10tons Entertainment and published by Reflexive Entertainment in 2003. In 2014 an enhanced re-release followed.

name: Creepless
summary: This is a multiplayer co-op horror game for 1-4 players. Collect items, repair car and get out! But monsters will bother you.

name: Cryptid
summary: Cryptid is a single-player horror fps game that chronicles an experienced hunter and a creature's encounter from the perspective of the Body Cam.

name: Cradles
summary: Cradles is the first time-lapsing metaverse game â€“ a living, breathing virtual world that continues to evolve and progress, simulating the laws of time and physics just like in real life.

name: Crocs World Construction Kit 2
summary: "Crocs World Construction Kit 2" is finally there! Play and create custom levels of Croc's World! You can publish them on the internet and other players can play them as well!

This bundle includes:

Ghost Files: The Face of Guilt - Lead a police investigation in the afterlife!

Ghost Files: Memory of a Crime - Stop a series of terrible crimes!

Crime Secrets: Crimson Lily - Stop the mysterious killer!

name: Crixus: Life of free Gladiator

summary:
Crazy Golf is a cool mini golf game , mix between Golf ball and arcade classic.
Drive the ball through goals in a fast paced physic based environment.

name: Cry Babies: Magic Tears - The Big Game

name: Creature in the Well: Collector's Edition
Crazy Brain

name: Crazy Trip
summary: Start your journey in the world of the coolest cars, dashing race and logical tasks. All the tasks are introduced in interactive form for better perception of children.

name: Crafting Block World: Magic Dungeons Adventure
summary: Endless sandbox adventure with blocks that will help you mine ores and craft your ideal world!

name: Crossroad of Worlds: Magic Stars - Collector's Edition
summary: Uncle Randall of his investigative agency and the Guardian of Worlds appeal for your support in another plea for help - someone has once again encroached on the stars of magical worlds!

name: Crystania Wars 2

name: Crowded Mysteries
summary: Uncover the truth, solve the crimes, and become the ultimate detective!

name: Crash Birds
summary: Touch and drag the sling control on the right to power. Aim with the accelerometer than release to fire the bird towards the windmill. Try to collect as many coins as you can and fly the bird safetly through the windmill.

name: Crazy Fishing Champion

The background story of the game is the Gulf's annual world fishing contest, in Hawaii, where the fishing enthusiasts around the world gather, in the hope of competing for the Champion title. In addition to the enjoyment of Bay Resort in Hawaii, the fishing champion could also enjoy a trip of Venice.

They control the left and right directions and perform jumping actions to avoid traps and continuously collect coins. Test your reflexes and skills, and aim for the highest score!

summary: An infinite math runner with varying speeds and difficulty to test your skills.

name: Crossroad of Worlds: Cursed Letters - Collector's Edition
summary: Step out into the light! What do you do when someone intentionally steers you astray? Detectives of the Worlds' Edge agency are ever watchful. You have another task to accomplish - find out who could benefit from the stolen stars not returning to their rightful owners?

name: Crossy Road+
summary: Hop back into the adventure with Crossy Road re-imagined for Apple Arcade. Collect all the characters & discover Crossy Road park.

name: Cranky Driller
summary: Mr. Driller just got Cranky!

name: Crash & Burn
summary: Crash & Burn is a standalone release of the Crash & Burn pinball table, originally included in the game Epic Pinball.

name: Creepy Tale: Some Other Place
summary: Creepy Tale is a mysterious quest rich in riddles and eerie atmosphere. An autumn morning promised a quiet fishing trip, but events took our hero to "some other place." Find the way home, uncover loads of secrets, and save everyone that you can.

name: Crown Gambit
summary: Choose the next sovereign in this dark fantasy game, featuring card battles and visual novel-like dialogues with multiple endings. Play your cards well, use your skills with care, and move carefully in these turn-based battles, where the weak rely on luck and the Heroes on their talent.

name: Crimson Spirit
summary: Your forest is corrupted, and you are the only one left to save it! Gather the remaining power of the forest and bring it back to the elder tree to revive it!

name: Crossroads Inn 2
summary: Dive into Crossroads Inn 2, a real-time tavern management sim set in the vibrant fantasy realm of Delcrys. Customize and manage your inn, create intricate menus, and lead your staff to fame. Craft your tale, shape your world!

name: Crash Course Builder
summary: Can you make it to the finish line? Crash your kart through impossible obstacle courses that will leave you wanting justâ€¦ oneâ€¦ moreâ€¦ go! 2ez? Pfft! Build your own course to share with other crash test dummies!

name: Crocogame
summary: Crocogame is a fast-paced roguelite game with intense moment-to-moment combat and flexible character customization. Use your resources efficiently to take on increasingly difficult threats. Great challenges also bring great rewards!

name: Crime Pays
summary: Crime Pays is a top-down 2D RPG crime simulator. Take on quests and dangerous encounters in a vast open city. Engage in diverse challenges, access a virtual world through an in-game browser, and master an intuitive inventory system. Arm yourself with a range of firearms and face formidable foes.

name: Crystalis Descendant
summary: Battle hordes of monsters and destroy their burrows in Crystalis Descendant - a fast-paced rogue-lite game. Create overpowering builds using a diverse cast of characters, weapons and abilities while you choose how to dominate the arena.

name: Crystal Void
summary: Crystal Void takes a new twist on puzzle classics like Tetris and Pipe Dream with rogue-lite elements and retro sci-fi aesthetics. Race against the spreading crystal infection in numerous challenges or play in relaxed endless modes at your own pace.

name: Crossroad OS
summary: CrossÊ€oad OS is a single-player adventure where you solve puzzles, meet strange creatures and explore a sacred operating system created as a junction between the human and spirit world.

name: Crowned
summary: Crowned is a fast-paced tactical role-playing game with a focus on environmental interactions and distinct unit skills over big numbers. Follow the bold warrior Balta as he gathers an eclectic bunch of allies to defeat all that stand in his way to claim the Crown of Lazur.

name: Creeper World IXE
summary: The Creeper always returns... but this time, we have the advantage! Explore new worlds where the creeper, sand, and particles all merge in a pixel level simulation pushing the bounds of real time strategy into new territory.

name: Crypts of Eternity
summary: A journey into a decrepit castle and crypts.

name: Crossroads: What Was Lost - Collector's Edition
summary: When Eden struggles to find direction after a devastating loss, Crossroads and bartender Mistress Eve appear just in the nick of time! Eden's love of fairy tales and legends makes these three spine-tingling fables the perfect way to set them on the right path. So, are you up to the challenge?

name: Crystal Journey
summary: Are you ready to embark on a journey of discovery and puzzles? Welcome to 'Crystal Journey', the ultimate 3D puzzle game that challenges you to navigate a world of secrets and obstacles. Play as Lum, the brave adventurer on a quest to find the purple crystal, a rare and powerful artifact that holds the key to unlocking untold wonders.

name: Cryptower
summary: Welcome to the world of Cryptower! In this captivating tower defense game, creativity and strategy intertwine. Develop your unique talents, enhance tower parameters, and unlock powerful abilities to defeat endless waves of enemies. Become a master of defense and protect your world

name: Crusaders Arena
summary: Embark on an epic journey in Crusaders Arena, a multiplayer battleground where you mold your hero with unique loadouts and abilities. Engage in intense game modes, or perfect your skills in the practice range. Lead your team to glory, and dominate the battlefield in this action-packed crusade!

name: Creature Rumble
summary: Creature Rumble is a turn based, single payer card game that allows you to collect 65+ unique creature cards. Create the best deck to defeat your foes and become the greatest rumble master of all time.

name: Crimson Canyon
summary: Crimson Canyon is a WAD, created by Jeffrey Graham in 2005. It contains 12 maps. The WAD received one of the 12th Annual Cacowards.

name: Crucified Dreams
summary: Crucified Dreams is a 42-level Doom II deathmatch megawad for BOOM-compatible source ports. Released on June 16, 2006, it is a spiritual sequel of GothicDM (1997), GothicDM 2 (1998), and Gothic 99. A handful of its team members also contributed to the Gothic Deathmatches series. The project was started in 1998 by Scott Cover (Covaro) with the project lead role handed over to Derek MacDonald (Afterglow) in 2000.

name: Crud
summary: CRUD is a four-level Doom II miniwad featuring short, simple maps that start out easy but get significantly harder by the end. I would liken the last map's difficulty to late-TNT, early-Plutonia. Each map uses only stock textures, and the whole wad can be finished in about 15 minutes or so.

name: Creepy Clown Zombie Slayer VR
summary:
Use your virtual reality headset to experience the thrill of fighting a horde of zombies from the comfort of your own home!
Get ready to defend from zombies in virtual reality! Experience the real sensation and thrill of the undead with your mobile virtual reality headset. Look in the direction you want to shoot your gun and don't get bitten by zombies!

name: CrazyTV
summary: You just slept on the couch while watched some trash terror film. Now the monster wants to get you, in your dreams! Destroy the TV spirit and take back the control of your precious TV using your controller to destroy the monsters it summons.

name: Crusade to Die
summary: Made in 2 days for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 with the theme Roll of the Dice. Lock onto tiles and move them around to help a little bard avoid skeletons and collect coins. Grab D6 to generate new tiles and D4 to reroll tiles. Getting hit will lose you tiles.

name: Cruel Jewels
summary: Action-packed match-three gameplay! Line up 3 or more jewels to knock them off the board and score; make longer matches to power up jewels with lots of special abilities. Cages, countdowns and the diabolical Leonard himself will keep you on your toes.

name: Cracked
summary: "Cracked" is a wild 2D combat racing game where manic eggs compete for egg supremacy. Choose wacky egg characters, navigate treacherous tracks with saws, spikes, lasers, and lava pits, and race to the sizzling frying pan finish line. Collect hilarious power-ups and pave your way to victory.

name: Crossing the Sands
summary:
A first-person dungeon crawler RPG with turn-based combat and grid-based movement.

Assemble a party of adventurers and explore a medieval desert world, fighting monsters in turn-based combat to build the skills and gather the equipment you'll need in order to vanquish the leader of the raiders. Master powerful healing and offensive magic to aid you on your adventures, and delve deep into ancient ruins to find out who's really pulling the strings.

name: Crash Dive 2 - Aleutian Islands Expansion
summary: Includes one campaign, two new mission areas, four new ships, one new plane, and more!

name: Crescite
summary: Cropout is a casual top-down strategy game with stylized graphics. Each new game is a unique procedurally generated island with resources on it. To complete the game, buy a mysterious artifact.

name: Crime Zone
summary:
Enter the Crime Zone. Move it, Move it. Catch the perps. You are drawn to a mysterious hotel. You are repeatedly drawn to this mysterious hotel. Protect And Serve. It's just another day in the Crime Zone.

Originally released August 2011 for Ludum Dare. Made in Adventure Game Studio.

name: Criminal Case: The Conspiracy
summary: Join the Police of Grimsborough once again to solve a series of murder cases in this captivating hidden object, adventure game. Investigate crime scenes for clues, bring the suspects in for questioning and analyze evidence to catch the killers. Are you ready to prove your detective skills?

name: Criminal Case: Travel in Time
summary: Travel in Time is the title of the sixth season of Criminal Case. It was released on March 14th, 2019.

name: Crash Team Racing: Retro-Fueled
summary:
Enjoy the original CTR from 1999 with Blue Fire, U-Turning and every turbo pad being USF!

Crash Team Racing: Retro-Fueled is a mod that brings mechanics from Crash Team Racing: Nitro-Fueled back into the original PlayStation game.

name: Crea Run!
summary: Run, jump, and gather building blocks...Craft vehicles using the collected blocks and recipes!An action game of running, jumping, and crafting.

name: Creatures by Candlelight
summary: Become a professional hunter of monstrous enigmatic creatures through an anthology of hunts that mix cards and "choose your own adventure" style gameplay. Amidst a dark and smothering world; grab a light, strike out, and fight against the odds. It's all just another day (or night) on the job.

name: Crusader
summary: Crusader is a 10 map singleplayer levelset for DOOM2 using OTEX and DSDHACKED, featuring a new arsenal of weapons and some new enemies. The recommended port for Crusader is DSDA-Doom - many features will not function without a port that supports DSDHACKED.

name: Crisis Control
summary: Crisis Control is a strategy game where you and up to 3 friends command firefighters, medics, police officers and technicans to protect a small, rapidly growing village from natural but also human-made desasters.

name: Crowd
summary: Explore the depths of the pipes that once held better worlds, learn the life stories that are about to vanish in a world sinking in lies and conflicts. The tyranny rises in times of weakness.

name: Crypt Raider
summary: Move the mystical blue balls into the portal to escape the level!

name: CruzeCraze
summary: Embark on a captivating cruise ship simulation game. Sail through the challenges of running a cruise empire. Navigate stunning waters and create unforgettable experiences. Managing crew dynamics, inventory logistics, and passenger satisfaction. Become the ultimate captain of the seas!

name: Crossroad of Worlds: Star Riddle - Collector's Edition
summary: Continue your detective journey and stop the star thefts! There is no peace for the magical stars of the worlds. Draw out all of the secrets from a captured villain and find the true mastermind behind the vile conspiracy!

name: Crib
summary: It's time to face! As Milton, your past invites you to solve the mysteries. What you learn about yourself will surprise you. Most importantly remember that this is not a nightmare, this is a reality.

name: Crazy Plus
summary:
"Crazy Plus" is a numbers merged puzzle game.
This game provides six modes: Plus One, Match Two, Add Three, Merge Seven, Make Ten and 2N. Each mode has a unique gameplay.

name: Crystal Wish: Candy Chase
summary: It's the night of Halloween and three young girls are about to experience their spookiest night ever thanks to a magical friend way too willing to give them a thrilling night.

name: Crimson Needle 3
summary: Play as The Kid, and traverse a vast world of profoundly challenging platforming with a wide variety of atmospheres and visual styles.

name: Crowned Control
summary: A couch co-op multiplayer game, where the goal is to grab the crown and keep it on your head for as long as possible to win the game!

name: Crimson Crisis
summary: Embrace the chaosâ€¦ Battle aliens, shoot guns and, above all else, survive to work anotherday in Crimson Crisis, a sci-fi action-roguelite set in a post-apocalyptic universe.

name: Creature Battle Simulator
summary: Forge an army of creatures to defeat your opponents in epic battles across distant lands! Duel against your friends online, or conquer the campaign to unlock new parts that upgrade your creatures' stats and abilities. Will you emerge victorious?

name: Creep Shock
summary: Tap to jump the creep. Time jumps to just right. Avoid falling into the void.

name: Cracked
summary: Frustratingly difficult egg-centric physics-based 3D platforming obstacle course. Try to make it to the end without getting cracked.

name: Crystal Ball Critters
summary: Crystal Ball Critters is a multiplayer ball-racing game, in which you race your friends through our antagonist's carefully thought out multiverse of adventures! Play by yourself or against up to 4 of your friends to find out who can beat each stage first.

name: Creature Evolution Simulator
summary: Design an ecosystem and watch your creatures evolve through millions of years by means of natural selection. See them fight for survival and produce offspring which share their genesâ€¦ occasionally mutating to form monstrosities! What will your creatureâ€™s final-stage of evolution be?

name: Crazy Kitchen
summary: Hordes of Hungrys are coming in waves. Protect the Kitchen and its precious snacks at all costs!

name: Croaking Around
summary:
Use your tongue to pull, sling and swing acrobatically to get around the hazardous underground.
The game focuses on simple platforming gameplay combined with spectacular aerial acrobatics and a cute cartoony artstyle.
It's pure fun for the whole family (it's singleplayer so you're going to have to take turns sorry).

name: CryptoClash
summary: Welcome to CryptoClash, the ultimate free-to-play multiplayer shooter that thrusts you into a cyberpunk world like no other. Are you ready to dominate the neon-soaked chaos and emerge as a legendary champion?

name: Crisol: Theater of Idols
summary: What would you do if your blood were your only weapon? How much would you sacrifice your life? Experience the unholy island of Tormentosa in this twisted first-person adventure full of horror and action where only your blood can be used to defeat the impious creatures that roam therein.

name: Crystalish
summary: Crystalish - A side-view game with a physical world where the player must destroy blocks in a certain amount while controlling the balance of the fish and not allowing it to fall off the screen.

name: Cropisle TD
summary: After an earthquake, you're sent to an island for rebuilding. Face nightly critter attacks, set up towers, and farm. Your mission is to seal the island or secure crops before defenses are breached. Now, grab your shovel and hammer, and enter the defensive battle!

name: Cryowakers
summary: Cryowakers is an exploration and survival game that takes place in a randomly-generated futuristic world. Play solo or with seven other players to explore, survive, build, and fight to uncover the truth behind the cryosleep experiments.

name: Crime Boss: Rockay City - Dragon's Gold Cup
summary: Travis Baker (Michael Madsen), a distrustful and spiteful gangster, joins forces with his rival, Dollar Dragon (Danny Trejo) in the first Expansion Pack of Crime Boss: Rockay City. Steal the King's gold and establish your legacy as the next Crime Boss.

name: CruxFlaw
summary: Throw, Slash and Dash your way through enemies in this high score arcade slasher. Try to survive for as long as possible and eliminate as many enemies as you can by managing the movement of your stun orb, bounce it off enemies or walls and redirect it by slashing it.

name: Crystal Journey: Lum's Adventure
summary: Crystal Journey - Lum's Adventure is a captivating 3D puzzle/adventure game where your goal is to guide Lum, a brave light spirit, through a world filled with challenging puzzles and stunning environments. Rotate the levels, think creatively, and solve intricate puzzles to reach the magical purple crystal that hold the key to Lum's journey.

name: Cryoterror
summary: A space horror game with retro-like pixelation and dithering effects, where you explore a desolate spacecraft and its mysteries.

name: Cryptid Hunter
summary: Cryptid Hunter is a 1st-person single player horror game where you gather clues using a myriad equipment and traps. You need to identify the cryptid itself, determine what kind of bait to use for the trap, and which trap. Fail to provide the right trap and bait, and you end up being both.

name: Craft Carnage
summary: Craft Carnage is where survival meets strategy, where chaos meets creativity. How will you navigate this relentless realm? Will you emerge as a lone wolf, a skilled trader, or a leader of a thriving community? The choices are yours to make, and the consequences are yours to face.

name: Cronie the Assassin's Mission: The Teddy Bear Payment
summary: What happens when a proficient assassin enters a thieves stronghold directly? Use skills to backstab enemies from behind, or fight head-on. Will Cronie be able to successfully complete the commission?

name: CrossFire
summary: Despite sharing a name with the American release of Super Airwolf and sharing a publisher, CrossFire is a very different game; whereas the Genesis game is a top-down Commando-style run-and-gun, the Famicom game is a single-plane side-scroller, more akin to Contra with brawler implements.

name: CrabMania
summary: CrabMania is a competitive Party Game of between two and four simultaneous players.Each player controls a character, and must eliminate each other using a throwable object according each level.

name: Crafty County
summary: A captivating city-building puzzle game, blending strategy with creativity as you help towns by merging groups of four buildings into unique structures to make them grow and prosper.

name: Crypt Survivor
summary: Descend into alien crypts, collect vital crystals, and battle hostile extraterrestrial creatures in this gripping sci-fi survival shooter. Your mission: save your species and unearth the secrets hidden in the depths.

name: Cryptfall
summary: In this 1-4 Player Co-Op game, gather resources, fight fierce enemies, and craft essential tools in a dynamic island adventure. Race against time to survive as an ancient evil awakens in just 10 days!"

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D.: The Bear of Wall Street Bundle
summary:
This pack includes:

â€¢ Nikolai "Deadhead" Orlov hero unlock
â€¢ "Oligarch" outfit
â€¢ "Gzhel" HK UMP45 skin
â€¢ 700 Crowns.

name: Crank & Watch: Octopus
summary: Retrieve the treasures from the chest guarded by the octopus.

name: Creatures
summary: Creatures is an innovative music tech game that combines the excitement of a TPS-style Battle Royale with a surreal atmosphere and exclusive music from top artists. Choose from a variety of unique characters and explore landscapes filled with hidden weapons and hiding spots. Play as different characters and traverse different spaces as you engage in thrilling battles.

name: Crazy Chicken Carnival
summary: Crazy Chicken Carnival is a party game starring Crazy Chicken and friends set on a fair with more than 25 different attractions/mini-games to play. Crazy Chicken had expected to meet his friends at the yearly fair, but his friends are nowhere to be found. It appears they are kidnapped by an evil wizards and his underlings who also brought the fair under their control. Now you have battle the evil wizards and his underlings on the fairs attractions to save your friends. Attractions include a 'test your strength' machine, knife throwing, bowling, a fish pond and ball throwing tent. The DS version is a single player game while the Wii version can be played with up to four players.

name: Crazy Quiz! Are You Crazy Enough?
summary: The combination of quiz show and party games on Wii. Combine up to four players in a colorful 3D TV studio. There are eight animated and customizable player characters to choose from. Accompanied by the moderator Max, Answer many quiz questions and complete exciting mini-games in an impressive environment. More than 1,800 questions in nine different subject areas. Features: Real studio environment in a 3D TV studio with presenter Max. Unique player characters, each with four different outfits that can be activated in the course of the game. Different multiplayer and single player game modes. Wide range of entertainment with quizzes and mini games for the whole family.

name: Crazy Bus
summary: Fill up the Bus!

name: Crash Pollito
summary:
Roosty and Gus always wanted to fly and what a better choice to do it than a radio flyer without tires.

Toss them and use your abilities to pick all the items and special powers you can to reach the farthest possible.

Unlock new special powers and costumes making the different challenges in the addictive Crash Pollito.

name: Crowd City
summary:
Gather people accross the city and crush your opponents with your overwhelming leadership. The more people you run into, the bigger your crowd becomes!

Beware! If other group has more members, yours will be taken completely and you will have to start from scratch...

Try out a variety of funny skins and play on different maps.

name: CrankShaft
summary: Get ready to experience the captivating journey of a bouncing ball amidst the intricate machinery of a crankshaft. In this game, you'll navigate through the mechanical realm, leaping over obstacles and bounding across the unique landscape of the crankshaft. Test your reflexes and agility as you guide the ball through this dynamic and perilous adventure. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Crashimals
summary: Crashimals is a first person arena shooter, wave defense, zombie survival, mission grind where you take on stylized cartoon animals and fight to the death!

name: Cross The Ridge R
summary: Initial D/Ridge Racer type game.

name: Cream Party
summary: Come join the fun-filled ice cream battle! Immerse yourself in a fast-paced and absurdly hilarious adventure. Activate random power-ups, take advantage of terrain bonuses, showcase your unique fighting style, and unlock uproarious ways to win!

name: Crate Escape
summary: Crate Escape is a simple 2D platformer where you help a disembodied skull navigate strange dungeons using crates to solve puzzles. See how fast you can beat each of the 50 levels and collect all the golden crates hidden within them.

name: Crayon Shin-chan: Obaka Dainin Den - Susume! Kasukabe Ninja Tai!
Crayon Shin-Chan Shokkugan! Densetsu o Yobu Omake Daiketsusen!!
Crash vs. Spyro Racing
summary: Crash vs Spyro Racing is a cancelled crossover racing game featuring characters from the Crash Bandicoot and Spyro series. The game was developed for the original Xbox by LT Studios.

name: Crystal Mines
summary: Crystal mines DS is a game set in the distant future on a far-away planet where underneath the ground lies mines filled with crystals, monsters, rocks, black holes, lava, slime and cave-ins that will test your skills... You have decided to build your own mining robot to get the crystal riches that lay beneath the soil. You control your mining robot but using the keypad or (3DS: Also the Thumb Stick) and shoot blasts with your robots built in blaster that has unlimited reserve of energy using the A button and place explosives that you may find and collect in the mines using the B button. Along your adventure you will find many traps and hazardous objects that will require you too think twice before moving another inch... You will come across certain upgrades such as more powerful blaster shots or energy shields that will protect you from certain nastyâ€™s. Also as you mine through the underground cavern you will encounter strange rock like creatures that not all will go down with a blaster bolt some require real strategy and complex thinking. Crystal Mines DS contains over 300 levels with bonus and secret levels to mine through and will really test you quick thinking, reflexes, intelligence and thumb power... Will you mine the last level???

name: Crazy Circus
summary: You have inherited the Crazy Circus from your father, who has become too old and sick to go on managing it. Many years back the circus was famous all around the world, but now there are only 4 charmingly whacky events left that attract only small crowds. Your task is to perform so well and stunningly that the circus starts attracting ever-bigger crowds and new performers as its fame grows. The ultimate goal is to restore the circus to its former glory and to get to perform in the legendary Las Vegas - the climax of your world tour. So there you are, jumping fearlessly over countless cars as Oleg the Motobear, wildly throwing cakes at your fellow clowns, or swinging as a parrot from one trapeze to the next in dizzying heights while the spectators cheer their lungs out.

name: Crash Metal: Cyber Racing Punk Cars
Crash Advance IV
summary: Crash Advance IV is a bootleg 2D platformer game for the Game Boy Advance based on the Crash Bandicoot series. The game uses the Digimon Adventure engine.

name: Cracking the Cryptic: Lines Variety Pack
summary: A new variety pack featuring many different line variants!

name: Crowd City: Complete Edition
summary:
Gather people across the city and beat your opponents with your excellent leadership. The more people you run into, the bigger your crowd becomes!

Complete Edition Features:
- 7 maps to run on
- 40+ skins to make your crowd look even cooler
- Additional 2000 coins
- Crowd upgrades
- Amusing gameplay
- Ear-catching music
- Easy controls so anyone can play
- Simple rules and lots of fun!

name: Cryptical Path
summary: Cryptical Path is a thrilling rogue-lite dungeon crawler that pushes the boundaries of the genre. Play the Architect, build your own path, and navigate an ever-changing labyrinth you've been summoned in.

name: Crazy Little Jumper
summary:
You control a little dude. In his way there are many obstacles, but his only ability is to jump. This is where he needs your help. You make him jump by tapping the screen.
You can do two types of jumps: small jumps for small obstacles, and big jumps for big obstacles.
Through the levels you will need good timing and pure attention. There are 3 different worlds with total 63 action packed levels. Also, watch for holes, bounce pads, force fields and speed zones.
This game is fast, fun, addictiveâ€¦ and easy to play and easy to enjoy.

name: Cream Lemon: Star Trap
summary: This visual novel faithfully follows the story of Star Trap, the 10th episode of the adult OVA (Original Video Animation) series Cream Lemon while featuring some additional scenes.

name: Creepy
summary: Creepy is an Maze game, developed and published by Thalamus, which was released in Europe in 1990. Decent Snake clone with nice graphics and sound, but gameplay is frustrating where your time in the game is your score.

name: Crime: 1997
summary: Newport, 1997: Waterside gang member, Henry Gallagher, is thrust into danger following a failed deal, tangling with the police and the Sorvino Mafia. A riveting drug sweeps the city, igniting hidden conflicts.

name: CryptaSync Cyber: Urban Depths
summary: Embark on a cyberpunk odyssey in ever-shifting catacombs, where shadows conceal dreadful adversaries. Arm yourself with cutting-edge cyberpunk guns, facing array of stalkers. No run is alike; adapt or face consequences. Immerse in a world of shadows and neon - you're Cyberpunk, but your world isn't!

name: Crack in the Sky
summary: Medium-sized floating castle ruins map ("15-20 minutes") with an interconnected layout inspired by level design tropes in From Software's games. Requires Copper v1.20+

name: Crescendo Of Dreams + Surmounting Terror
summary: Medium sized green DOOM marble/ wood level with a small end battle map.

name: Crossword
summary: Across Lite Puzzle Player for Playdate, now with the ability to download puzzle files from the internet.

name: Crank & Watch: Ball
summary: Act fast and keep the balls up in the air!

name: CryptoMania: Movie Quotes
summary: Can you unscramble over 200 movie quotes?

name: Crossout: Sky Raiders
summary: Crossout goes up in the air! Join the â€œSky Raidersâ€ season, unlock all new parts, assemble the flying armoured vehicle of your dreams and battle other survivors in new locations!

name: Cradle
summary: Around medium-sized blue brick level.

name: Critical Mass
summary:
Critical Mass is a 3 level episode with 4 new weapons and new (or modified) enemies, including boss.
A secret nuclear research facility is under control of the aliens. The only way in is by a special teleport located at a EDF weaponry research building. After killing the aliens the only way out is by a escape turboplane at the hangar.

name: Criaturas de la Noche
summary: Duke enjoys a dream at his parents' house

name: Crossroads OS
summary: Explore the mysterious operating system CrossÊ€oad OS. Adventure through its decaying programs, solve puzzles, collect items and meet strange creatures.

name: Crafting Combat
summary: Crafting Combat is a medieval team-based strategy game where teams of players craft weapons to then fight for an objective.

name: Croakoloco
summary: Croakoloco is a frog collecting idle game. Watch them jump, croak, and eat delicious flies. Grow frogs, feed frogs, or take control of one in â€œFroggy Modeâ€ for a more active play style!

name: Crazy Cursed Grandma's House
summary: Explore Japanese houses and deal with the curses that attack you!

name: Cross-Stitch World
summary: Enjoy doing Cross-Stitch patterns on your computer without threading a needle or risking a pricked finger with hundreds of beautiful patterns to play.

name: Crystal Comet
summary: Team up with your squad & take on the galaxy in this frantic twin stick space shooter "Squad em' up". Play single player with the AI or drop in / drop out local co-op!

name: Creepshow
summary: Creepshow is a video game based off the horror comedy anthology series that began in 1982.

name: Crush Link TD
summary: Protect your inbox from spam to find a message from your crush. A Tower Defense game with new mechanics in virtual setting about online dating.

name: Crucial Conflict 1: Suspicious Storage
summary: During the neverending fight against the alien domination, mankind has seen many strange and shocking things. Women being kidnapped and held in cocoons, average day streetlife being brutally disturbed by the unknown power from outer space... With huge efforts, the Earth Defence Forces (EDF) have been able to stabilize the situation. Now it is time to fight back and stop the invasion.

name: Crucial Conflict 2: Waterworld
summary: After a routine flight above Western Europe, Duke Nukem, EDF's best agent, crashed on the roof of a storage facility near Rotterdam mainport, in The Netherlands. Completely dazed he tried to find some help or at least contact the outside world, but none of that worked out. He encountered aliens instead and not one humanbeing seemed to be alive. Only some notes and logs where left.

name: Crucial Conflict 3: Acupa Dylana
summary: Duke pursues the aliens, but is too late. Rotterdam has fallen a prey to the alien cruelty. With a totally massacred population, the city looks strangely deserted.

name: Crown of the Empire: Collector's Edition
summary: Crown of the Empire: fun adventures await! The queen needs your help!

name: Crescent Satsujin Jiken: Hyena no Jijou
Crow Country
summary: The year is 1990. Edward Crow has disappeared. The owner of 'Crow Country', he has not been seen since he unexpectedly shut down his park two years ago. The silence is broken when a mysterious young woman named Mara Forest ventures into the heart of the abandoned theme park in order to find him.

name: Cranks Playdate Baseball
summary: Playdate Baseball

name: CritterGarden
summary: CritterGarden is an upcoming creature-collector/life sim with a focus on carefully crafting a unique garden to breed and evolve Critters!

name: Crazy People
summary: This is a cartoon shooting.

name: Cross Dungeon
summary: Connect the tiles and conquer the dungeon. Monsters and treasure await! Defeat monsters and move on. Power up when you get the treasure. Let's proceed while collecting treasures.

name: Crusades
summary: Crusades: An Unholy War is a nine-level Ultimate Doom PWAD in episode four style made by Richard Wiles. It replaces maps E4M1-E4M9.

name: Cranky Chibi Cthulhu
summary: An 8-bit style vertical SHMUP (very loosely) based on the writings of H.P. Lovecraft.

name: Crazy Hit 2
summary:
Crazy Hit 2 is an unlicensed Whack-A-Mole style game for the PlayStation featuring PokÃ©mon characters.

The game originally came with a pop'n music-style peripheral called Crazy Hit, manufactured by U.F.O. Soft (who also created the Photo Hunter games), as the game was intended for use with the peripheral (the peripheral also came with two discs specially designed for it; Crazy Hit 1, the other disc, is currently undumped); however, the game could also be played with a normal controller. Possibly due to the branding, PokÃ©mon Crazy Hit 2 were later independently released by bootleggers separately from the peripheral.

Due to the homebrew nature of the game, the title is very small by PlayStation standards, weighing at just 5 MB.

name: Crazy Hit
summary:
Crazy Hit is a game produced by U.F.O. Soft that was released together with Crazy Hit 2 (known as the Playstation PokÃ©mon for using unlicensed art from the franchise) and a special controller to play both.

It is currently not possible to find the game or recordings of it available, so the only image of it available is the one on the back of the set's box. From the box art and the description on it (in addition to the use of the controller), it is possible to deduce that it shares the same gameplay as Crazy Hit 2 (a whack-a-mole like game), but without the use of PokÃ©mon.

In Crazy Hit 2 it is possible to see on the initial screen that the game was made by Poho and Majorros, however without the file for this game, it is uncertain to say that this game was also produced by both developers.

summary: In Crimson Tide, become Antonio, an Italian fisherman, on an endless quest for the dream catch. Mysteriously cast into darkness on a shoreline of shipwrecked dreams, your sole escape is a distant lighthouse. With unwavering determination, conquer the darkness, and rediscover your true purpose.

name: Criminal Behavior

name: Crazy Bullet
summary:
Crazy Bullet is a variant of the arcade game Tank. As in that game, there is a top-down view of an arena containing two equally equipped tanks who engage in a fight to the death. Each tank can fire a bullet at a time, and move to avoid the opponent's fire. Contact with a bullet will destroy your tank, earning your opponent a point, and the first player to five points wins the contest.

The current game has a couple of important differences from the original. The most important is that bullets do not just travel in a straight line after you fire them. They move in the direction in which you last directed your tank. This allows you to fire around corners, and even to shoot yourself (gifting your opponent a free point). Secondly, there are a number of different arenas which can be chosen, with different wall layouts. Some of these layouts also include a turn-style which allows you to pass but stops any pursuing bullets. Finally there are two speed settings (for fast and slow bullets).

name: Crystal Quest
summary:
Game Boy Port of Crystal Quest.

Buckle in and gear up for the classic galactic ride of your life. Far beyond known galaxies, the stars are scattered with precious crystals. As a renegade outer space prospector, your job is to scoop 'em up and bring 'em home. Just one problem: The brilliant glow of these gems attracts some of the universe's foulest pests. We call them nasties - and they're just that. So go ahead...zap the intergalactic vermin and cash in on the crystals. It's nasty-blastin' fun.

If any window closes on either of his hands he will lose his grip. However, if a window closes on both of his hands, he will fall to his death, resulting in the loss of a life. You have three Climbers in total, but you are awarded an extra Climber every 30,000 points.

The game comes with a powerful in game scenario editor, ensuring that the only limit for what is possible is your imagination. Creators was meant to be fun above all else so enjoy!

name: Crazy module
summary: This is a classic stand-alone casual puzzle game

name: Crimson wind
summary: Stephen, having inherited a sawmill, decides to sell it to fund a documentary about an unpunished murderer from his city. Little did he imagine where this decision would lead.

name: Crop and Claw
summary: Crop and Claw is a classic-style JRPG centered around dragons in a lush realm known as the "Garden". The plantlife has gone awry, bringing a time of decline and stress across the realm. Return to the era of simple questing, dungeons, and progression.

Stage mode continues an interesting story and journey, random map mode fills each game with a new experience.

name: Crazy Ball
summary:
Included as a type-in as part of CPCINFOS Issue 53 and 54.

During the game, you direct a ball onto a checkerboard.

The goal is to reach the end of each level, within the time allotted to you. You can direct the ball using the joystick, going left and right and pressing the fire button to make it jump. Please note, the number of jumps is limited (it is indicated at the top of the screen).

Each color of the checkerboard has a function: blue tiles have no effect, light blue tiles make the ball jump, red tiles slow down the ball, yellow tiles accelerate your ball, green tiles block commands, purple tiles reverse the commands and black tiles are, well, holes.

Falling into a hole wastes time. To abandon a game, press ESC, and you return to the menu

name: Crash Bandicoot Blast!
summary: Crash Bandicoot Blast! (or just Crash Blast) is a game exclusive to the GameCube version of Crash Bandicoot: The Wrath of Cortex released in 2002. It was developed by Vicarious Visions. To access it, the player must connect a Game Boy Advance to a GameCube with The Wrath of Cortex in it.

name: Crosmorf Adventures
summary: A platform and adventure game that guarantees a lot of fun. A story about the abomination of society told in a different and interesting way.

name: Crafty Racer
summary: Stunt, push, and rush to the end! Win models and change anything as you want! Your tracks, vehicles, characters, checkpoints, opponents, ... anything!

name: CrypticaL
summary: An ancient entertainment in a futuristic universe, at least for the audiance. Our main character is a retired soldier who forced to fight in a gladiator arena. Escape, find the responsibles, punish!

name: Crazy Hospital Fushigi no Kuni no Tenshi
summary: The player controls a young man who feels sick and has to visit the hospital. Once there, the plot split into different paths, depending on the choices of locations, dialogue responses and actions made by the player. All the branches involve focusing on one of the several available female characters and pursuing the short courting process to the point of its intimate conclusion.

name: Crossword Puzzle
summary: Crossword Puzzle allows the player to create his or her own crossword puzzles. All the player has to do is enter words for the puzzle and descriptions, once finished the computer will try to fit them all in a grid. The player can cycle through various viable options, but the computer might not always be able to put every word in the grid. Once done the editor will print the crossword to paper for someone else to solve.

name: Crusader Kings III: Fashion of the Abbasid Court
summary: Give your court a dashing new look with a set of outfits and cosmetic clothing options for the Middle East and North Africa.

name: Creature Summon: Showdown Moment
summary: A creative first-person card game that simulates VR perspective and controls. 3D spatial UI allows players to throw cards to any location based on their hand speed using the mouse.

name: Craft The World: Invasion
summary: The player can call for a giant spaceship to appear in orbit, which will send well-armed troops to the surface over and over again.

name: Critter Crosser

name: Crapht Box
summary: Crapht Box is a Fantasy Physics Sandbox, inspired by the Fantasy Console genre. It brings a simulated world with a number of disks and tools, and leaves you to play, program, create and share disks.

name: Crumpets 2
summary: Crumpets is a set of six, Boom-compatible maps released by Zachary Stephens (Ribbiks) in 2024.

name: Crop Haven
summary: Inspired by the older Harvest Moon games such as A Wonderful Life and Animal Parade, Crop Haven is the story of a kingdom in danger, with only your skills and wits available to help the monstrous, mysterious people living there. With the Vampire King's support and the rest of the townsfolk's tips, can you singlehandedly save Crop Haven from famine and drought?

name: Cropsmare!
summary: Cropsmare! is a sokoban-like puzzle game inspired by Adventures of Lolo.

name: Crusader Kings III: Content Creator Pack - North African Attire
summary: Inspired by historical fashions of the North African Middle Ages and authentic Berber style, â€œNorth African Attireâ€ adds new clothing, headgear and designer patterns.

name: Crazy Goose Simulator
summary: Unleash your inner mischief, experience chaos. Roam quirky environments, honk at humans, and wreak havoc. Solve puzzles and earn achievements.

name: Crimson II
summary:
Years have passed since the evil Crimson was defeated. Peace was restored, and humanity enjoyed an era of prosperity. But a new demonic being has arisen, ending the peace in the world. Five heroes must find each other and unite in order to vanquish him.

The sequel to Crimson retains the basic gameplay of its predecessor and is a medieval-themed role-playing game with overhead exploration and first-person turn-based combat against randomly appearing enemies. The first part of the game is broken into chapters, each dedicated to one of the five heroes; afterwards, they are united as a party and continue the quest together, similarly to Dragon Quest IV.

name: Crystal Wish: Dwindle Hearts
summary:
Three girls, a storm and a deck of cards.

Join Mughara, Meg and Rosalyn as they enjoy a game of Hearts to pass the time as a storm rages outside the hotel they are staying at.

Hey, don't you think the room is getting bigger?
It's called Dwindle Hearts for a reason after all~

name: Crystal Realms
summary: Crystal Realms is a sandbox platforming mmo game where you can build worlds, fight enemies, and socialize with friends.

name: Crusader Kings III: Legends of the Dead
summary: What good are grand accomplishments and heroic deeds if no one sings of them after you have gone? A royal legacy is only useful, after all, if it can provide cover and legitimacy for those who come after you. Live on in the memory of your subjects and rivals in Legends of the Dead.

name: Cracking the Stone
summary: Enter the life of a boy experiencing tragedy for the first time, the burden of his parents' hopes & dreams, and the struggle to let his emotions in. Deflect the negative emotions coming from outside forces while trying to juggle the ins and outs of childhood, puberty, and relationships.

name: Crypt Crawler
summary: Descend 16 monster-filled levels to close the gate to the Underworld in this top-down tower defense dungeon crawler. Gather resources, discover blueprints, and build defensive towers to slice, dice, zap, and explode undead hordes. Play solo or 2-4 player local co-op.

name: Crab Attack
summary: Extraction-lite meets SHMUP/STG meets Adventure. Get more upgrade materials by exploring branching stages as far as you can go, just be sure to escape before you get pinched or you'll lose everything you've collected.

name: Cryptic Escape
summary: Monsters are taking hard earned dwarven treasure, and the dwarves have had enough. You are chosen are their champion, and are sent into the dungeons to recover your treasure, problem is... No one taught you how to fight the monsters, so your best option is to sneak by, and hope they don't catch you.

name: Creatures of Ava
summary: Let your empathy guide you as you play an exciting action-adventure, creature-saver game. Understand and tame the creatures of Ava and let them lead you through a variety of ecosystems â€“ all in the hopes of saving the planet from a life-consuming infection.

name: Craft Lands
summary: Let's develop the village! Craft Lands is a development simulation game where you plant trees in a vast empty space and develop a village. Defend your village from enemies and use resources to build houses and increase your population. What kind of village you create is entirely up to you.

name: Crown Wars: The Black Prince - Brotherhood of Light Cosmetic Pack
summary: Fight darkness and the Order by proudly wearing the Brotherhood of Light cosmetic pack. It contains a unique helm for each of your classes, a new skin for your weapons, and the Sacred Emblems pack to customize your squad and banner.

name: Crown Wars: The Black Prince - Blood Pact Weapon Skins
summary: Sometimes you need to fight fire with fire and blood with blood. Use the Order's own demonic weapons against them by equipping this weapon skin pack.

name: Crucial 2: The Refresh Update
summary: Crucial 2 is a modpack for Minecraft that aims to enhance the gameplay experience while maintaining the feel of vanilla Minecraft.

name: Cross the Maze World
summary: Independently develop games, 3d games, and travel through the maze world to explore, kill monsters, and solve puzzles

name: CrumbleMiner
summary: CrumbleMiner is a Frenetic Rogue-like Pixelart Platformer without jumping! Align your explosive barrel and BLAST trough rocks collecting precious gems and ride on top of a ROCKET barrel while avoiding your death through the dangerous Crumble Mines!

name: Cross Impact: Cowboy
summary: Download and play Cowboy from Your Only Move Is HUSTLE in Cross Impact!

name: Cross Impact: V1
summary: Download and play V1 from ULTRAKILL in Cross Impact!

name: CriticalOrb
summary: Defeat continuously incoming monsters with various abilities!CriticalOrb is a 3D top-down shooting game. Choose various abilities to defeat the continuously incoming monsters until the boss appears! You need to become more critical before the boss arrives!

name: Crabland
summary: A puzzle game where you rotate puzzle pieces with a crank to match 3. The goal is to prevent crabs from reaching the ocean.

name: Crusader Kings III: Couture of the Capets
summary: Inspired by the fashions of the French court in the High Medieval Era, the Couture of the Capets cosmetic pack adds new styles and patterns for clothing and hair styles.

name: Croak Croak On The Sea

name: Crossed Wires
summary: Navigate your oblivious companion through a world filled with dangers such as lasers, rush hour traffic, homemade flamethrowers and aggressive cleaning robots by solving a variety of puzzles in this hilarious and unpredictable adventure. Can you keep him safe from himself?

name: Crystal Guard TD
summary: Stop hordes of robots from destroying your Crystal shrine in this random shop tower defense game! Instead of choosing exactly what tower to place down, the random shop gives you 3 random towers to choose from. Set up your defenses and see if you can survive!

name: Crystal Chip Collector: Hidden Gem
summary: "Crystal Chip Collector: Hidden Gem" is a fast-paced platforming puzzle game with a neo-retro style. Collect all the microchips to complete each level and watch out for the critters! Initially, it may seem simple, but some of the later levels can get quite tricky.

name: Cryptrio
summary: A monstrous match three arcade game with a twist! Connect the shapes in the right places to clear monsters from the dungeon and beat the bosses, all in the name of chasing the highest possible score.

name: Creatures After Calamity
summary: Creatures After Calamity is an unsettling monster battler in which your animals remember how you treat them. Build a team and outsmart your opponents before your creatures turn on you.

name: Creation of a God
summary: The game mixes elements of platforming, puzzles and combat in a tormented world ruled by a mysterious God. Only the most daring will be able to move forward and conquer the golden crown!

name: Crash Math
summary: Crash Math - You must solve math problems while trying to drive a car and avoid traps.

name: Crowd Diver
summary: Crowd Diver is an asymmetrical stealth multiplayer game where you can immerse yourself in the role of the Seeker, tasked with protecting the city from impending evil. Alternatively, you can become the Monster, seeking to wreak destruction and eliminate targets disguised.

name: Crestfallen: Medieval Survival
summary: Long live the King! Crestfallen: Medieval Survival pits players against each other to fight for land and power over the Realm. Gear your knights in the strongest armor, craft the most deadly medieval weaponry, and build a Kingdom worth defending. Lay siege and vanquish thy enemy and horrors within.

name: Crystal Eyes
summary: Crystal Eyes is an Indie pixelart action adventure game with RPG touches.

name: Crayola Adventures
summary: Step into the world of Crayola Adventures, where open-ended storytelling and adventure-style gameplay merge. You get to be the author, the illustrator and the hero as you craft and color creative stories.

name: Crusader Kings III: Wards & Wardens
summary: Many new education events add greater depth to the training of the young people of court. Educating the children of the court is now more interactive for both formal tutoring and the ever important life lessons. Shape not just the abilities, but the personality of your young charges, steering them to more acceptable or desirable traits for the important role they will play in the future.

name: Crypto Crisis: Education Edition
summary: Let's help Principal Trotter and technology teacher Kieran build the school of the future. The Education Edition is a simplified and easier to play version of the original Crypto Crisis that has been designed for a younger audience and more casual players.

name: Crops!
summary: Crops! is an autobattler in which your fruits and vegetables come alive! Plant your crops in specific patterns and place them strategically to defend against rats, kobolds and even dragons.

name: Crop Chronicles
summary: Dive into Crop Chronicles, where farm gaming evolves! Race against time, manage diverse crops, and fulfill dynamic orders. Embrace strategy and teamwork across 47 thrilling levels. Farm, fish, and flourish in this captivating adventure!

name: Crystalline Bliss
summary: Embark on a journey to serenity within the eternal realms of pure consciousness in Crystalline Bliss. This lo-fi, melancholic, psychedelic voxel puzzle game transports you to the otherworldly landscapes beyond our reality. Delve into the mysteries of your soul and find your path to joy.

name: Crackernuts
summary: Crackernuts is a narrative game about a goat-headed girl and her sister, a no-bodied head. They are on quest to find themselves and rescue their village from a curse of darkness.

name: Crawler
summary: You awaken in an endless cycle of dungeon terror. Armed with basic magic weapons and measly change of coins, you'll amass wealth and unlock limitless enhancements for your arsenal. Do you have what it takes to become a top Crawler slayer?

name: Crystal Conquest
summary: Crystal Conquest is the world's first 3v3 VR MOBA. Choose a class. Become a powerful mage. Topple enemy towers with your teammates. And defeat the crystal guardian to keep the only remaining source of magic out of the hands of evil.

name: Critical Fishing
summary: Take part in wormkinds heroic struggle for freedom from their archnemesis. Upgrade your arsenal, tools and submarine to decimate the fish population to reach the ultimate goal: to boldly go where no worm has gone before.

name: Cross Chase
summary: Chase is somehow similar to Gnome Robots but in real-time game and with several items and power-ups.

name: Cross Stinger
summary: Stinger is a tank-shooter with several enemies, levels, power-ups and items to pick.

name: Cross Shuriken
summary: Shuriken is somehow inspired by Pac-man and Pengo.

name: Crimson Hell
summary: Crimson Hell is a survival-horror game in which you play as Sae, a journalism student determined to find her missing sister. Traverse through three nightmarish realms, collecting limited resources, fighting monsters, and solving puzzles in order to escape and uncover the truth.

name: Critterball Derby
summary: Create and manage your own team, and play ball against your rivals in normal or ranked play. Tight controls and a smooth learning curve will have you knocking it out of the park in no time in this arcade baseball simulator. Or challenge your skills with difficult homerun challenges.

name: C.R.O.W. Girl Trouble
summary: A highschooler who moonlights as an assassin is tasked to deal with a dealer.

name: Crime or Punishment
summary: Play as a corrupt detective on the mobâ€™s payroll, and cover up their crimes. Read files, collect information and obscure evidence to frame an innocent bystander, who was at the wrong place, at the wrong time. After all, crime pays.

name: Crush at First Sight
summary: In this First-Person Full Motion Video Game, you will meet all kinds of charming ladies. From childhood sweethearts to obeyed workplace junior, elegant teacher, cat girl cosplayer, and hot yoga instructor. You will experience an unimaginable love journey and reach the happy ending with them.

name: Creator of Another World
summary: A roguelike RPG with a high degree of freedom. Explore the world full of adventures, interact with its inhabitants, marry, steal, do farming and fishing, blacksmithing and forging, mix potions, build towns without being tied to any goal!

name: Crown Code Chronicles
summary: Crown Code Chronicles is a story-driven, JRPG style game with a tactical, active turn-based combat system. Inspired by titles like Chrono Cross, FFX, Child Of Light, and more. Experience this emotional roller coaster as Varien; a prince who uses an ancient relic to time travel to save his loved ones

name: Crazy Destruction
summary: Crazy Destruction is a 3D physics puzzle game in which fun and exciting levels of varying difficulty await you! Take control of a mechanical cannon and destroy everything in your path! Using tactics and thinking, calculate every shot you take, because you're running out of ammunition!

name: Craymel Check
summary: Craymel Check features characters known as Craymels in a number of small mini-games. The artwork and character design of the Craymels themselves are based on the ones from Tales of Eternia, specifically.

name: Cramped Map Collection
summary: A set of maps designed around exploring unique aesthetic themes using Doom2's stock resources, cramped combat, small maps and reuse of space.

name: Creepy Creepy Love
summary: Rose Akuma is in love with her childhood friend, Samon Ribasa. Rosa loves him so much that she is ready to defend her love with her fists, challenging all her rivals to a brutal duel.

name: Criminal Archives: Murder in the Pages - Collector's Edition
summary: There's no such thing as a perfect crime! You have to solve a series of mysterious murders in San Francisco. It turns out that this bright city has its own dark side...

name: Criminal Archives: Murder in the Pages DLC
summary: There's no such thing as a perfect crime! You have to solve a series of mysterious murders in San Francisco. It turns out that this bright city has its own dark side...

name: CrabbleUp
summary: Dive into an oceanic odyssey, where serene exploration meets thrilling challenges. Embark on a journey through endless underwater mazes, armed only with your cunning and defending yourself from perilous foes with the power of your bubbles.

name: Crawl
summary:
Crawl is a short (max. for 20 minutes) horror game, where you need to crawl through tight cave spaces, and take photos of people that "went missing" there.

While doing that, you need to keep your flashlight powered by hand cranking it, and constantly replace the camera's cartridge for every photo you take. But beware, you're not alone down there.

name: Crypt of the NecroDancer: Hatsune Miku
summary: Descend through the Crypt of the NecroDancer as the one and only Hatsune Miku! With your trusty leek, iconic outfits, and dazzling dance moves, face down any enemy that comes your way with style.

name: Craft Wars
summary: Enter the adrenaline-fueled world of "Craft Wars," a VR multiplayer shooter for up to 16 players. With the power to craft every detail of your weapon using 3D pixel blocks, unleash your creativity and dominate the battlefield with your unique arsenal.

name: Cricket Heroes: VR
summary: Step into the exhilarating world of cricket with VR Cricket Heroes! Whether you're a die-hard cricket fan or a casual gamer, we've got all the action you crave. From thrilling super overs to intense test matches, and the prestigious World Cup, our game offers it all.

name: Crowborne
summary: Crowborne is a 2D platformer With the ability to Melee, shoot Run and Fly around!

name: Crystal Horizons
summary: Lead your band of sky pirates on a tactical adventure across the floating islands of Sazdemir! A Tactics RPG inspired by legends of old, with fresh new ideas. Build your crew from a variety of unique and technical classes, master Elemental Reactions on the field, and execute masterful strategies!

name: Crowd Control VR
summary: Challenge your observation skills in the immersive world of ancient Greece! Identify impostors amid diverse crowds across 25+ unique levels. Designed for accessibility, even VR newcomers can enjoy the thrill. Uncover impostors and dominate the crowds in Crowd Control VR!

name: Crazy 8s: Card Game
summary:
You enjoy playing Uno, Switch, Mau Mau? You will love the original and most famous version of the shedding-type card game, Crazy 8.

Challenge tens of thousands of real players at the Cups and during the seasons of the Crazy 8 Pro League to become the best of all and grab the Jackpot!

name: Cringegolf
summary: If you think playing golf is easy, then try playing Cringegolf! Your nerves will be tested, and your composure will be questioned.

name: Crisis Bullet
summary: Mobile shooter game by STYLE NOTE

name: Crystal Guardian
summary: Crystal Guardian is a tower defense game featuring survival and time control elements. Defend the crystal against enemies from different biomes every night, and during the days, gather resources from various biomes to alleviate hunger and thirst, aiming to survive until the 100th day.

name: Criminal Attraction
summary: You are a cunning FBI agent. Four beautiful girls are robbing banks. Infiltrate their gang and let yourself be carried away by your feelings towards them. Love? Hate? Passion? Lust? Find the evidence to frame them and send them to jail, or, fall in love with them!

name: Crashing Not Optional
summary: Race, crash, and battle for supremacy in "Crashing Not Optional"! Short, intense races on treacherous tracks filled with obstacles. Nostalgic couch gaming with up to 4 friends. Who will emerge victorious?

name: Criminal Desires
summary:
The star duo of the precinct, you and your partner are tasked with infiltrating a notorious crime family to bring it down from the inside.

Brought under the wing of a charismatic leader, what you find is far from what you expected. In the criminal underworld, it's difficult to know who you can trust...

name: Crawling Lab
summary: Obtain ammo and upgrade your guns to defeat the Crawling Queen's minions. Escape from the lab.

name: Critical Failure
summary: This is a simple wave-based zombie survival game. The world's first VIDEO GAME CONTROLLED LIVE ACTION SERIES. Be prepared to directly influence the world of CRITICAL FAILURE.

name: Crown Jewelz
summary: Venture into enemy territory to retrieve the Queens precious jewels stolen from your realm.

name: Crusader Kings III: Roads to Power
summary: The glory and might of the Byzantine Empire are yours to command! With new governing systems, new ways to climb the medieval ladder, and new activities for your characters. You can also explore a new exciting lifestyle as a landless Adventurer, seeking fame and glory across the world.

name: Crime Scene Evidence Cleaner
summary:
Crime scene murder mystery is an organized crime story cleaner game, where the desperate need to save your grandmaâ€™s life propels you into the murky world of crime murder cleanup games offline 3d. When the Crime city tycoon real gangster Murder mafia calls, it's time to roll up your sleeves and confront the grim realities of the underworld crime case games district 3d.
With the pressure mounting, you must navigate where crimes committed by free Criminal and small-time crooks in different crime zones. As hospital bills loom large and options dwindle, you're left with no murder choice but to utilize your specialized skills. As a crime scene evidence cleaner detective Equipped with various tools, you'll tackle the gruesome task of solving a case, scrubbing away bloodstains, hiding the evidence, disposing of bodies, and erasing any traces of wrongdoing during the crime detective simulator RPG.

name: Craving
summary: Craving is a pixel art game(poem) about drug addiction, depression an anxiety, with a simple but phisical mechanic which try to represent that suffering. It's just a test of a larger project.

name: Crash Team Rumble: Season 2
summary: Party Mode was the second season of Crash Team Rumble, it began on the 12th of September 2023 and ended on the 5th of December 2023.

name: Crash Team Rumble: Season 3
summary: All Fired Up was the third and final season of Crash Team Rumble, it began on the 7th of December 2023 and ended on the 4th of March 2024. This season was themed around the Spyro series.

name: Cryohazard
summary: Cryohazard is a spooky turn-based strategy rogue-lite. Pilot an upgradeable train caravan into the depths of the hazardous Soul Storm. Fight off the angels that give chase.

name: Crystal Survivor
summary: Defeat your enemies with super powerful charged shots! "Crystal Survivor" is a top-down roguelite arena shooter. Use the crystal's unique attack methods, various weapons, items, and relics to survive.

name: Crystal Nexus: Alien Siege
summary: Dive into the strategic depths of "Crystal Nexus: Alien Siege," where the essence of tower defense merges with the ingenuity of deck-building. Operate from a corporate space station, leveraging your wits and a futuristic arsenal to counter a relentless alien threat.
