name: Creature Match
summary: Creature Hunt Is A point-and-click Matching Game. With 111 unique, hand-drawn creatures, three difficulty levels, and an endless mode, it offers endless fun for all ages. Players can level up by catching numerous creatures, enhancing their gaming experience.

name: Critical Upload
summary: Embark on a fast-paced action journey through space, discovering new weapons and abilities through acquisition and research to better each run. Invite friends to experience it with you!

name: Crazy Kart 2
summary:
This is an online racing car game that has become popular in China, Hong Kong, India, the Philippines, Thailand, and Vietnam. In the Philippines, this game is the largest casual online game with a following exceeding 1 million players.

In this game, players compete with millions of others from all over Indonesia. Crazy Kart offers various racing tracks and diverse vehicle types. Using cute characters, gamers can select fantasy tracks such as outer space, fairy cities, or modern roads like those in China, America, or Formula 1 races. Crazy Kart also provides hundreds of types of cars to choose from, ranging from sedans, jeeps, buses, trucks, race cars, SUVs, and other cool cars. This game was officially accessible starting from April 2009.

name: Crimson Twilight: Undead Lover
summary: You always have your finger on the pulse of local anomalies, folklore, and school scandals, giving you somewhat of a reputation as a meddler. Even the new transfer student, Yusuke Mallory, can't catch a break from your curiosity.

name: Crate Expectations
summary: Crate Expectations is a full megawad of random high concept maps that push limit removing to its limits and maybe the player too! Besides a connecting theme of interactive crates which you will learn about while playing, each map is designed to be totally random and surprising and keep you on your toes - stay sharp!

name: Crank Defense Force
summary: An alien invasion threatens to destroy all life on Playtopia! Crank Defense Force remote missile pilots are the planet's last hope. Defend your cities as long as you can.

name: Crime Investigation
summary: Find the murderer and solve the case.

name: Crazy Miner
summary:
The most exquisite and luxurious miner game in history is here! DIAO Silk instantly became a rich man, and mining has its future! The new "Crazy Miner" allows you to meet the craziest miner, Little Gold? Big gold? Only a screen full of gold would be crazy enough!
House car Alexander? Then donâ€™t let go of crystal diamonds! There is also a machine mining brigade waiting for your orders at any time! You are not mining alone!

name: Crimes: Open Cases
summary: Crimes: Open Cases is a video game offering a series of cases that will put your skills to the test. You will have to investigate crime scenes, complete challenges to get clues, and crack the case based on the information you obtain. In addition, your prestige as an investigator is at stake. Burnish your reputation by earning more points in every challenge and shedding light on the dark secrets of each case.

name: Cruis'n Exotica
summary: Differences from the arcade version include different track layouts, the lack of fully licensed vehicles, and more hidden vehicles.

name: Cruis'n World
summary: Features exclusive to the Nintendo 64 include a new Moon track, a few new modes and some of the vehicles being renamed.

name: Crazy Wife
summary: Your wife locks you in the basement of the house and you have to find a way to escape the house without getting caught by her while doing the objectives to escape.

name: Cruis'n USA
summary:
Cruis'n USA is an arcade racing game originally released in 1994. It was developed by Midway Games and published and distributed by Nintendo. It is the first game in the Cruis'n series and features locations around the United States.

NOTE: The Nintendo 64 version of Cruis'n USA has some differences due to censorship.

name: Crawlspace Multiplayer
summary: A nightmarish playground awaits beneath the floorboards. Join forces with your friends to conquer the crawlspace and retrieve the baby dolls that are trapped in its depths. But watch your back... killer dolls thirst for your fear. In this suffocating battle for survival, teamwork is your only lifeline. Can you mend the ventilation system and escape, or will the crawlspace become your eternal tomb?

name: Crazy Pinball
summary:
The Pinball fever of the 80's in your console!!!

A new arcade machine store has opened in your neighborhood.

The best pinball players are crowding in front of the machines trying to get the best score possible!

Play any of the three new machines in the scene, from the simple but addictive "Wild Saloon" and "Sport Bets" to the biggest challenge known in pinball machines, "Pink world", not for the faint of heart!

Share your records and compete against other players, your scores are saved for the posterity.

Were you penalized in your youth for playing too hard? In Crazy Pinball the machines do not punish strong hits. No fear!

And when you have achieved a record in the three pinball machines, try a hidden arcade classic, too good to be missed!

name: Crappy Dog
summary: Beat Your Highscore! Crappy Dog is one of many Games that tried to rip-off Flappy Bird, this time with dogs!

name: Crab Digger: Tropical Island
summary: Break, Build, Compete: Unleash Your Inner Crab in a Tropical Adventure!

name: Crazy Stunt Driver: Extreme Racing Simulator
summary: Extreme racing with stunts and jumps on dangerous tracks - set new records and take first place in the standings!

name: Crystal Project: Mod Pack 1 - Quality Fun
Crappy Dog 2
summary: Welcome back to Crappy Dog! this time with a 2!

name: Crime Simulator
summary: Youâ€™re out of jail, but the debt isnâ€™t gone. Sneak, steal, and break into houses solo or in 4-player co-op. Use lockpicks, sleeping gas, and brute force to complete jobs, outsmart security, and make enough money before time runs out. Will you pay back what you owe, or lose everything?

name: Crabity
summary: Embark on a cosmic adventure as a duo of two robot crabs stranded in the vastness of space. See the world from a different angle and utilize the power of gravity to escape the space station and return back to Earth!

name: Crown Wars: The Black Prince - Sacred Edition
summary: The War of Crowns rages on. Knights, brigands and a mysterious evil force run rampant throughout the land, sowing destruction. Lead your domain into battle in this turn-based tactics and strategy game.

name: Cricket Captain 2024
summary: Build your own dream team with Cricket Captain 2024. New commentary from Daniel Norcross tells the story of your matches. Honours boards showing every international century and five-wicket hall across all formats at every ground. Score predictor helps you manage your matches.

name: Craft Archeology Simulator: Pyramid to Polar
summary: Explore ancient wonders, dig deep, and rewrite history with every discovery, become a legend in the world of archaeology!

name: Crack it Up!
summary: Crack it Up! is a trading card collecting game. Order booster packs from your 90s computer, crack them up, sell your duplicates and rarest cards for profit and complete your collections!

name: Crossout: Early Access Pack
summary: This pack includes:Unique armored vehicle â€˜Bloodhoundâ€™;Vehicle weapon - 2 â€˜Sledgehammerâ€™ shotguns;Unique character portrait: â€˜Alephâ€™;Paint can: Dark red, Pattern: Scorched Earth;2000 in-game coins.

name: Crazy Penguin Wars
summary: In Crazy Penguin Wars has four players square off in turn-based battles using weapons like a Bazooka, Void Generator, or an Orbital Laser.

name: Crying Room
summary: be sorrow like dev! he just a weirdo... of course and his computer really suck so bad that making game so on low resolution!.... how ironic is that :\

summary: Help Caleb get his girl back. To save her, Caleb needs to brave various locations. Run, Jump and Dash to avoid different type of enemies and make it to your destination.

name: Croquettes Gang
summary: Keep an eye on your master, steal his kibble and achieve your dream!

name: Crossword Go
summary: Looking for some word puzzles to solve? Well, your search is over. Because Crossword GO is the newest, simplest puzzle game on Google Play!

summary:
Welcome to Baldi Basic Education & Learning in School is a quick indie horror game, fully 3D interactive, fun-time educational game that teaches a slew of subjects in baldi's of Basics for Education the difficulties and Learning are great and lovely and the most
This is now the best Features!

You need to collect all 8 of the notebooks and escape the school, all while avoiding
In Basic Education & Learning in School game you need to collect all the laptops, solve the problems correctly and run away from school.
Can you do it?

name: CrossCraze
summary: A fun, modern twist on the classic word game, designed for players who prefer the challenge of a computer opponent (you can also pass-and-play offline with a friend). Place your letters on the board to build crosswords. Use bonus squares to boost your score and take your word play to another level.

name: Crop Crusade
summary: Explore and fight together with your fruit troops in this RTS meets 3D platformer adventure. The game features multiple ways to beat every level while guaranteeing a short but focused experience.

name: Crown's Labyrinth
summary: Travel through different low poly labyrinths using real time tactics to track down the stolen crown before the monarchy crumbles. Stay one step ahead of the culprit using unique abilities to stun, bait and trap.

name: Crunky's Fun Rager
summary: Hop your way through an endless arcade running experience where you complete challenges, collect letters, and defeat the Crunko Pops and anything they may be hiding. The game features tons of Achievements to collect, Stats to track, and Daily Leaderboards to compete against!

name: Crusader's Legacy
summary: Bullet Hell, Fantasy, Action-RPG

name: Crying Crystal
summary: 1: A 3-d character game. 2: Experience the passionate fun of killing monsters. 3: Getting a large number of crystals can improve your ability. 4: Role level up obtainning the corresponding skills.

name: Cryptic Route
summary: "Cryptic Route" begins with the protagonist driving through a rainy night forest. Relying on navigation, each choice influences the outcome of the journey. The multiple ending system offers various results, immersing players into a tale of mystery and horror.

name: Crystal's Castle
summary: 2-D Pixel art retro platformer

name: Crisis in the Kremlin: The Cold War
summary: PERESTROIKA - CONTINUATION OF OCTOBER Crisis... Crisis has caught up with the Motherland of the Revolution and lurks in its very heart - the Kremlin. Lead the country through the most difficult times. "Crisis in the Kremlin" opens up huge prospects for you.

name: Cruelty
summary: "CRUELTY" is a Japanese-made splatter horror. You were in an accident and lost consciousness. The moment you wake up, you find yourself in a nightmare world, one that is not of this Earth. In an abattoir ruled by madness, horrific scenes unfold, and inescapable terror awaits you.

name: Critical Strike Shooter: SWAT Rescue Missions
summary: Become an elite operative, rescue hostages, win glory. Intense rescue missions await!

summary: Send your adversaries to the land of dreams with the Sandman-Set! Lovingly put everyone to sleep with a Pillow whilst looking adorable in your Pajamas. - Customization DLC

summary: Show your spooky side and send your opponents for a run! - Customization DLC

name: Crackin' Smackin: Customization Set - Warrior
summary: Leather, spikes and horns what else could a real warrior need? Show your martial prowess with style! - Customization DLC

name: Crackin' Smackin: Customization Set - Skully
summary: Trophies are not only collected to be hung on a wall! Show them what you got! - Customization DLC

name: Crackin' Smackin: Customization Set - Woodpecker
summary: A feathery appearance for your Caveman! Knock your opponent out with precise smacks! - Customization DLC

name: Cracker
summary: Cracker is a fast-paced arcade game where you have to destroy as many blocks as possible before you run out of lives.

name: Crimson Temple
summary: It is a vanilla DOOM 2 styled map with a bit of atmosphere, some custom atmospheric BGM and a lot of secrets, including a hidden exit - though that exit doesn't lead anywhere special for now, this is just a single map. Id say its between Doom 2 and Plutonia in general difficulty, and takes between 30 minutes and 1 hour to complete.

name: Croakwood
summary: Croakwood is a creative, relaxed town building simulation game about frogs and nature! Design and create structures, plan and decorate towns, and explore an ancient forest to guide the growth of a charming community of tiny amphibians as they settle into their new life in the lush and wild woods.

name: Critter CafÃ©
summary: Welcome to your Critter CafÃ©! Seek out fantastical Critters in need of your help and build a new home together. Renovate your cafÃ©, bond with your Critters, and uncover the secrets of mysterious portals to give every Critter a cosy home.

name: Crescent County
summary: Crash headfirst into this witch-tech open world, drifting and driving on the back of your new motorbroom. Make deliveries, trick out your broom, and race your new friends (and crushes) as the sun sets. Decorate your flat, sort your life out, and discover what it means to find home.

name: Crazy Chewy
summary: A simulator of the handheld game of the same name.

name: Create & Conquer
summary: Create your own (mini)games and play them with friends online. Customize the map, weapons, NPCs, gamerules and more!

name: Crystal Cliffs
summary: This is a medium to hard difficulty single map mixing up puzzles and small scale slaughter

name: Crank It Up!
summary: Crank It Up! was a game on the Arthur page of the PBS Kids website. It was made to promote the episode "D.W. Beats All." The game was removed from the website in October 2018.

name: Crimson Capes
summary: Crimson Capes is a soulslike Action-RPG taking place in a Sword & Sorcery setting. Engage in fluid 2D pixel art swordplay, hunt witches, track monsters and experience the age of high adventure.

name: Creepy Tales
summary: Creepy Tales is a cooperative horror and survival game for 1 to 4 players. The players are orphans in an orphanage run by a priest possessed by an evil entity. Defeat him, survive, and save your friends!

name: Crystal Wish: Bits Collection
summary: Crystal Wish: Bits Collection is a collection of 6 different minigames featuring the many cute girls of Crystal Wish!

name: Crista Caelestis
summary: A 4-player fighting game based on Raknarok Online.

name: Crockpot
summary: Discussion.

name: Cryptica
summary: Cryptica is a narrative-based psychological horror game where the apocalypse is just the beginning. Explore the enigmatic lands of Antarctica and its surrounding areas while the world ends.

name: Creepypasta Land MV Edition
summary: Creepypasta Land MV Edition is the same old Creepypasta Land but with full new graphics, new items, new secrets, new battle system, new maps, extra stories and a lot of new secret stuff!!!

name: Creator
summary: A game/creation tool by Software Creations, shown at Space World 1995 as one of the first Nintendo 64 games. At first, it didn't have any relation to Nintendo's IPs. But it was cancelled in its original form and became the basis of what would later become Mario Paint 64, later Mario Artist: Paint Studio.

name: Crackdown 2: Premium Deluge Pack
summary: The Premium Deluge Pack features the complete Deluge co-op arcade mode where you defend the city zones against ever growing waves of Pacific City bad guys. Try it alone or with up to four players on Xbox LIVE for ever more demanding battles. In addition, the premium pack includes new achievements, avatar awards, and the sixteen-player Capture the Orb mode with 6 arenas.

name: Crash Bandicoot World
summary:
Crash Bandicoot World is a Crash Fan-made game made by me
Looks like cortex have a new plan and crash have to stop him once again before it's Too Late
Join Crash in his new adventure !

name: Crimson Waves on the Emerald Sea: Amaranthine Moon
summary:
Crimson Waves on the Emerald Sea: Amaranthine Moon is the otome standalone sequel to Crimson Waves on the Emerald Sea, a Victorian vampire visual novel previously released in 2021. This visual novel is set around 5-6 years after the events of the first visual novel, following Lucie as the main character now that she's an adult.

Determined to make her own destiny as she turns 18, the young head of her family Lucie plunges headfirst in the conniving world of business dealings. Before she's able to seal the deal on a revolutionary treatment to vampirism, her business partner suddenly dies. Lucie finds herself embroiled in the middle of the mysterious death of her former partner and an event from a decade prior...

name: Crossbow Quest
summary: Whether you're a seasoned gamer looking for a new challenge or someone seeking a relaxing yet engaging experience, Cross Bow Quest promises to deliver an unforgettable adventure. Sharpen your skills, find your zen, and take on the quest of a lifetime.

name: Crash-Land Fantasy
summary: A mysterious magic force knocks your research satellite out of orbit. You crash land and you and your android captain must try to survive on this planet ruled by nature and figure out a way to get home while discovering what caused the force along the way.

name: Crown and Adventure
summary: An open-world adventure RPG game. Choose your favorite character, train your elite legion step by step, and crash all enemies on the battlefield. Strengthen yourself, establish a powerful family, create a great dynasty, and become the dominator of this fantasy world.

name: Cricket Legends
summary: Simple to play, but Difficult to master authentic Cricket Game

name: Crimson Snow Deluxe
summary: CRIMSON SNOW DELUXE: A psychological horror RPG where you destroy the world you've created...

name: CrateMage
summary: CRATES! PUZZLES! MAGIC!! Bewitch Boxes & Puzzle Puzzles to become the one CrateMage to rule them all as you escape from a Crate infested dungeon filled with all manner of Crate contraptions, Magical Trinkets & LAVA! (No really, there is a lot of lava, like far too much lava).

name: Creep Kick
summary: Creep Kick was an unlicensed clone game of Kick the Buddy which replaced Buddy with the Creeper from Minecraft.

name: Crazy Bike Hill Racing
summary: Crazy Bike Hill Racing: Unleash Your Inner Daredevil

name: Crimson Tides of Tethyr: Enhanced Edition
summary: A remaster of the classic Hall of Fame module for Neverwinter Nights: Enhanced Edition. A 20-hour adventure with a colorful cast of characters, epic war storyline, and tactically challenging encounters inspired by Baldur's Gate, this enhanced edition features rewritten dialogue, visual improvements, bug fixes, new systems and quality-of-life improvements, a new hour of gameplay content, and 100 new lines of voiced dialogue.

name: Crysis Maximum Edition
summary: Crysis Maximum Edition includes Crysis and the new sequel Crysis Warhead. This epic story takes players into a changing environment, forcing them to adapt their tactics and conquer battlefields ranging from newly frozen jungles to gravity-free alien environments. Includes multiplayer such as Crysis Wars, a new multiplayer experience featuring new online game modes and 21 maps. 7 new maps are available for online combat.

name: Crossybara
summary: Small-Leaf the Capybara lost the fruit he was going to bring to the hot spring to stack ontop of his head! can you help him scavenge for the lost fruit and save the day? Crossybara: Nonogram Slam! is a new take on the regular Nonogram/Picross puzzle, Instead of solving the puzzle to reveal a picture, you are solving to reveal the level. loads of enjoyable platforming gameplay with a side dish of brain-bamboozling puzzles!

name: Crazy Crab
summary: Crazy Crab is a pac-man variant. The player controls a spider-monster and must gobble up all insects in the top-down maze. Each insect eaten earns the player points. The player is chased by four horrors that must be avoided. When the player eats a green insect he briefly gains the power to defeat the horrors. If the player manages to eat four horrors within five seconds an extra life is won allowing the player to score even more points. There are twelve game variations with different maze layouts, insect locations, and game speeds.

name: Cross Brawl
summary: Embark on thrilling battles solo or with friends in our fast-paced game! Unlock a plethora of weapons, skills, and gadgets. Collect stunning skins to stand out. Explore mysterious locations and engage in epic battles like never before!

name: Crazy World of Caleb: Level 1 to 7
summary: Experience the start of Caleb's difficult journey. For more get Crazy World of Caleb.

name: Crowded. Followed.
summary: You have the briefcase. Now it's after you. It's not going to stop. Be carefulâ€”it may take the form of someone else. A short horror game by NIGHT DIAL.

name: Croatan
summary: The last place truly beyond the reach of intergalactic capitalism.

name: Croak Cafe: From Pond to Plate
summary: Croak Cafe: From Pond to Plate is a thrilling roguelike game where you craft dishes under time pressure to serve demanding frogs. Upgrade your skills and face challenging bosses in this fast-paced culinary adventure. Can you become the ultimate chef?

name: Creeping Dusk
summary: Creeping Dusk is a tower defense game. Build a town around an abandoned gold mine and defend against monsters that swarm the area. Fortify your defenses, and prepare for the increasingly challenging nights. Will you be able to protect your town from the encroaching darkness?

name: Crypto Skoof Tycoon
summary: Click on the sloppy guy, earn money and spend it on increasing your media influence and reputation to become a real crypto scammer. Decorate your table with the most valuable artifacts. Get rich from promises and become the blogger you hate so much!

name: Crazy Stars: Sport Climbing
summary: Climb the wall&reach for the top! Join adorable characters on an adventure to reach the highest heights. Play 1P or with up to 4P in innovative&fun climbing game!

name: Crymachina: Trinity Set
summary: A set of Trinity-centric content. Allows the following to be controlled as playable characters: ãƒ»Hayat ãƒ»Vida ãƒ»Can

name: Crymachina: Standard Uniform Set
summary: A three-item set of school uniform costumes. Includes the following: ãƒ»Standard Uniform (Leben) ãƒ»Standard Uniform (Mikoto) ãƒ»Standard Uniform (Ami)

name: Crime City
summary: Want to build a Criminal Empire and crush your rivals? Become the toughest Mob Boss in Crime City! Rise through the ranks of the mafia and take over the city! Build up your hood, do jobs, and fight other players!

name: Crossed Commands: Collision
summary: Crossed Command: Collision is a 2D pixel-art strategy game. You take charge of mighty mechs to defeat formidable foes, gathering new parts to assemble your own mechs and face even tougher enemies.

name: Croissant
summary: Croissant is a clicker game, click the Croissant to gain even more Croissant! By spending time on the game, or by clicking on the Croissant, you can obtain skins. Collect them or trade them to expand your new collection.

name: Creatures of Ava: WDC Charity Backpack Trinkets Set
summary: Want to help save wildlife on our planet as well? Buy this DLC to support an organization that helps endangered species. 11 bit studios will donate 81% of Net Receipts from sales of this DLC to WDC, Whale and Dolphin Conservation. WDC is a UK registered charity (no. 1014705).

name: Crow-Sourcing
summary: A game that requires a Twitch chat. The streamer's chat votes on what they want the streamer to draw. The chat then votes on whether the streamer's drawing is a pass or a fail.

name: Crispy Chicken Speedmap Session 02
summary: The second installment of a speedmapping event taking place in Clippy's discord server. The wonderful recolours by @JimmyÂ² from his Zoon-tech subset of Zoon-tex were used and some things were painted by mappers to fit resulting in 12 total maps.

name: Creatures of Ava: Deluxe Backpack Trinkets Set
summary: Get ready for an adventure on the planet Ava with a set of unique backpack trinkets.

name: Creatures of Ava: Deluxe Edition
summary: Creatures of Ava: Deluxe Edition includes a set of trinkets to hang on your backpack. The bundle also consists of the original soundtrack and artbook.

name: Crayola Paint 'n Play Pony
summary:
Create and Care for the Virtual Pony, Horse or Unicorn of Your Dreams! (Ages 5 - 10)
Learn all about horses as you color, decorate, and dress their own horses, ponies, or unicorns!
Tons of Creative Activities: Color with 48 Crayola colors.
Decorate with pretty accessories such as flowers and bows. Dress your pony in over 100 fashions.
Learn fun facts about horses and ponies!

name: Craz'D: 13th Anniversary Edition
summary:
The 13th anniversary edition adds balance changes, improved boss battles, bugfixes, quality-of-life features, support for more operating systems, mail nerds and also egg.

The changes are designed to improve the flow of the gameplay while altering the experience as little as possible.

Longtime fan, friend, and mentor the Oddwarg created this version of the game.

name: Creaturemin
summary: Creaturemin is an upcoming Pikmin 2 Mod that aims to change the game completely! Featuring all new mechanics, six pikmin types, enemies, and areas. New quality of life features like enhanced disbanding and organisation, as well as Master Ship storage.

name: Crazy Taxi M-12
summary:
Try to clear the course as fast as you can! Drive the crazy taxi down the course and score points by crashing into the cars with the correct number on them.

Each course will give you a number that determines which cars to hit. You can only score when you crash into a car that is a multiple of the given number. Each course looks for multiples of different numbers, so youâ€™ll want to study up on your times tables!

name: Crimes of Passion
summary: Crimes of Passion, Book 1 is the first book of the Crimes of Passion series. It is followed by Crimes of Passion, Book 2 and Crimes of Passion, Book 3.

name: Crimes of Passion II
summary: Crimes of Passion, Book 2 is the second book of the Crimes of Passion series. It succeeds its first book, Crimes of Passion, Book 1 and is followed by Crimes of Passion, Book 3.

name: Crimes of Passion: The Proposal
summary: Crimes of Passion: The Proposal is a short form special of the Crimes of Passion series.

name: CrisisX
summary: Immerse yourself into a realistic open world experience and find your way out in the ruins of a dying world. Survive the threats from the Infected, the living and most importantly, the wilderness. Fight or cooperate with others, and build your own territory. Build your own new post-apocalyptic world.

name: Creatures
summary: Creatures for the PlayStation was developed by Elo Interactive Media GmbH and published by Swing! Entertainment Media AG in 7 December 2001

name: Crimes of Passion III
summary: Crimes of Passion, Book 3 is the third book of the Crimes of Passion series. It succeeds its first two books, Crimes of Passion, Book 1 and Crimes of Passion, Book 2.

name: Crazy Corn
summary: Crazy Corn is an addictive clicker game where your clicking skills can lead you to unimaginable riches! Improve your level, automate your income and unlock new items.

name: Croak
summary: Croak is a nimble -and challenging- precision platformer featuring an innovative grapple mechanic. Use the princeâ€™s tongue to dash and bounce around through hundreds of hand-crafted rooms. Manipulate the environment as you traverse distinct biomes, each with unique gameplay mechanics and bosses.

name: Crankventure Capitalist
summary: You wake up in a cold sweat and your mom is gone!! The only thing you know is...that kidnapper up there on screen must have taken her! Go! Be a good kid! Help HERRRR!

name: Cristiano Ronaldo: Kick'n'Run
summary: Would you like to step into the boots of Cristiano Ronaldo, one of the best soccer players in the world? Experience the sensation of shooting and running like CR7 in this unique game of skill and precision! Connect to Facebook, strive for the highest scores, and you may end up competing against none other than Cristiano Ronaldo himself!

name: Crystal Project: Mod Pack 2 - New Challenges
Croc: Legend of the Gobbos
summary:
Argonaut Games, the legendary studio known for bringing its pioneering 3D technology to a 2D gaming world in the 1980s, has returned after a 20 year hiatus. It became a household name to gamers worldwide by developing groundbreaking titles, including the classics Starglider and Starglider 2, the seminal Star Fox (in collaboration with Nintendo), and Croc Legend of the Gobbos.

The reborn Argonaut Games continues the legacy established by Jez San OBE in 1982, now as a boutique publisher driven by creativity and developer collaboration. Possessing a catalog of classic gaming IP combined with a roadmap of original games, we hope you will join us as we embark on this exciting new chapter in Argonautâ€™s history.

Additionally, retro-gaming fans will be excited to know that the remaster includes the Crocipedia, an extensive and meticulously curated digital museum containing long-lost development assets, such as game design documents, concept art, animation tests, team member interviews, and much more.

name: Crime Boss: Rockay City - Cagnali's Order
summary:
Resist Cagnaliâ€™s Order!
A new threat is coming to Rockay City as the police force cooperates with a new rival â€“ Cagnali Industries!

Stop Cagnaliâ€™s high-tech armyâ€™s rapid advancements before Rockay City becomes a totalitarian dystopia. Fight against a robot army in new big heists with brand new story, enemies, soundtrack and more!

name: Crime Boss: Rockay City - Tactical Weapon Pack
summary:
Up your strategy game with the first Tactical Weapon Pack for Crime Boss: Rockay City, including the following firearms:

â€¢ Slate 36: A semi-automatic rifle which will help you taking over Rockay City!
â€¢ Fiver Tactical: This handgun is a beauty of its own and will be with you until the end.
â€¢ Bohema: Who does not like an automatic pistol, which you can easily sneak into any bank?
â€¢ Urban Sweeper: Do you need to win an argument on the streets? This shotgun will be your best friend!

name: Crab Wave
summary:
Game created to take part in the Enchant Jam.

Crab Wave is a top-down twin-stick shooter with leveling up systems and permadeath. In the game, you control a crab armed with a gun. That's pretty much it.

name: Crasho Cars
summary: In Crasho Cars, race through the desert while evading obstacles and police cars that crash into each other. Collect money and power-ups to survive longer. The goal is simple: stay alive as long as you can in this high-speed, chaotic chase!

name: Creepy Pomni
summary: Overcome obby challenges and puzzles, get through rooms of horror in a digital circus. Try not to get caught by Pomni, Jax, Caine and Gangle who have gone crazy.

name: Crystal Guardians
summary: Crystal Guardians is a cute pixel art beat 'em up game! Recover more pieces of the crystal shards from the clutches of the final boss. As our heroes vanquish armies of monsters, they must defend the last crystal shard.

name: Creative Kill Chamber 2
summary: Help Monty break his friend Kenji out of the Kill Chamber by using various ways to dispatch and kill your enemies!

name: Crash Dive 2: East Indies Expansion Pack
summary: Includes one campaign, two new mission areas, three new ships, one new plane, and more!

name: Crossing Miracles
summary: "Crossing Miracles" is a 3D shooter from northwest China, set in a zombie-ravaged post-apocalyptic world. Drive a unique tricycle through a detailed rural setting and battle relentless zombies in a thrilling survival adventure.

name: CramunhÃ£o: A Sigil Tribute
summary: CramunhÃ£o is a tribute to John Romero's Sigil. It replaces the 4th episode of The Ultimate Doom. Inspired by the works of John Romero on Sigil, it started out as a single maps contest emulating the mechanics of Sigil, but ended up evolving into a full episode community project. It has contributions from well known mappers such as Daniel (NeoDoom, Final NeoDoom) and Deadwing (Ozonia, Moonblood), just as newcomers like Sca, who has made his first map ever for this mod (and also one inspired in the hospital his first son was born, at that very day).

name: Crusader of Aurium
summary: Aurium is a mini-adventure that was presented at the MiniComp2 contest organized by the CAAD, but at the last minute, after a small discussion, it was disqualified. And this was not done because of anything special about the game itself, but because the contest was about conversational adventures and this was a graphic, hence the discussions that arose.

name: Croc Cannon
summary: Feed three crocs using your cannon to win the game.

name: Creepy Crawlers
summary: Steer through the maze and eat opponents smaller than you. Grow in size by eating an enemy or a bus. To make your opponents shorter, you can nibble away at their tail. If your opponent is the same size as you or longer, you'll be eaten!

name: Crazy Traffic: City Parking Simulator
summary:
Take a ride in a police service vehicle and take your driving skills to the next level, coping with various tasks in difficult conditions. The game offers many levels, each of which is full of dangerous obstacles and difficult tasks. You will have to manoeuvre in a limited space, go around obstacles and accurately park a service vehicle, be it a car, a truck or a heavy van. Assess your skills in practice, because the more difficult the level, the higher your demands on attentiveness and driving technique!

Each car has its own characteristics, which requires you to adapt and develop the right strategy for successful parking. Become the best police driver and earn points for quickly and accurately completing tasks. Go through all the tests and discover the secrets of perfect parking.

name: Croaktopia
summary: Cozy game where you can farm, build, and fight as a cute frog!

name: Crown & Capital
summary: As the new ruler of a kingdom recovering from fiscal ruin, your job is to keep the torches lit and replenish the treasury. Learn to manage your finances by budgeting for your needs, wants, and savings to make your people thrive and your neighbors respect the legacy of the kingdom you will build!

name: Crash Car Mania
summary: Take part in the death race in this game. Ride fast and crash cars of your rivals. It will be harder with each new level. But you can upgrade your car and open new abilities, it will help you. Roar of the engine and clang of metal will not leave you indifferent.

name: Crazy Candy
summary: Crazy Candy is a Card Game similar to Crazy 8's. Big Difference is that you play Solo.

name: Creta
summary: Made for Game Maker Italia's TERROROCTOBER jam 2020, developed with Game Maker Studio 2.3 and heavily inspired by a movie called "The Navidson Record".

name: Crimson Thread of Fate
summary: It's almost time for your reincarnation! With the help of Moira, enter the path of reincarnation and meet certain someone there. Hey, maybe he will be your soulmate in your next life. Who knows? You decide!

name: Crown of Ashes and Flames
summary:
Crown of Ashes and Flames is a fantasy interactive fiction game, free to play on pc and mobile! You play as the only remaining member of the royal family of Vesphire; living in the home of the man that took away everything from you.

It is currently in development and each chapter will be released as they are finished.

name: CrapShoot
summary: Kick the crap out of them! Side-scrolling bullet-hell shooter.

name: Craig 12: Craig's Escape
summary: Oh no! Craig was taken away! You must help him get to safety, or else...

name: Croaka-Crawla
summary: Croaka-Crawla is a clone of the arcade game Frogger where the player must control a frog and get him to the other side of a road and river. The game is viewed from above and the first thing to cross is a busy road full of traffic scrolling across the screen. You can move left, right or forward as you dodge the traffic to reach a river bank. Once the road has been survived then a river must be crossed by jumping on logs or the backs of turtles that scroll across the screen as well. Once you reach the other side of the river you must jump into a gap and occasionally a baby frog or flies appears for extra points. If you get hit by a vehicle, fall into the river, or touch the sides of the screen then you lose one of three lives. Before the game you can change the speed of the game (1-100) with 1 being the fastest.

name: Croquet Conundrum
summary: Croquet Conundrum is a compact puzzle game about hitting a ball through wickets and pipes to explore a world of interconnected islands. A small number of mechanics inspired by the real rules of croquet combine together to create challenging puzzles that will test your logic and reasoning.

name: Crimsonwood
summary: Crimsonwood is a roguelike top-down shooter in a cursed national park. Collect various weapons, gain perks and battle hordes of enemies to survive. Play solo or online co-op.

name: Cross Hearts Arcadia
summary:
Researching an ancient ruin, Nirva hears a strange voice that leads him to an "egg" deep in the ruin which he takes home.
In time, that egg turns into a curious fairy.
The fairy named Tylt asks Nirva to travel to the Genesis Sanctuary together...
A fantasy RPG where you set off from the floating continent Nirva calls home with his mysterious fairy Tylt on an adventure to find the Genesis Sanctuary!

name: Crash Puzzle Hammer-San
summary:
A full-fledged action puzzle game with simple controls!
A massive 300 stages!
Includes an edit feature to create your own stages!

name: Creepy Shift: Roadside Diner
summary: A broke young man takes on the night shift at a roadside diner. In the glow of the blood moon, routine tasks turn into a fight for survival. First-person horror based on a dark creepypasta with a set of rescue rules.

name: Croak Crusader: Spawn of the Spore Spectre
summary: Croak Crusader: Spawn of the Spore Spectre is a 2D action platformer with a real focus on speed, Tarantino-style violence, and a wicked grapple feature that lets ya zip around like an acrobat, eh! This is a prequel chapter for Croak Crusader: the Champion of Canada, and the full gameâ€™s gonna have, like, five times the content of this demo, buddy! So buckle up, â€˜cause youâ€™re in for a wild one, donâ€™tcha know!

name: Cryptid Time
summary: Follow TiÃªn through the forest as she meets her old cryptid friends for the last time.

name: Cronos: The New Dawn
summary: Cronos: The New Dawn is a pulse-pounding, third-person survival horror game that throws you into the heart of a deadly struggle against overwhelming foes, all while uncovering the mysteries of a twisted time travel story.

name: Crowded Mysteries 2: Winter Romance
summary: Unleash your inner detective in Crowded Mysteries 2 Winter Romance, an icy sequel where winter's chill adds a thrilling twist to crime-solving. Have fun as you unravel mysteries, collect clues, and find out what love and broken hearts can make people do, in the snow-covered Mystery City!

name: Creature Packets
summary:
Creature Packets is a game about cooking tiny creatures. Using a microwave, you can bring creatures from packets to life. Use blender to explore new substance packages to cook even more creatures.

The game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 56 on the theme "tiny creatures".

name: Cross Edge Dash
summary: An Xbox 360 version titled "Cross Edge Dash" was released in Japan on October 1, 2009.

name: Crash / Impact / Contact
summary: A stone falls into a desert and is surrounded by life. Understanding comes with effort, at a cost.

name: Crust Shump
summary: CRUST PUNK SHOOT 'EM UP. BLAST BEAT BULLET HELL. HARDCORE ANARCHO ARCADE ACTION. BRUTAL, BLEAK, SHORT AND INTENSE. NO SCORE, NO LEADERBOARDS, NO GODS, NO MASTERS. CAVE MEETS NAPALM DEATH.

name: Crossclimb
summary:
Unlock a trivia ladder.

Guess the answer to each clue. Reorder the rows to form a word ladder, where each word differs by one letter. Finish the top and bottom rows after they are unlocked to complete the puzzle.

name: Crispy Chicken Speedmap Session 04
summary: Full 32 map megawad of autumn/fall goodness brought to you by the fine folks at @Clippy's Crispy Chicken Chillzone discord. Expect a lot of black and orange, healthy mix of natural, gothic and techbase environments, and a approachable difficulty for the most part.

name: Crater Song
summary: Crater Song is a single-player co-op puzzle-adventure game with an authentic 8-bit aesthetic that takes place on the alien world of Orebody. Two twins, born of song, must embark on a mythic journey to lift a curse that makes them the target of eldritch horrors from beyond the stars.

name: Cryptic Crawlz
summary:
Cryptic Crawlz: Dive into the depths of an enigmatic dungeon where mystery and danger lurk at every turn. Combining the thrilling action of a Hack-and-Slash RPG with the cerebral challenges of a point-and-click adventure,

Cryptic Crawlz offers a unique gaming experience. Embark on a journey filled with dark secrets, treacherous puzzles, and formidable foes as you navigate the labyrinthine corridors. Unravel the cryptic lore and conquer sinister adversaries in this spellbinding fusion of Hack-and-Slash combat and intricate puzzle-solving. Are you prepared to uncover the secrets that lie beneath?

name: Crimson Chaos
summary: Choose your path, make critical decisions, and find love amidst the chaos. Will you unravel the mysteries of the night or fall prey to the shadows?

name: Creepy Claus
summary: Itâ€™s your first day on the job in Santaâ€™s workshop, but itâ€™s already off to a bad start. Santa isnâ€™t impressed with your work, and now heâ€™s chasing you down. The only way out? WRAP THE PRESENTS the job is simple :)

name: Crystalfall
summary:
Hack 'N' Slash Action RPG in a Steampunk World

Take on the role of a convict who has been thrown into the dungeons by a powerful ruling organization. Embark on a journey through a world devastated by a mysterious asteroid, scattering powerful crystal shards across distinct world zones brimming with mutated creatures and steampunk enemies.

Delve into post-apocalyptic dungeons that randomize upon each visit and ascend to new heights of power with epic loot, extensive talent tree progression, theorycrafting and lootable skills.

name: Crimes Against Slimes
summary:
Crimes Against Slimes is a game where you fight against the never-ending slime hordes, gain upgrades as you level up, and do whatever you can to survive as long as you can.

It is a survival game where all you can do is run away and shoot the enemies that constantly hunt you down. At first, the slime horde might seem unbeatable but the stronger you get the more you formidable an opponent you become!

name: Crimson Asylum
summary: As a paranormal investigator fueled by curiosity and a thirst for the unknown, you've been dared to enter the abandoned halls of Crimson Asylum.

name: Creepy Waves FM: Bugs Fixer
summary: A young and promising boy applies for a job at a AAA game development company. As he starts working night shifts on probation, he experiences a series of events that could lead to no good. As the story unfolds, you will be able to choose what you would do in his place.

name: Crowpoint Manor
summary: Step inside Crowpoint Manor, where every guest harbours a dark secret. As an undercover detective, youâ€™ll solve bizarre puzzles, navigate dangerous traps, and witness hilariously tragic accidents.

name: Crowd Run
summary: Stop the hordes of enemies and defend your castle!

name: Crazy Tanks
summary: Crazy Tanks is a Free to play game where bullets bounce of walls, maps have movable crates, and there are Heal and shield Power-Ups in a Free For all Round with up to 10 players to see who is the best one.

name: Critter Gang
summary: Squeak! Chitter! Chatter! Youâ€™ll send these mafia members to heaven on a silver platter! You play as a red squirrel trained in the martial arts of crankinâ€™ out kunais and shwinginâ€™ shurikens! Youâ€™ll teach three very important lessons to three unlearned delinquents!

name: Crab Game 2
summary: Crab Game 2 is a multiplayer PvP game with up to 30 players where you have to survive different mini games to be the last one standing.

name: Cradle of Nightmares: Chapter 1
summary: You play as Faust, an agent of the secret organization Nostra Edemas. Using time-travel technology, your mission is to bring justice to the most heinous killers of the pastâ€”both the infamous and those whose crimes remain untold by history. 18+

name: Critter Town
summary: A short horror story inspired by Animal Crossing for the DS, nostalgia for the 2000s and old creepypasta.

name: Crash Bandicoot 4: N. Hanced
summary: A mod for Crash 4 designed to make completion and general gameplay more fair and more fun. It aims to fix the flaws and weaker elements of the completion system and level designs to make the game into a better version of itself.

name: Crispy Chicken Speedmap Session 5: Paint It Doom
summary: Brought to you as usual by the good folks at @Clippy's Crispy Chicken Chillzone, it's time for Crispy Chicken Speedmap Session 5! Nineteen maps were made in under 5 hours between November 22 and 24. Enjoy the brief respite before the Christmas season in the best Paint It Doom + Wireframe Texture Pack style. From plenty of doomcute to abstract landscapes, from cozy virtual techbases to all-out slaughtermaps, there's something for everyone.

name: Crazy Shipping
summary: Crazy Shipping is a free-to-play space trading and logistics management game. Players run a transportation company using ships piloted by cats, delivering cargo and passengers between stations across the solar system. The game features a risk-reward system where players balance legitimate deliveries against more profitable but risky "hot" cargo, while managing station alert levels and random events. Progress is made by expanding your fleet, purchasing stations, and upgrading facilities using currency earned through gameplay and optional in-game purchases.

name: Crazy Voyage
summary: Enter this journey and help your pilot to destroy all kinds of opponents that will stand in his way in 6 different worlds. A vertical shooting game with the aim of destroying obstacles and reaching the defined distance to detonate the boss of each level. Travel in this universe of oddities!!!

name: Craftlings
summary: Inspired by legendary classics from the â€™90s, Craftlings will take you on a journey full of strategic decisions and test your skills in optimizing automated production chains and Craftlingsâ€™ paths. Gather, deliver, build, and fight for wealth and glory in the unique, nostalgic world of Craftlings.

name: Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled: Nitro Tour Grand Prix
Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled: Back N. Time Grand Prix
Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled: Spyro N. Friends Grand Prix
Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled: Spooky Grand Prix
Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled: Neon Circus Grand Prix
Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled: Winter Festival Grand Prix
Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled: Rustland Grand Prix
summary: Themed on a post-apocalyptic desert world.

name: Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled: Gasmoxia Grand Prix
summary: Themed on science-fiction and a fast-food war above Gasmoxia.

name: Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled: Post-Grand Prix
summary: Update themed around Beenox's brand colors

name: Crusty Proto
summary:
Unknown incomplete and glitchy game, with build date roughly around 1997, found in a pack of CD bought in a garage lot.
It tries to mimic Resident Evil very hard, as it was big hit at the time.

Though in this state, i think i know who to blame, why it didn't make it to release...

name: CrimeBot 2: Unsolved Cold Case
summary: Become a detective in CrimeBot 2 and travel the world solving criminal cases. You'll have only your logic and intuition to analyze dossiers filled with clues, suspect profiles, and photographs. Can you catch the culprit?

name: Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled: Xfinity Flash Kart
Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled: Kids Sticker Pack
Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled: Gummy Grinder Wheels
Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled: Cove Cruiser Kart Body + Tropic Swirl Decal
Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled: Mint Burst Paint Job
Cryptogamous Flowers
summary:
An immortality experiment gone horribly wrong at a plant factory. A husband and a wife that could never be separated.
Cryptogamous organisms -- the black spore disease -- and the female researcher that never thought she'd be pregnant.
Maria, the purity in a world devoid of it. An aberration.

Those three stories will intersect.

name: Crony Corp
summary: Build your empire in a competitive world shaped by supply, demand, & shady deals. In Crony Corp, youâ€™ll buy & manufacture goods in a live market that responds to every playerâ€™s actions. Trade smart, undercut rivals, bend the rules, and climb the corporate ladder. Just donâ€™t expect fair play.

name: Crash Presents: July 1989
summary: Covertape compilation included with Crash Magazine issue 66. Included were four full ZX Spectrum games, including the original release of 'Quondam', later published by Ocean, and 'A Whole New Ball Game.'

name: Cropolution
summary: In Cropolution, you're not just a farmerâ€”you're a pioneer in the future of agriculture! Join forces with a team of scientists as you experiment and evolve entirely new species of crops, bugs, and fish. Will you rise to the challenge and revolutionize the world's ecosystems?

name: Cryst
summary: In this action-packed game, unknown creatures invade a factory and steal diamond pieces. Your mission is to play through exciting stages, recover the missing pieces of diamond scattered across various locations, and restore them to the factory.

name: Crystal Rail
summary:
A rail-roguelike train game with a handpainted artstyle set in a crystalpunk fantasy world. Create a train and make deliveries to strike it rich, but every few turns, a revolution overthrows the government, changes the rules and eliminates the poorest teams! Last one standing wins!

Taking equal inspiration from roguelike deckbuilders and modern board games, Crystal Rail offers an addictive, unique spin on the strategy roguelike, with a cast of iconic conductors all based on extinct animals.

name: Crafter
summary:
Welcome to the world of crafting and adventure!

In Crafter, you step into the shoes of a skilled medieval artisan. Collect materials, master your crafting techniques, and run your own shop in this hybrid casual mobile game with idle and RPG elements. Whether youâ€™re crafting powerful weapons, enchanting mystical artifacts, or managing your customersâ€™ satisfaction, your journey as an artisan is packed with fun and strategy.

name: Criteria
summary: This game plunges players into a cold and snowy world, where they take on the role of a black ghost, moving forward through the icy landscape.

name: Crown Simulator: Royal Life simulation
summary: Crown Simulator â€” a royal life simulation where every decision shapes the fate of your kingdom! Manage your army, strengthen relations with neighbors, care for your people and treasury. Can you maintain balance and become a great ruler? Make your choices and rule!

name: Crypt's Game
summary: You are out in the woods, in search of the entity known as Crypt. Stopping in your tracks, you see it approaching. You take aim with your shotgun, intending to kill it, when suddenly the ground beneath you gives way, dropping you down into the earth. You find yourself trapped in Crypts dungeon where it will play a twisted game of Cat and Mouse. Killing it is the only way out, will you survive?

name: Crosstown Carnage
summary:
Crosstown Carnage is 1 large map that was originally conceived as a mini-episode.
After clearing the aliens out of the West Coast of the USA, Duke heads back east to start the cleanup there. From the tops of skyscrapers, Duke will have to navigate the city's old subway system to find where the Battlelord has been hiding.

Crosstown Carnage contains two new alien types: the Freeze Trooper and the Expander Trooper. The Freeze Trooper fires freezer blasts at Duke. These pack a punch, but won't immediately kill you. The Expander Trooper fires blasts of microwaves which will fry Duke. Hit enough, and Duke expands until he explodes. Both may drop their respective ammo when they die.

name: Crushed
summary: Coreyâ€™s winter break gets a lot more interesting when the love of his life, ahem, his newest crush moves to Thomastown. Can he convince the new kid to give him a chance or will he fumble at love once again?

name: Crimson Incursion
summary: Crimson Incursion thrusts you into the heart of a futuristic battlefield on a distant colony. Command a diverse array of war platforms and unleash your innate prowess to dominate your foes. Inspired by the iconic mech-based games of the early '90s and 2000s.

name: Cryptid
summary: An intentionally unbalanced Balatro mod.

name: Crazy School: Schulverweis!
summary:
Crazy School: Schulverweis! is exactly the same game as Gefeuert! Dein letzter Tag... just in a school instead of a office. The player takes the role of a pupil who wants to cause as much chaos as possible. With simple point & click controls the player walks trough the levels and uses the various items to play his pranks, e.g. knocking over a bucket or tearing apart a notebook. For some actions he needs to collect and use another item, e.g. toilet paper to clog a toilet.

Every action takes time and is rewarded with points, more complicated or mean ones give more. So the main goal for a level is to beat the highscore in a limited time. When the player gets caught he has to absolve a mini game of Hangman where he has to guess words in a limited time and in limited tries. The campaign consists of 21 levels and the player can choose his gender and the names of the NPCs.

name: Cracky Mini
summary: A stripped-down version of Cracky, with stages modified to fit smaller screens; notably, this version reduces the number of floors from 6 to 4.

name: Crystal Quest
summary: The puzzles include a tile-matching memory game and a timed top-down maze sprint (find the exit before the time runs out). In each subsequent area, the difficulty of these puzzles increases, and the amount of clothes the demi-humans wear after a puzzle has been solved decreases.

name: cr4nkup
summary: Cr4nkup is a cycling program that combines real training and elements from the gaming world in a huge virtual world. Train online with your friends from all over the world and compete in various competitions.

name: Cruft
summary: Cruft is a 2D, pixel-art crafting game. It has a minimalist aesthetic and boasts tons of crafting recipes. While moment-to-moment play is open-ended, it features a prestige system that grants bonuses on future playthroughs.

name: Crestfall
summary: Turn based strategy game of capture the flag. All pieces are hidden at the start

name: CruiSim
summary:
CruiSim is a new, upcoming, realistic ship simulator game where you can steer large, breathtaking cruise ships with amazing graphics.
Shipping companies like AIDA, MSC or Carribean are represented.

name: Cra Cra
summary: It's an incremental game with mechanics inspired by clicker games. Turn the crank to generate energy (Wh) and compete for the time it takes to charge the battery to 10,000GWh (you can continue after that).

name: Crown of Exile
summary:
When your village is razed to the ground, youâ€™re left fleeing with an exiled prince. You can trust no one but each other. Your fatherâ€™s dying wish was to protect the prince, but can you really trust a man who was exiled from his kingdom?

Journey across the borders in search of allies. But in this deadly game of treachery and deceit, there is more than just the princeâ€™s life at stake. Will you flee from the past that haunts you or will you embrace the fate that awaits you?

The decision is yours.

name: Crescent Overload
summary: An Action 3D Platformer set inside a virtual cyberscape. Control AL.exe and mend a corrupted program as you traverse drives with her unique Gear Scythe.

name: Crab Crawl
Crisis Command
summary: Blast your way through over 6 stages of mayhem to rescue civilians and push those robots out. Use their own powers against them and help reclaim peace to the island.

name: Crashed
summary: Crashed is a third-person stealth game where you play as B.O.B., stranded on the quirky planet SnamSam. The mission? Rebuild the craft and escape! You'll sneak through restricted areas and take daring routes. A splash of humour as B.O.B.'s detachable head knocks off the Snailmen's heads!

name: Crossovertale
summary:
Play as Frisk all grown up after the ending of Undertale.

FIGHT or SPARE your way through a brand new world, where characters from all across the video game multiverse come together and wage battle

name: Crime Opera II: The Floodgate Effect
summary:
Experience a new chapter in the mafia tale surrounding the Gallos family! This story begins 9 years after the original. Xander Gallo is now bitter, alone and out of control. Heâ€™s causing problems for not only other families within the syndicate but also for younger Gallo members as well. Those who remained behind to continue the family legacy are soon forced to take sides with or against Xander Gallo, while others who have seemingly moved on with their lives are pulled back in against their will.

This is a tale of loyalty and deceit, murder and survival, as well as the strength or frailty of familial bonds. As a visual novel, Crime Opera II: The Floodgate Effect allows players the option of witnessing events in linear â€œkineticâ€ fashion or to affect how the narrative progresses by making key decisions along the way, all depicted with meticulously hand-drawn character portraits, a wide variety of scenes and scenarios to explore, original backgrounds and a soundtrack to fit the brooding and dangerous atmosphere.

name: Crime Opera Fandisk: The Caterpillar Candids
summary: Experience a special chapter in the ongoing mafia tale surrounding the infamous Gallos family!

name: Croak Crusader: The Champion of Canada
summary: Do you dare save the Land of the Maple Leaf? Croak Crusader is a fast-paced, momentum-based action platformer featuring tight controls, explosive combat, and a versatile grapple mechanic.

name: Crank
summary: An incremental game about being locked in a room, forced to move a crank until you're allowed to leave.

name: Create: Above and Beyond
summary:
Create: Above and Beyond adds a variety of mods and compiles them into an epic technological journey toward space travel.

About fifty inventions lie between you and the moon. Thousands of components will flow into and through the ever-growing sequence of your machines, providing the means to explore the next level of technology.

Your entire factory will be put to a test as final products flow into the Data Centre, programming the Guidance computer of your Spaceship. Every step of the way is different, some may even differ depending on the generation seed of your World.

name: Crisis in the Kremlin
summary: Donâ€™t let the Soviet Union collapse, and fall in the darkness of history or lead the Union by a new path â€“ democracy and free market! But before you decide something, think â€“ wouldnâ€™t it cause more harm than good?

name: Creep Zone
summary: Coco, the princess of the Creep Zone, is doomed to be decapitated and become only her head by a ritual to imbue her with magical powers. If she can take the throne from her mother, she can stop this ritual... Coco's adventure to become king begins.

name: Crapette
summary: Crapette is a multiplayer klondike with an ability to exploit other players mistakes (called crapettes)

name: Cruzcredo: Become a Legend!
summary: Rise from the grave and stumble though the streets of Casca Dura, a city buzzing with mysteries, wacky gossip and some good ol' chaos thanks to the "Cruzcredo Curse". Flying rats, a vengeful ghost bride and, oh boy, the skinwalkers... Save Casca Dura from it's doom and become a legend!

name: Crosswords: World Tour
summary: Are you a fan of crosswords? Do you like travelling? Heck! Who doesn't?! Crosswords: World Tour is the game for you!

name: Crystal Fortress
summary: Defend the Crystal Fortress and its people from invading forces in this blend of Turn-Based Tactical RPGs and Tower Defense. Summon the infantry, call out the archers, deploy turrets. Use all the available tools to keep the enemies at bay!

name: Crat Strat's Sonic 1 Hack
summary: Crat Strat's Sonic 1 Hack is a ROM hack of the original Sonic the Hedgehog for the Sega Genesis, the hack is a technical "troll" designed to be as bizarre and nonsensical as possible. It features a completely broken and chaotic presentation where levels are filled with random, non-functional objects, ear-piercingly distorted music, and a "Crat Strat" character that is a poorly drawn, jittery version of Sonic.

name: Crash Site
summary:
CRASH AND SPLASH IN THE TWIN PACK OF THE DECAMILLENNIUM!

Go beyond in an original mission by members from Digsite, Crash Site invites you right to the fight, reinforcing allies & eliminating Covenant on the search to uncover the island's mysteries.

name: Cross Court Tennis 3
summary: Play like a professional in this 3D tennis simulation experience.

name: Crop Crusaders
summary: Play as a sentient Vegetable who can transform into 6 different veggies with unique abilities. Escape the tormenting lab where you were created and are now being held captive.

name: Crunda
summary: Leap, dive and slam your way across the asteroid belt in this unique physics speedrunning platformer. Explore the mysteries of Crunda's wobbly whimsical world or challenge your friends to tackle the world record table!

name: Cryptage
summary: A real-time action roguelite, you are a wizard venturing into a crypt full of monsters and buying new staffs and skins to improve yourself! The game has endless mode.

name: Creepy Redneck Dinosaur Mansion 3
summary: MATCH DNA BUBBLES IN AN UNDERGROUND LAB TO KEEP YOUR PSYCHIC CLONE FROM INVADING YOUR MIND AND TURNING YOU INTO A CANNIBAL. This is the match-3 survival horror comedy RPG metroidvania you didn't know you needed.

name: Crystal: Automaton
summary: A short automation challenge aimed at everyone from beginner to veteran. Take your time to uncover the lore of an ancient civilization without any dangers. Can you find a clever way to use logistics to overcome the scarce space available?

name: Cribbish
summary: The roguelike deck builder for Cribbage.

name: Cralon
summary: Cralon is an authentic 3D dungeon crawler with RPG and adventure elements, inspired by the ultimate dungeon classics. Hunting a demon, you fell into the abyss of an old mine. Equip yourself, fight creatures, solve quests, uncover secrets and find a way out.

name: Crypt Robbery
summary: Explore, achieve, hide, and fight in this chilling, one-of-a-kind adventureâ€”a first-person shooter survival-horror game. Do you dare to enter a creepy cemetery at night? Can you escape the horrors lurking in an underground crypt where evil reigns? Prove how brave you are now in Crypt Robbery!

name: Crimen Exceptum
summary: Crimen Exceptum is a spell-crafting action roguelike where you scavenge for equipment and combine magical spells to overcome all that stand in your path

name: Craft The World: Wonderwood
summary:
The "Wonderwood" DLC adds a new type of world to the game, featuring giant trees that disappear into the sky. The dwarvesâ€™ primary habitatâ€”mountains and underground minesâ€”is now far away, and their camp is located high up within the trunk of a massive tree. You'll have to adapt your habits and craft essential tools and weapons from various types of wood to defend against giant mosquitoes capable of draining an entire dwarf in one go. Additionally, temples belonging to the followers of a mysterious cult are scattered among the trees.

Features of the DLC:
- a new campaign level for experienced players
- numerous dangerous events in addition to monster waves
- underground colonies of cult followers
- new monsters, items, structures, and building blocks

name: Cranky Cove
summary: Welcome to

name: Critter Caboodle
summary: Watch and play with quirky critters as they generate loads of money for you in a unique idler/creature collector hybrid.

name: Cross The Boundaries
summary: This is a Touhou Fangame. Maribel Hearn is a girl with unusual experience with ghosts and supernatural beings. In Cross The Boundaries, you will solve riddles while trying to stay alive, and looking for a way out of the nightmare.

name: Crumps
summary: Crumps is a small, social, multiplayer, platforming game where you are a Crump :3

name: Crime Boss: Rockay City - Cracker Character Pack
summary: Unlock Commando Cracker and take advantage of his overwhelming firepower. As a former soldier, Cracker is both proficient with firearms and close quarters combat.

name: Critter Isle
summary: Jump right in and hatch your first Egglin, let creativity flow as you learn how to manage your Egglin's wants and needs through food and play. Zen out to the blissful comforts of decorating your island how you see fit, and bask in the rewards your Egglins provide as you grow your Egglin empire.

name: Crime Boss: Rockay City - Baker's Bundle
summary: Become the king of Crime Boss: Rockay City in style with this unique bundle!

name: Crime Boss: Rockay City - Jupiter Character Pack
summary: Unlock the maxed out version of Jupiter and take your heists to the next level with a unique loadout and unique perks for Jupiter.

name: Creepy Shift: House For Sale
summary: Handyman neededâ€”ASAP! The investorâ€™s coming in the morning, and the house still isnâ€™t ready! Take on an extra shift where horror meets simulation. Tackle the chaos, uncover dark secrets, and finish everything before dawn.

name: Crimson Tale
summary:
Crimson Tale is a short first-person narrative puzzle game where Elizabeth takes one last action against the oppressing forces of the nobility. Avoid the sun, go back in time with blood magic and use your vampire abilities to find the golden guard, ending this tyrany once and for all.

You are Elizabeth, a vampire who returns to a decaying village where the nobility has fled and the guards control the people. With Christieâ€™s death still fresh, Elizabeth uses her powers to travel to the past, discovering the hidden fates of those connected to the villageâ€™s downfall. While she uncovers the other's past lives to change the future, her determination sets out to avenge her love and bring an end to the last of the tyranny responsible for the remaining chaos.

name: Crimson III
summary:
The evil demon Crimson will not rest until humanity is destroyed. The powers of an ancient civilization made his resurrection more terrible than ever before: using robotic technology, he fused himself with a machine and became even stronger. Chosen heroes from different lands must meet each other and join forces to defeat Crimson once and for all.

Crimson III plays very similarly to its predecessor. It is a Japanese-style role-playing game with overhead navigation, first-person turn-based combat, randomly appearing enemies, and simple leveling up system. Like in the previous game, the player has to conclude initial chapters dedicated to each of the heroes before controlling them as a party on their main quest. Battles have an auto option, allowing the AI to take over the player-controlled party.

name: Crystal Ball of Firmament
summary: The spell book is missing! Help the magician to find it in this action platformer adventure. Use the crystal ball to change between the day and night to make your path, collect tokens and buy useful upgrades. Venture out 4 different biomes (mountain, woods, winter forest and city) with a total of 32 levels. Warping the day / night cycle changes ambiental obstacles and enemies behavior.

name: Crabby Fishes
summary: Can a bunch of crabs save the ocean? Dive into a dynamic, hand-drawn tower defense where quirky sea creatures battle alien zombie-like polluters. Build, upgrade, and unleash wild abilities in fast-paced, chaotic battles. Immerse yourself in a vibrant, colorful world as you fight to reclaim the reef!

name: Crown of Chaos
summary: Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of the gloomy streets of the old city, where something sinister lurks around every corner, and your only salvation is your two trusty katanas. Fight creepy monsters, hone your fighting skills and try to survive as long as possible in this battle of endurance.

name: Creatures of the Night
summary: Inspired by classic horror and the VHS generation of movie rentals. Creatures of the Night aims to be an immersive and fun experience putting players inside some horror classics to solve mysteries, lift curses and try to survive either solo or multiplayer

name: Cruellete
summary: Fight to death with Casino-Themed bosses with a spin(Pun intended)!

name: Crypto Fantasy: The Scrolls of Kouga
summary: CRYPTOFANTASY -The Scrolls of Kouga" is a 2D Dot Royal Road JRPGA boy is reborn in another world after an incident!He wakes up in a world where "ninjas" are active.

name: Crimson Frontier
summary: Crimson Frontier is a top-down shooter with RPG elements set in a cyberpunk universe. Battle powerful megacorporations, upgrade your character with augmentations, and uncover the truth in a dystopian world.

name: Crunchies Munchies
summary: Eat as much food as possible. Hitting each other or hitting a saw will cause you to barf it out.

name: CroquettesClicker
summary: An incremental game about kibble and cats! Collect, upgrade, and manage your kibble to reach unimaginable heights. Will you become the ultimate kibble master?

name: Crashawk
summary: A tight, retro-style 2D platformer inspired by the Game Boy and Super Game Boy accessories. Use the unique crashing mechanic to ricochet off walls and make your way through the singleplayer campaign or bound off the ground to demolish your friends in the new multiplayer battle mode!

name: Creeping Clark
summary: "Creeping Clark" is a linear indie horror game that pulls players into Sophie Clark's unsettling experience in a remote forest house. With a playtime of ~60 minutes (Demo: ~25 minutes), follow Sophie as she navigates a series of disturbing events that blur the line between anxiety and reality.

name: Crowd Fighters
summary: Call out the heroes and defend your fortress!

name: Create You Tiny Idle
summary: An idle game about creating an idle game. The more you progress, the more mechanics there are in your game.

name: Crash Nitro Mini Golf
summary: Crash Nitro Mini Golf was a browser-based golf game that ran on Shockwave,

name: Cryken Part1
summary:
Get the all crystals!
Play in split-screen multiplayer for 1-4 players!
All 30 stages! Switch level normal and hard.

name: Creepy & Cute Pixel Plushy Craft
summary: Make ghoulish but also cute plushies in this little browser game.

name: Criminal Archives: Blade of Deceit - Collector's Edition
summary: A judge's body is discovered with a clean cut across his jugular, setting the stage for an intense puzzle of motives and clues.

name: Crystal Keepers
summary: Face hordes in intense battles, unlock abilities, and combine items to create unique builds. Play solo or with up to 3 friends, discover powerful synergies, and survive the insane waves. Evolve your strategy, defeat bosses, and become a true Guardian of the Crystals!

name: CrimSaw
summary: A small, fast-paced, and deadly arena FPS with a â€˜spinâ€™. You canâ€™t jump and are only armed with a badass weapon. Charge, launch and recall your sawblade to slice up endless hordes of demons into pieces. Survive as long as you can and climb up the global leaderboard.

name: Critical Point
summary: "Critical Point" is a sci-fi strategy game. As the leader of the "Devourer" spaceship, you must not only solve the ship's energy crisis by adjusting the positions of various modules in the reactor to enhance the chain reactions between particles, but also plan the ship's warp routes.

name: Crosswind
summary: Crosswind is a survival adventure set in the Age of Piracy. Explore procedural open world, gather, build and craft. Overcome challenging bosses in soulslite combat. Sail your ship, fight on land and sea, play solo or with friends. Live your swashbuckling adventure in PvE or rise to power in optional PvP.

name: Creepy Crawling
summary: Horror FPS where you'll be dealing with crawling monsters.

name: Crast
summary: CRAST is a dynamic online first-person survival shooter. Game locations are created exclusively for the convenience of the gameplay. You do not need to worry about various weapon settings, CRAST will take care of this. CRAST will determine your level of play and select a worthy opponent.

name: Crypto Rush
summary: This game is a parody created under the influence of the hype of crypto airdrops in clickers. Click on a coin to mine coins, sell coins for other coins, buy video cards to automate mining. Buy chests for mined coins to try to get new types of coins or get it on market or by exchanging with friends.

name: Crimson Theory
summary: Trapped between dreams and reality, you wake up in an abandoned house. Strange notes appearâ€”written in your own handwriting. But something is waiting beyond these walls... where the real nightmare begins.

name: Cr4ckr
summary: cr4ckr is a puzzle game about cracking passwords.

name: Cradle of Nightmare : Flowers to you
summary: Cradle of Nightmares: Flowers for You is an ATB turn-based game based on combat adventures made by RPGMaker. Players will take on the role of a high school student named Le Qing, who will fall into the dark and gloomy "second world" and embark on a journey to end the filthy fate of mankind.

name: Craft & Conquer
summary: Craft & Conquer is a Free To Play Idle game that's full of weird art, a bunch of upgrades and many hours of content.

name: CraftPunk
summary: Lead over a hundred soldiers with a variety of skills into battle! 100+ soldiers, 10+ different skills, and endless combinations await your exploration! Plus, you'll face opponents from around the world, all vying for the top spotâ€”are you ready for the challenge?

name: Crazlipse
summary: Crazlipse is a game where officer Stefan Vincenzo uncovers a zombie apocalypse at the "Starry Sky Tree." After meeting scientist Matheus, he's teleported to a zombie-infested zone to survive and fight.

name: Crazy Battle Pets
summary: Form your own team among 200+ different animals and then fight with other players! Play a game in a relaxed and pleasant atmosphere, and enjoy the game without any operations. They strengthen the animals in battle after battle until they finally win the championship.

name: Creamare: The Game
summary: In Creamare: The Game, players take on the role of divers to explore 9 real underwater cultural sites in the Mediterranean Sea. They must defeat a monster from the future by solving ecological challenges and puzzles related to the history of these sites.

name: Crumble Party!
summary: You are a cake nanite. Your job is to rebuild the towns through cooperatives, sustainability, and pound cakes. Make your way across the board, discovering this new baked goods world!

name: Crystal Cave
summary: Can you focus and conquer the trials set by the three wizards? Don't waste a momentâ€”dive into this unforgettable adventure now!

name: Crystal Caverns
summary: Roguelite/soulslike designed for all ages Complete puzzles and kill enemies all to become stronger. face the Boss in an attempt to save your sister. Where Endless Replayability and soulslike combat meet.

name: Crazy Pierrot
summary:
Crazy Pierrot is a Japanese Flash screamer game designed and scripted by Yoshiaki Ogiwara.

The player's goal in the game is to control a clown and catch the apples falling from the sky, while dodging the skulls - catching one of them is an instant game over. However, the game's description says that the game is actually cursed and that the player should not get a 4000+ score.

name: Crushiator
summary: An experimental arena battle game! Choose from 4 unique characters, smash 6 breakable objects, and race against time. Play solo or challenge a friend in local split-screen multiplayer! Indie game, designed and developed by a solo creator.

name: CranKnight
summary: An action roguelike game for the playdate.

name: CrazyCattle3D
summary: A battle royale rage game about sheep.

name: Cryptigma
summary: Cryptigma is a top-down innovative puzzle game where you can move your own respawn point. Most levels have a respawn point, which can be pushed to maneuver your way around obstacles. With only a few mechanics, the puzzles get shockingly complicated. Push, die, and solve this great game!

name: Crash Bandicoot: The Secret Place
summary: Crash Bandicoot - The Secret Place is a fan made Crash Bandicoot game on Gamejolt made by KaloyGames. Crash must collect the crystals needed in order to defeat the Giant Golem in order to restore peace back into the world.

name: Crescent Tower
summary: Aspire to reach the top of Crescent Tower that appears just once every 50 years! An authentic 8-bit style dungeon crawler RPG with a retro level of difficulty, where you repeatedly explore, level up, and traverse dungeons!

name: Crystal Commanders
summary:
Construct an epic base and battle for peace in Crystal Commanders, a brand new RTS game in both mixed and virtual reality!

Mixed reality RTS action:
Take charge of your forces, expand your defenses, and engage enemies in rapid skirmishes using unique, expressive controls. Deploy a diverse array of vehicles, towers, and contraptions to thwart a planetary threat, all from the universe of your living room!

Battle anytime, anywhere:
Not in a good spot for MR? No worries - just jump into one of the included VR living rooms, and play any mode wherever you want! Supports Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3 and 3S!

Action-packed story campaign:
Join Castor and the other members of the Crystal Vanguard as they push back the crafty Crimson Blade in an epic, fully voiced campaign that dynamically adapts to your room - no two spaces will play exactly the same way!

Challenge a friend to the ultimate RTS battle:
Put your base building skills to the ultimate test in 1v1 multiplayer, battling with friends locally in MR or remotely in VR! Modes include RTS staples, such as destroy the HQ, as well as new takes on classics like kill the king, all with VS AI support to practice against.

name: Crazy Drops
summary:
Crazy Drops is a fast-paced addictive game that combines action and puzzle solving. With 12 increasingly difficult levels.

These drops are highly unstable creatures that can multiply out of control and eventually overcome our world. Luckily, connecting 4 or more drops of the same color will make them evaporate!

name: Crypt Keeper
summary: Unleash your inner necromancer in Crypt Keeper â€“ a roguelite base and tower defense game. Summon your skeleton army, build your base and defend it against endless waves of heroes determined to see you vanquished.

name: Craftae
