summary: Stack cards to collect food, craft equipment, build structures and defeat the dungeon in this village builder roguelite. Discover new cards, gather new resources and craft new recipes every run! Combine, surviveâ€‹ and thrive!

name: Creaturing: Sea Wonders
summary: Create physics-based sea creatures and discover evolution through surprising challenges! Control, test, and share your creatures made with our flexible building system! Evolution is full of quirky surprises, can you be more creative than nature it self?

name: Crucible of the Forgotten
summary: Overcome a series of challenging stages in this roguelite horde survival game by developing your power with autocasting spells across many different dimensions, including items, upgrades, talents, and more that interact with each other to produce many unique and powerful builds.

name: Crazy Cats vs. Crazy Cyborgs
summary: In this arcade shoot 'em up game you play as Princess Anna, the savior of cat people. Fight against the attack of Crazy Cyborgs for 12 boss rush levels!

name: Crownbound: Fantasy Kingdom Sim
summary: Youâ€™re the ruler, but your heroes have minds of their own. Recruit heroes, set rewards, build a thriving kingdom and hope your warriors donâ€™t run off chasing squirrels instead of fighting monsters.

name: Crablike
summary:
Crablike is a traditional dungeon-crawler roguelike, following in the footsteps of the original Rogue, where you play as a crab. The whole game takes place underwater, as you travel across the ocean to find the source of a mysterious corruption that is turning all sea life against each other. Do you have the cunning, strategy, and tenacity to survive in the hostile depths?

Of course you do. You're a crab. The pinnacle of evolution.

name: Croco.Games
summary: a Party game website made in 2014 formerly called "JKLM.FUN" but changed on 2024 for new incoming games.

name: Cryphora
summary: A remote mountain cabin, a raging snowstorm, and the line between reality and madness begins to blur. Make difficult choices, explore surreal worlds, and confront what waits in the dark.

name: Cryken Part2
summary: Get your hands on crystals!! Play in split-screen multiplayer for 1-4 players! 30 stages in total. Normal and hard difficulty levels!

name: Crystal Legends
summary: Step into a realm filled with Holy Paladins, Fearsome Dragons, Malevolent Sorcerers, and over 50 other legendary heroes! Assemble a powerful roster of characters inspired by timeless legends and engage in epic battles that evoke the most memorable worlds.

name: Crowley Hotel: The JH Chronicles
summary: Wander through a haunted hotel where three Entities are trapped; solve cryptic clues about their rooms, collect artifacts belonging to them by deciphering their stories, to unravel the three chilling endings.

name: Crazy Golf Party
summary: A vibrant and whimsical mini-golf game that transforms traditional crazy golf into an engaging digital experience. Supporting up to 15 players in online or LAN multiplayer, it offers a variety of themed coursesâ€”including Funderheim, Elden Forest, Egypt, Windmill Valley, and Haunted Hallowsâ€”each filled with unique challenges and surprises. Players can personalize their golf balls with an array of hats and skins, adding a fun twist to the competition. Ideal for casual gaming sessions with friends and family, Crazy Golf Party delivers lighthearted, chaotic fun for players of all ages.

name: Crimson
summary:
Crimson is a medieval-themed role-playing game similar to Dragon Quest. The player controls a lone character, a young man whose father sent him on a mission to defeat the evil monster Crimson before passing away. Exploration is done in an overhead fashion, and is divided into world map and hostile areas, which are usually maze-like and contain one or more dungeons each. In towns the hero can buy weapons, armor, and items, as well as rest in inns.

Enemies appear randomly, and the battles are turn-based. The player character can either attack, defend, or use an item. Combat is viewed from a first-person perspective. Unlike Dragon Quest, there are no random encounters on the world map. Exploration is non-linear, i.e. the player has access to many areas of the map from the beginning of the game.

name: Creature Creation Station
summary: Create characters, watch them play together, and easily share your creations with friends!

name: Crouching Panda, Hidden Moose
summary:
Do you want to try on the crown of the king of animals? Or maybe you want to become a master of kung fu? Anyway you`ll have a lot of fun with this awesome game!
Choose an animal (Crocodile, Panda, Rhino, or even the Skunk), give special abilities to it, arm it and send to the Arena to fight real opponents with great tricks and humor! Every battle is a funny colorful cartoon. Your animal can be a winner!

name: Crusader Kings III: Khans of the Steppe
summary: The winds sweep across the Great Steppe as you look over your people, preparing to ride toward the horizon in search of greener pastures, lands to conquer, and new treasures to claim. In Khans of the Steppe, the second Core Expansion for Crusader Kings III, the nomadic life takes center stage, offering a rich tapestry of new challenges and opportunities. Become â€” or defeat â€” the Great Khan as you harness the unique powers of the nomads, navigate the ever-changing Steppe Seasons, and bend the world to your will.

name: Crystal Monsters (2025)
summary: Welcome to the great mysterious Crystal World! If youâ€™re reading this, congratulations! You finally have an opportunity to uncover a secret the world hides from youâ€¦ Now, you will begin a new adventure in a new world with aâ€¦. four-legged spider?! Well, not all spiders are scary. You think thatâ€™s something you donâ€™t usually see every day? Then immerse yourself into a deep adventure as you uncover the shocking hidden secrets the Crystal World tries to hide from you!

name: Crossings
summary: Explore and Fight your way through an ever-changing world in a quest for vengeance and survival in an epic Adventure through the Norse afterlife. Meet fellow lost souls in seamless and wordless VR Co-op as you Block, Dodge, Strike and Power your way through Trolls, Draugr and other dark beings.

name: Criminal Cleaner Simulator
summary: Youâ€™re not a criminalâ€¦ just criminally good at cleaning.

name: Critical Shift
summary: Critical Shift is a hardcore turn-based tactical game with RPG elements and a profound dramatic story. An atmospheric sci-fi mystery imbued with the unknown and featuring the strangest objects awaits you! Every enemy here is a lethal threat, and resources are worth their weight in gold.

name: Crazy Alien
summary:
Angry newcomers are going to kidnap animals for their horrible experiments. Fortunately, the small animals have hope of salvation! An alien rabbit from the Galactic Society for the Protection of Animals is in a hurry to help! With his assistant gorilla and bison, he must free the animals in two worlds.

Free the animals on the farm and in the thicket of the jungle in this endless runner with the space bunny. In a difficult situation, his friends will help you. Call the gorilla and bison to destroy any obstacles; use jetpack and upgrades to overcome the long path.

Don't forget to collect the stars, because the rabbit is a great trendy! For the collected stars you can dress him up in stylish hats and glasses. In addition to this, the stars can be spent on upgrades and the buying of additional lives.

name: Crypts & Curves
summary: Explore, Fight, and Fuck your way to victory. Delve into the Crypt of Curves in search of riches, stay for the monstrous maidens.

name: Creepy Support
summary: Save people from terrible paranormal dangers as a support operator of a secret SCP-like organization! Ask questions, give advice and watch the consequences of your choices... 5+ endings in each story ;-)

name: Creature Containment
summary: Creature Containment is a hybrid Base Builder/Top-Down shooter. As a newly graduated Militia Commander, you're tasked with wiping out a goblin infestation that's taken root in an old-world mega facility. Manage your base, equip your operators, and fight hordes of creatures underground...

name: Critterrupters
summary: Choose your new buddy and set off on a Critter adventure on Holon Island! Capture Critters by fulfilling their conditions and master time based battles by interrupting your opponent's turns. Assemble your team to challenge the Islands Clubs and gain new abilities for your buddy to help you explore.

name: Crux Diaries
summary: Crux Diaries is a turn-based, isometric, non-linear CRPG inspired by the classics. Set in an alternate-history 1970-s dystopia on the brink of civil war, it invites you to leave your mark on the future of a fractured nation through meaningful choices, skill checks, and survival.

name: Critical Strike
summary: Real-time multiplayer FPS game with fast-paced battles. Battle with players worldwide with never-ending action in different game modes. Pick your gun and start a battle!

name: Crime Busters II: Havoc
summary: Eliminate terrorists hiding in the labyrinthine city of Hong Kong! Battle from alleyways to skyscrapers on neon-lit streets. Team up in co-op to defend Hong Kong's peace!

name: Crit Happens!
summary: Take a chance and roll the dice in Crit Happens! a Dice-Building, Turn-Based Roguelike â€“ Know when to roll and when to hold to increase your attack and defeat powerful enemies. Craft your dice and seek out magical trinkets and powerful relics that will change the way you play!

name: Cryken Part3
summary: Get the crystals!! Play in split-screen multiplayer for 1-4 players! 30 stages in total. Normal and hard difficulty levels!

name: CragEx-5
summary:
You're stationed on a moon far from Earth for 50 days. Use drones to perform work cycles at substations, gathering and managing resources to spend on crafting, tasks, and upgrades to make getting resources more efficient while also selling what you collect to perform research and meet day end requirements, all while managing your energy. And throughout all this, you arenâ€™t aloneâ€¦

It's intended to be played blind. Every death gives you a hint on how to avoid meeting the same fate next time, but there is an in-game encyclopedia giving information on all anomalies and an overview of the game mechanics that you can read any time.

name: CrowHallow
summary: Explore and survive these terrifying lands, and uncover the mystery of the Skult. With your companion Crow as your main weapon, charge into the horde of the night and save the souls of the damned with this 90s and early 2000s inspired Halloween shooter.

name: Creepy Tale: Snow Child
summary: A volatile cocktail of action and puzzles, spiced with pitch-black humor and a deliciously sinister atmosphere. Journey into Hell alongside a brave boy named Blizzy and defeat Evil itself. Save the world and become a hero. But at what cost?

name: Crunchball 3000
summary: Crunchball 3000 is a video game by British developer Ben Olding in which players take part in the titular futuristic sport. They can create and manage teams, play single or multi-player games with preset teams or edit teams.

name: Crab Hunt
summary: Youâ€™re an alien octopus who crash landed on Crab Island, where you discover your taste for crabs and hip clothing. Your goal is to find your spaceship but juicy crabs are in the way.

name: Crank Up
summary: An infinite stacking game for the playdate.

name: Criminally Yours
summary:
You're the next generation of heroesâ€”"Oracle," given to your mother and you for your ability to see glimpses into the future.

The only thing that stands in your way of keeping peace in the city is the supervillain "Chronos".

When you aren't protecting the city from Chronos, you're just an average everyday civilian working as a project manager with your long-time crush, Nikolaos.

Little do you know that Nikolaos knows your secret, but you don't know hisâ€”that he and Chronos are one and the same.

name: Crankoids
summary: A fun asteroid shooter for Playdate

name: Crystal Keeper
summary: Mine crystals and defend your wall in this idle defense game. Balance resource gathering with combat as you upgrade your way through endless enemy waves.

name: Cryptid Keeper
summary: Become the Cryptid Keeper. Track, catch, and collect cryptids, monsters, and aliens. Manage your own Cryptid Zoo, care for your creatures, and attract visitors while exploring the wild to discover new and mysterious Cryptid species to add to your Index.

name: CryptidCam
summary: Head out into the spooky woods to lure out and take photos of creatures like The Loch Ness Monster, The Loveland Frogman, Bigfoot, and more in this short, light hearted photography adventure.

name: Crystal Gaiden Origins
summary: Crystal Gaiden Origins is a hardcore 8-bit action platformer inspired by the brutal edge of NES-era classics. Slash through rebels, ex-allies, dark ancient technology, and a crumbling empire in chiptune-fueled missions. Inspired by Ninja Gaiden, Shatterhand, and Castlevania.

name: CrimeBloc
summary: Free-to-Play Text-Based Mafia MMO Set in the Eastern Bloc. A gritty text-based MMO where you rise through the ranks of organized crime in the Bloc. For 18 years, players have forged criminal empires, fought brutal turf wars, and survived in a world where betrayal is currency.

name: Crownbreakers
summary: Insatiable, hyper-charged capitalism has the magical city in a chokehold. Crash into the tyrants' districts and build your deck as you push forward. Use your heroes and your cards to fight back against criminal syndicates and demonic billionaires in this turn-based card-game brawler.

name: Crystal Siege
summary: A stunning Tower Defense and RPG hybrid with incredible attention to detail.

name: Crayon Legend
summary: Cursed nobles turned into Magic Doors watch their possessions eaten by an insatiable Mimic. Transported to this time-locked island, you must Jump, Lift, Search, and Feed to restore the kingdom. A family-friendly, 3D platformer with hand-coded physics, Unlock the doors to find your way home.

name: Crime Boss: Rockay City - Heavy Hitters Pack
summary: Bring the pain with a new host of hard-hitting weapons included in the Heavy Hitters Pack for Crime Boss: Rockay City.

name: Crime Boss: Rockay City - Hielo Character Pack
summary: Unlock Golden Boy Hielo and bask in his gold standard loadout. Hielo has always been a little vain but this time he is taking it up a notch with some glittering weapons that are sure to make a statement.

name: Cryptid Engine
summary: A realistic paranormal simulator

name: Crowbar Climber
summary: In Crowbar Climber, use your crowbars to make your way up! Face hooks, planks, and gears using only your arms. Can you beat the game before you run out of energy?

name: Crypt Capers
summary: One day, while studying ancient Egyptian ruins, the player discovers an unknown pyramid buried in the sands of the Sahara. Once inside, the player must try to collect all the treasures, including: statues, old jars, papyrus, and masks. On each level the goal is to gather all the keys and reach the exit door to the next level, while avoiding dangerous snakes, fireballs, and ghosts. The player moves in the cardinal directions, and can fire their gun forwards. Dangers appear in their chamber, and then roam the halls.

name: Critter Cart
summary: In this grocery cart arcade racer you can live out your fantasies of drifting around the grocery store as a cute critter!

name: Crime Detective: Red Flags
summary: Confined under house arrest, Cody Harper begins observing his neighbors out of boredom. But what starts as an innocent pastime soon descends into a real nightmare. A true crime horror inspired by the case of a notorious serial killer.

name: Crafty Crasher
summary: Craft and trigger contraptions to perfection or glorious chaos! Smash cars, rescue heroes, and create hilarious scenes with your own interactive systems! From giant hammers to epic chain reactions, anything is possible!

name: Crabs!
summary: CRABS! is a physics-based brawler where you build and battle customizable crabs in underwater arenas. The game features crab customisation, round-based upgrades, and procedural animation â€” resulting in chaotic, unpredictable matches every time.

name: Crimson Horn
summary: Forge an unstoppable army in this thrilling auto battler experience! Strategically recruit and command diverse warriors, each with unique abilities, to form the ultimate force. Customize your squad with powerful weapons, crafted gear, and inspiring banners to turn the tide of battle!

name: Crypt of Darne
summary: Crypt of Darne is a free roguelike-ish dungeon delving game, where you make a character out of few race-class combinations and explore a crypt, trying to find a specific gem. You'll know it when you see it, but it is hidden deeply in the crypt. Good luck!

name: Crazy Caves
summary: Explore the Crazy Caves and find all the treasures.

name: Crackdown: Four-Play Pack
summary: Adds four new Agent skins.

name: Crackdown: Free-For-All Pack
summary: Adds Keys to the City mode (unlimited cheats), the ability to impound vehicles, and the ability to resurrect gangs.

name: Crackdown: Getting Busy Bonus Pack
summary: Adds five new weapons (MSK Lobber, HRX "Harpoon", MZ360 "Mini-Gun", EX1 "Proximity Charge", VS1 "Cloaking Device"), three new vehicles (Agency Race Car, Agency Buggy, Agency Armored Vehicle), new mini-games, Street Racing, and 5 new Achievements.

name: Cryptbound
summary: Cryptbound is an asymmetrical horror game where you and two other explorers venture into a mysterious dungeon in search of powerful energy crystals. But something ominous guards its domain. Work together, evade deadly traps, and run for your life.

name: Crinchure Collector
summary: A magical creature collector where you navigate menus and narrative prompts to bake treats and befriend Crinchures! Collect hundreds of different Crinchures, Swords, and Ingredients with this easy-to-play experience!

name: Crafters Heaven
summary: Crafters Heaven is a lowpoly RPG sandbox adventure blending survival, crafting, and exploration. Build your base, fight wild creatures, and discover an open world full of secrets! Demo coming soon!

name: Crazee Rider
summary: Crazee Rider is the spiritual successor to Superior Software's Overdrive. Originally envisioned as a car racing game it was turned into a motorcycle racer during development. Players need to race opponents over different tracks, starting out at the 60th position. To progress the player has to end in the top six of the pack in a single lap. Compared to Overdrive there are more opportunities to avoid opponents and tracks also have bends.

name: Craball
summary: Bop the ball. Collect coins. Don't let it touch the ground! Easy to play. Hard to play well. (This game is deceptively difficult. You've been warned.)

name: Crabageddon
summary: Defend your tower as a battle-hardened crab in a hostile underwater world! Collect powerful artifacts, grow stronger, and survive relentless waves of sea creatures

name: Cross World: Mishiranu Sora no Etatia
summary: Enter Kuros, an average high school student who gets sent into another world after getting into a car accident. Losing his memory and forgetting his name, he became known as the Cross Sword hero. In search of a way to open up the Cross Gate to return his own world, Kuros and one of three heroines partner up to travel across the world of Etatia in search of clues. Meanwhile, a mysterious cloaked figure seems intent on disrupting their journey of getting Kuros back to his own world...

name: Crystal Conflict
summary: A 3D remake of the LEGO Flash Game LEGO Mars Mission: Crystalien Conflict.

name: Crystal Calamity
summary: Crystal Calamity is a roguelike deck-building tactics game where you wield card-based powers and protect spirits from another realmâ€”your living draw and discard piles. Build your deck, fight alongside spirits, and save the world in a land ruled by crystals and cards.

name: Crayon Dino
summary: A creative coloring experience for everyone from children to adults. Show off your completed masterpieces to your family.

name: Crabmeat
summary: A short first-person-point-and-click-survival-horror game set in a future Antarctic fisheries region where you are a prisoner tasked with crabbing for the priceless southern King Crab.

name: Cryken Part4
summary:
Get the crystals!!
Play in split-screen multiplayer for 1-4 players!
30 stages in total. Normal and hard difficulty levels!

name: Crow Boss
summary: A former soldier, much feared for his brutal acts, better known as Boss, returns from the depths of limbo seeking revenge against the traitors who sent him there.

name: Cry Pic.
summary: This is a 2D action shooting game that focuses on fighting large enemies (bosses).

name: Creeps: Halls of Insanity
summary: A thrilling game in a place no man has ever escaped....

name: Cross and Gun
summary: You are an exorcist. Find anomalies to uncover hidden demonsâ€”and eliminate even the ones who don't hide. Use your holy cross and your gun. Defeat all the demons and escape the cursed house.

name: Cricket Captain 2025
summary: Build your dream team with Cricket Captain 2025. Complete interface overhaul, with easier to use, clean look. New Player Editor for batting, bowling, fielding, aggression and opener type. Match engine update with more accurate 20 Over simulation. Fast-play engine.

name: Crazy Islands
summary: Welcome to "Crazy Islands", a 3D survival game for 1-4 players that takes you into a world full of mystery and challenges. On this isolated archipelago, you will face ancient gods, cruel natural environment and unknown dangers. Only wisdom and courage can help you survive in this unknown land.

name: Crazy Sonic
summary:
The ultra-fast vehicle you control, CRAZY SONIC, accelerates the more you crank.
Your goal is to reach the finish line within the time limit by dodging obstacles that appear across highway lanesâ€”using lane changes and speed control to your advantage.

name: Crusader Kings III: Wandering Nobles
summary: Learn more about the world and put this knowledge to productive use in Wandering Nobles, a new event pack for Crusader Kings III. Develop your character through a new Wandering Lifestyle option, designed for less sedentary people. New events will happen to characters as they travel, opening new story-telling possibilities.

name: Crusader Kings III: Crowns of the World
summary: Step into historyâ€™s spotlight with a collection of new crowns, hairstyles and beards in Crowns of the World. What will your royal image be like?

name: Crusader Kings III: All Under Heaven
summary: With All Under Heaven, the vast and dynamic history of Asia comes to life. Claim the Mandate, unite your people, and shape the future of empires in this monumental expansion for Crusader Kings III.

name: Crusader Kings III: Chapter IV
summary: From the crowning glory of Crowns of the World to the sweeping narratives of Khans of the Steppe, Coronations and All Under Heaven, Chapter IV offers a comprehensive journey through the diverse and dynamic world of Crusader Kings III.

name: Crusader Kings III: Coronations
summary: Mark your ascension to power with Coronations by hosting grand ceremonies that inspire awe and respect in your subjects and neighbors. How will your crowning moment define your reign?

name: Crusader Kings III Content Creator Pack: Medieval Monuments
summary: Discover the great architectural achievements of the Middle Ages with the Content Creator Pack Medieval Monuments. Created in collaboration with the established Crusader Kings III modder PiGu, Medieval Monuments brings 20 new varied and culturally significant monuments to the game.

name: Crusader Kings III Content Creator Pack: Arctic Attire
summary: Brave the chill of far northern lands in style with the Arctic Attire Content Creator Pack, made in collaboration with the established Crusader Kings III modder Aj.

name: Crusader Kings III Content Creator Pack: West Slavic Attire
summary: This cosmetic addition to Paradox Interactiveâ€™s award-winning medieval strategy role-playing game introduces new gear for Western Slavic characters of all ranks.

name: Crash Bandicoot: Respun
summary: A new Crash Bandicoot fangame has been released by â€ªRS Projectâ€¬. Itâ€™s called Crash Bandiocot: Respun and it plays like the original PS1 games.

name: Crow Style
summary: When fashion sets the rules, boldness decides who wins! In this Stealth game, control an arrogant crow obsessed with status, sabotage the rivals to win the city's biggest contest. Sneak into designers homes, alter their creations and escape without getting caught!

name: Crazy Crab
summary: The first of the classic SpongeBob horror adventure series. Mr. Krabs' money was stolen, and he has gone crazy! You will go on a dangerous path to escape that crazy crab and his lust for blood.

name: Crash Bugs Cake Defense
summary: Crash Bugs Cake Defense is an arcade game where a delicious cake sits at the center, under attack by waves of hungry bugs. Tap the bugs to crush them before they reach and eat the cake. As the game progresses, more and more bugs appear, making it harder to defend. The goal is to protect the cake as long as possible and crush as many bugs as you can.

name: Crossbars
summary: Get ready for the ultimate downhill mountain biking experience in Crossbars, where speed, skill, and adventure collide. Set across four stunning, mountainous islands, Crossbars challenges you to race through 20 thrilling tracks, each with its own unique terrain and environmental hazards. From rocky cliffs and forested trails to muddy paths and open hills, every track offers a new adventureâ€”will you stick to the main path and race against the clock, or venture off-road and discover hidden secrets?

name: Crazy Crab 2
summary: After Mr. Krabs's money was stolen, his desire to kill everyone he can think of has only grown with time. What will happen next in the treacherous journey of these frightened Bikini Bottomites?

name: Cr33p
summary: Your friend Dove invites you to a group chat to make some new friends. Everyone is so different but so friendly! They all seem so interested in youâ€”too interested. Have fun navigating online relationships!

name: Cropdeck
summary: Plant, grow, and harvest in this farming roguelite deckbuilder. Craft a powerful deck of plants and combine quirky scarecrows with passive effects for wild synergies. Pay taxes. Strategic, satisfying, and delightfully wholesome.

name: Cranked
summary: Chase the top of the leaderboards in Cranked and experience the raw thrill of downhill mountain bike racing. Itâ€™s fast, responsive, and grounded -- we're chasing what it really feels like to ride. Easy to pick up, impossible to put down, and packed with virtually endless skill depth.

name: Crazy Cakes 2
summary: Bien-Marie needs your help in Crazy Cakes 2. Keep those ovens hot and deliver delicious desserts to hungry wizards, trolls and more in this magical time management puzzle game.

name: Crossword Cove HD
summary: Play a new crossword puzzle every day in a relaxing seaside setting. Keep the fun going by catching up on the past three months of daily puzzles in the calendar.

name: Craftaway
summary: Craftaway is a fresh take on roguelike card games. Battle cute but dangerous enemies, collect powerful cards, and upgrade your gear as you explore and face surprises head on, make strange new friends, and put your skills to the test to uncover the secrets of the island.

name: Craft World
summary:
Craft World is a casual resource management game available on Web, Android, iOS, and Telegram. Players assist elemental dinosaur-like creatures known as Dynomites to rebuild a shattered Earth and ultimately escape it. The core loop is simple (Collect -> Craft -> Trade -> Build), but by connecting to the player-owned economy, it adds unlimited depth to the gameplay. Designed for both web2 and web3 gamers, Craft World combines engaging gameplay, a player owned economy, and active community collaboration.

We believe a player-owned economy takes years to build, and requires constant iteration. Thatâ€™s why we launched Craft World on testnet in 2023, and have been updating and improving it weekly ever since, in public, with the help of our community. Their feedback and ideas have shaped everything from in-game mechanics to economic design.

Unlike many Web3 titles that retrofitted blockchain tech into existing games, Craft World was built from the ground up with blockchain in mind and was designed to fully unlock what ownership and interoperability can actually look like in practice.

Collect, craft, trade, and build - In Craft World, your actions drive a player-owned economy and shape a thriving community. Designed for both Web2 and Web3 gamers.

Dynomite NFTs produce tokens every day
Constantly working in their fields of expertise, the Dynos produce $fire or $water tokens. These elements can be either used as currencies to buy and upgrade factories in the game or they can be transferred to your wallet.

Use Factories and craft New Materials
The Dynos combine, improve, and imbue these elements to invent new things. Factories can be used to transform elements to new materials, which are needed to build up Masterpieces.

Masterpieces benefit you and the community
Masterpieces require many elements and material tokens, and therefore you have to contribute your tokens together with the community.

name: Creepy Dungeons
summary: Help this brave knight navigate the halls of Creepy Castle to save Princess Sinclive from the secret dungeons.

name: Crayola Scribble Scrubbie Pets
summary: Color, care and play with adorable pets! Transform Crayolaâ€™s #1 selling toy into digital companions with endless creative fun and interactive pet care activities.

name: Crown of the Empire: Timeloop - Collector's Edition
summary: Crown of the Empire: fun adventures await! The queen needs your help!

name: Crazy Robot Ball
summary: Step into the thrilling world of Crazy Robot Ball, the ultimate turn-based football showdown. Take command of a team of high-tech robots, each with unique attributes designed to give you the edge in the battle for robotic football supremacy.

name: Crazy School Games
summary: Crazy School games contains 10 different minigames, such as Tic-Tac-Toe and Yathzee.

name: Critical Strike Shooter VR: SWAT Rescue Missions
Creepy Redneck Dinosaur Mansion 1 Re-Raptored
summary: Jack Briar is back to stop Baylissâ€™ dastardly Disaster once more! Rediscover every room, dino, and puzzle from the original match-3 survival horror comedy RPG metroidvaniaâ€”now fully reraptored!

name: Crash Delivery
summary: Crash Delivery is a fun 3D delivery simulator game full of unpredictable decisions and crazy rides. Itâ€™s a combination of the most fun gameplay activities you can imagine: car destruction, stunt driving, car flying and much more.

name: Cryptadia Village
summary: A short role-playing game where you try to save a village from dark spirits. Explore an interactive world filled with puzzles and side quests, engage with villagers, and uncover the mysteries of a cozy, magical land full of adventure.

name: Crime Boss: Rockay City - Wiz Character Pack
summary:
Wiz is blending in by standing out with the latest Crime Boss: Rockay City character pack!

Unlock Golden Wizâ€™s flashy new look, along with two high-powered weapons, cutting-edge equipment, and two unique perks.

name: Creepy Shift: Uncle Joeâ€™s Motel
summary: Unknown actress takes a job at Uncleâ€™s Motel to make ends meet. Sheâ€™s running from trouble â€” but peace is the last thing sheâ€™ll find here. A surreal blend of simulation, horror, and psychological depth, wrapped in a noir atmosphere.

name: CRTX: A Psychological Horror Puzzle
summary: Imagine Squid Game and Portal having a child. That's basically CRTX (pronounced cortex). Be prepared for an oppressive atmosphere with dark humor, a few horror elements and a story that digs deep inside your mind...

name: Crypto Mining
summary: â€œCrypto Miningâ€ is a simulation game in which you have to create your own â€œCrypto-Imperiaâ€, earn all the money in the world, or, fail.

name: Crystal in Carnations
summary: Two women bound by fate rise as Vivestria falls. Gather your allies and shape their journey through dual battle systems, life-altering choices, and multiple endings. In this story-rich tactical RPG, every decision leaves a scar. Will you save a dying kingdom, or forge one worth saving?

name: Cracked

name: C.R.E.E.P
summary: An online co-op horror game for up to 4 players. Step into the role of engineers tasked with repairing broken space stations. Locate, and fix fully procedural based systems from small bolts to critical cores all while surviving what roams in the station.

name: Crucible Of Time
summary: A retro 4X game inspired by classic versions of the genre. Lead your people from a small nomadic tribe into a globe-spanning space-fairing civilization. Can your empire survive the Crucible Of Time?

name: Crazy Dungeon Tavern
summary: Cook to the rhythm, interview and hire various mercenaries, with defeating the Demon Lord as the ultimate goal!

name: Crayola Amazing Art Adventure
summary: A collection of art-related minigames for young children.

name: Crossout Legends
summary: Crossout Legends is a legendary MMO action game.

name: Crayon Classic
summary: Complete your childâ€™s first masterpiece together! Capture both your childâ€™s imagination and your familyâ€™s memories!

name: Creep Clash
summary: A real-time rendered True 3D fighting game. A challenge is held at the stroke of midnight to decide who is the most worthy ghoul to reign as the next Lord of Necrovania.

name: Crafterok: Lords of Survival 2
summary: Survive on wild islands full of mysteries and adventures! Find hidden paths to secret islands using your ingenuity!

name: Crow
summary: Explore, fight and survive on the rooftops of Noland Ridge, a city turned into a science experiment. In this Open World, Stealth-Adventure game with a Retro look, you are free to explore the map however and whenever you want!

name: Crowded: A Crow City Builder
summary: Crowded is a crow city builder where you strategically design a nest-city to support and shelter your flock. Engineer, scavenge and explore your way to a self-sustaining society in the sky!

name: Crimson System: VÉ…Î” Protocol
summary: A dark retro-FPS born from a solo AI-creation experiment. Blast your way through a vampire-ruled station, slay twisted enemies, and uncover the secrets of the VÉ…Î” Protocol

name: Crank It!
summary:
A cunning computer game where you find yourself in a cave surrounded by various pieces of patented technology.

You are not alone in the cave.

Meet your supervisor and try to make it through the shift.

name: Croakspire
summary: Dive into a fortress labyrinth crawling with monsters, defending yourself with your... tongue? As a frog, it's your best bet to traverse this retro-inspired 2D metroidvania title. Collect treasures to gain permanent upgrades, discovering new areas of the massive interconnected map with them!

name: Crimson Apostle
summary: In this horror escape room, a prequel to the novel Dracula, you play as Renfield. Solve puzzles, survive the trials of the enigmatic Countess Dolingen of Gratz, and escape the horrors that haunt you â€” both outside and within your mind. Is your fate written in blood?

name: Crankstone

name: Crabs
summary:
Key Features
Care for Your Crab â€“ Itâ€™s simple. Get a crab, bring it home, and keep its food and water topped up for a few days. Take it out for a backyard adventure. When you are done spending time with your crab you can ALT-F4. The Crab will survive will the game is off as long as it has food and water. Make sure to check in before it runs out and refill as needed. Keep your crab alive as long as possible. Train it to improve its skills and discover new abilities along the way.

Real-Time Gameplay â€“ The game continues even when you are not playing, so there is no need to keep it open between visits.

Backyard Adventure â€“ Take control of your crab and explore the backyard. Discover secrets, face threats, and solve puzzles to discover new traits and abilities for your crabs!

Tank Variety and Customization â€“ Unlock larger tank designs and customize them with decorations to create the perfect environment for your crab. (Coming soon)

Perfect for anyone looking for a low-pressure gameplay experience, Crabs captures the simple joy of caring for a hermit crab. Whether you are a longtime hermit crab enthusiast or just curious about these fascinating creatures, this game invites you to slow down and enjoy lifeâ€™s tiny wonders.

Crabs is in early access and does not represent the final product. I will do my best at regular updates to improve the experience and add new features. Some content is still a work in progress. Please visit the Discord to report any bugs and share your feedback.

summary: Whether you're a Sudoku veteran or puzzle newcomer, Crank Sudoku offers hours of brain-teasing entertainment with the tactile satisfaction only Playdate can provide!

name: Crooked Cooks
summary: Crooked Cooks is a chaotic co-op game where you and your crew run a restaurant as a front for the Boss' criminal jobs, mixing fast-paced cooking with shady business.

name: Critter Bonk
summary: A cute incremental clicker where you bonk bugs for profit. Earn money, unlock upgrades, acquire powerful skills, and recruit helpers to automate the bonking until youâ€™re truly unstoppable. Satisfying and Relaxing!

name: Cross Reverie
summary: Follow the story of Eight of the land of Xyleraâ€™s bravest combatants and their descent into the madness known only as The Trial of Nightmare in this JRPG-inspired title featuring turn-based combat and a character-focused narrative.

name: Crayon Animal
summary: Color cute animals with crayons! Bring the animals of the forest, farm, and ocean to life in your own colors.

name: Crown of Silence
summary: Crown of Silence is a 2D Metroidvania adventure with Souls-like mechanics set in a gothic world. Forge your own combat style with diverse equipment, challenge ruthless bosses, and uncover the dark secrets of a silenced kingdom through environmental storytelling.

name: Criticality
summary: A short incremental game about splitting atoms and going critical.

name: Crooked Pines
summary: â€œCrooked Pinesâ€ is a first-person investigative horror game in which you step into the shoes of a retired cop, where the only thing capable of killing youâ€¦ is your own heart.

name: Crabs Dive In Crossway
summary: "Crabs Dive In Crossway" is a Sokoban-like puzzle game. You need to command a troop of crabs and manage them to the target places. Crabs are stubborn and cooperative! Each will only move in horizontal/vertical line. They can carry another to change line, and push away single crab in the way.

name: Crash of the Titans: Monster Edition
summary:
A special edition of Crash of the Titans that includes the game itself and comes with the following items:

A Crash sticker set
A removable Crash tattoo set
A pencil case
A mobile phone dangler
A bonus DVD that includes interviews, trailers, game hints, etc...

The Bonus DVD includes an interview with the developers, the trailer for the game, the trailer for The Legend of Spyro: The Eternal Night, hints and tips, cheat codes, and a link for exclusive bonuses in the Crash Village web site

name: Cruise & Learn: Downtown Collection
summary: Fasten your seat belt, start your engines and get ready for some real driving!

name: Critical Descent
summary: Master the high-stakes catch of the SpaceX Starship! Execute precise maneuvers to stick the landing in the towerâ€™s arms, complete missions, compete on global leaderboards, and race your own ghost for the best time in Critical Descent.

name: Crazy Stars: Rhythm Party
summary: Climb surreal dimensions in this rhythm game powered by high-energy electronic beats! 100+ stages, BPM 110-155 tracks, combos over 357! Extreme tempo awaits!

name: Crown Siege
summary: A short incremental tower defense game centered around growing and strengthening armies, to defend your kingdom and stop endless waves of enemies.

name: Crystal Garden
summary: A classic-style match-3 puzzle experience with a soothing garden theme. Easy to play, rewarding to master, and perfect for short sessions or long, relaxing play.

name: Crazy Cats Survivors
summary: Cute cat heroes fight endless waves of enemies with fully automatic weaponsâ€”focus on dodging and strategic upgrade choices while attacks fire automatically. Quick 5-minute roguelite arenas deliver charming, accessible bullet-hell action with unlockable heroes and persistent upgrades.

name: Crownslayers
summary: Crownslayers is a roguelite turn-based roleplaying game, where you get to control two teams of heroes across separate timelines. Battle your way through a series of universes, bending time and space to affect multiple timelines, and future playthroughs!

name: Crypts of Carith
summary: Classic dungeon crawling with fully custom characters. Create a party of up to 6 adventurers, explore the village of Carith, and descend into its sewers, cellars, and ancient crypts. Level up, learn new skills and spells, and uncover powerful gear using a familiar D20-based RPG system.

name: Crystal Vale: Dino Escape
summary: Run. Collect. Escape the dinosaurs.

name: CrankyCube
summary: Cranky Cube is a fully 3D puzzle cube game. Use the crank to rotate, spin, and solve classic 2x2 and 3x3 puzzle cubes.

name: Cryzon Part3
summary:
Get the crystals!!
Play in split-screen multiplayer with 1-4 players!
30 stages! Normal and Hard difficulty!
